story:
Classic Roses with a Modern Twist

Love, sympathy, thoughtfulness, thanks … roses speak volumes when words fail. Perhaps that’s why the rose is beloved by so many people around the world, crossing cultural and emotional barriers with ease. In some sense, the humble rose is a global language, and has been for centuries.

Given this, you might assume that where roses are concerned, innovation is a closed book. That there’s nothing new to be done.

We beg to differ.


Roses Reimagined

Sure, delivering flowers is an old idea. But not the way we do it here at Golden Valley Roses.

In addition to gorgeous traditional potted roses, we provide a one-of-a-kind alternative: mini rose trees, ten inches tall and carefully shaped over a period of 14 months field grown. Right now we have an exclusive run of 2,000 trees, but more will be available late 2016.

·  New alternative to traditional bouquet of roses

·  Mini roses offer longer bloom life of 2 weeks

·  Special unique gift, limited exclusive amount grown


Our container rose bushes

Our traditional mail-order rose bushes are also top-tier. Choose from our several classes of roses from Hybrid Teas, Floribundas and Climbers. Roses are all propagated with their own roots as opposed to being budded to an under stock.

Why own root roses?

· Own root roses start off slow, but are stronger

· Well balanced cane growth

· No sucker removal

· New shoots are true to variety

· Hardier plants

Hybrid Teas continued

Hybrid Teas:

·  One flower per stem

·  Ideal for cut flower

·  Can reach 6’ tall

·  Large flowers up to 5’’ in diameter


If you're looking for a more compact rose, look no further. Floribundas offer an abundant floriferous show of color perfect for creating borders.

24'' Patio Tree Roses Available


A Greener Approach

Oh, and did we mention our products will help the planet? Yep. Instead of flying in flowers from developing countries around the Equator, we plan on growing them right here ourselves, preventing huge expenditures of fossil fuels and protecting the fragile atmosphere with your help.

Because we’re just awesome like that.


Specialty Systems

Our growing systems are different too. We use a special tray designed to give us maximum root development. Open on the bottom, our trays allow roots to be air-pruned, avoiding the ball-like effect of many potted plants and laying the foundation for a beautiful, long-lasting, hardy rose.

Plus, we’re small. Versatile. We try always to minimize our footprint and maximize our customers’ and partners’ satisfaction. That means you … partner.


Why We Need Your Help

Put simply, we know you can help us make a better product. A product that changes the floral industry, the gardening sphere and the world. Does it sound a little overdramatic? Well, maybe. Is it true? You bet.

Considering the relatively small scope of the project, we think you’ll be impressed by the big difference we can make. We need the following supplies:

  • $6850 for containers
  • $4,050 for 45 yards of premium-blend soil
  • $800 for fertilizer

With this investment, we’ll be able to continue innovating and contributing green, local, beautiful roses to the California area and beyond.

If we exceed our goal, we’ll also make much-needed farm improvements: drip tape to make us even more energy-efficient and water-wise; greenhouse roofing to harness the sun’s energy; concrete foundations to keep our hothouses clean without a bunch of chemicals or other inputs. Increasing our workforce and generate more local jobs.

So Help Us Speak a Better Language

Roses have helped humans say what they needed to say for millennia.

Now we want to change that language, make it more environmental, more contemporary, more unique.

You can help us. Support Golden Valley Roses, a locally-operated and family-owned farm that prioritizes fast delivery, gorgeous flowers and the people who love them.
Are you ready to join the rose revolution? We’re ready to have you.

Let’s do this.


Orlando (Owner & Operator) With our new 10'' Mini Tree
Our Latest Press Release Golden Valley Press Release

story:
What you will get

  • a tool that converts all your data from Cultured Code Things to Wunderlist
  • no manual post-processing in most cases
  • three simple steps: start the converter, import into Wunderlist, be happy
  • privacy: the conversion is performed on your machine (no cloud)
  • the tool will become open source after a successful funding
  • Stretch Goal $750: commandline tool for power users
  • Stretch Goal $1000: documented data exchange format

Motivation

I love Cultured Code Things. It is simple and I can apply all the concepts of GTD - or only a few. Every device I own (Mac, iPhone and iPad) has their own version of Things. The usability on every supported platform is brilliant. The Synchronization is fast and stable...

BUT:

I am vendor locked to Apple Devices. I like my Mac very much, but sometimes I have to use a windows laptop.

Or what if my next device is an Android device? Conclusion: A multiplatform solution is needed, covering OSX, Windows, Android, Web, iOS ..

Cultured Code Things is the only app that prevents me from switching platforms - in my case from iOS to Android. I spent a great deal of time populating my GTD system, which I'd rather not do again. I need a tool that converts all my todos from Things to a shiny new multiplatform GTD tool. My research has identified Wunderlist and Todoist to be both perfectly suited. My plan is to support both, but I will start with Wunderlist.


Why should I back

Support Open Source Software

Thank you.

Protect your investment

If you love Cultured Code Things the same as I do than you can protect your investment. Use it as long as you like and be assured that it won't be a dead-end street. Your data can be migrated to another tool on another platform. Even If you just plan to buy Things. Do it, you won't regret. Your data is save.

Switch to another platform

See above .. my motivation.

But your project has been funded already

Can I just wait until your tool goes Open Source? Sure, but the more you fund, the longer can I support the programs involved: Things, Wunderlist and todo2todo. There will be newer versions with new features, new file formats or new APIs.

Challenges

  • There is no export feature in Cultured Code Things
  • There is no import feature in Wunderlist
  • There is no common data exchange format for tasks
  • There is o third party cloud service to transform from Things to another tool

Idea

The main idea is to use the automation features of Things to generate a data file that contains all the information you gathered in Things. Wunderlist's web application has a backup/restore feature that uses a proprietary data format. I will reverse engineer this format (it is JSON) and transform/output its content into a Wunderlist-compatible format.

I do not plan to introduce a cloud service that operates with your private and sometimes secret data. You use the tool locally and upload the whole file to Wunderlist.


Platform

The converter tool will run on OSX Yosemite and later versions because it uses features introduced in OSX 10.10.

There will be an application that can be started without any interaction or additional configuration. It will create a file according to the transformation rules described below.

For power users there will be a command line script that can be configured with custom parameters as a stretch goal.

The tool will be open source. The binaries will be available for download from a public Bitbucket repository.

Can I deliver

YES, I CAN. I'm a professional developer and have been successfully delivering projects in commercial environments for almost 20 years now. I drive a number of open source projects (Bitbucket) as lead developer. The project with the broadest audience is a plugin for Adobe Lightroom, helping to organize your photo library. I also blog (blog.frontend.li, in German) about web development in general. My twitter acount is normanwehrle. I've been using GTD for 5 years and my weapon of choice has been Cultured Code Things.

Schedule

Project preparation has already been done. The following tasks are in this project's backlog:

  • Automate Things to generate a data file: 16 hours
  • Reverse engineer Wunderlist backup format and create minimal examples by hand: 8 hours
  • Transform Things to Wunderlist format: 16 hours
  • Corner cases: 8 hours
  • Testing / Bugfixing: 8 hours
  • Create an distributable app: 4 hours
  • Document usage: 4 hours
  • Working on the project's homepage: 2 hours

I plan to deliver the first public release of the tool one month after a successful funding: 20 May 2015

Transformation rules

Things and Wunderlist support GTD differently. In Things every subtask can have the same metadata as a task. In wunderlist subtasks have neither tags, notes or due dates.

My aim is to transfer all available information from Things to Wunderlist. That is why I will introduce the following mapping, which might be optimised adapted as the project moves along.

  • Things projects will become Wunderlist tasks
  • Things top-level tasks will become Wunderlist tasks
  • notes, tags and dates that belong to a Things project or top-level task will become notes, tags and dates on a Wunderlist task
  • tasks within Things projects will become Wunderlist sub-tasks
  • the horizon of focus in Things will become a tag in Wunderlist
  • areas of responsibility end up as Lists in Wunderlist
  • tasks that are planned for "today" in Things will be starred in Wunderlist
  • dates and notes of Things projects tasks will be attached to the parent task's note in Wunderlist
  • tags that are on a Things project task will be attached to the parent task in Wunderlist
  • the Things inbox will become an ordinary list in Wunderlist (please move the few items in there by hand to the Wunderlist inbox)
  • Things tasks that don't have an area of responsibility will be placed in a default list in Wunderlist
  • If you use persons in Things, your tasks can be found in a list named after the area of responsibility. For now tagging the task with the persons name is not planned, as I believe the feature is rarely used
  • Reoccuring tasks will not be exported from things (in the initial release)

Risks

Yes, there are risks:

  • Cultured Code could change their automation features (probability: low)
  • Wunderlist could change their backup/restore feature (probability: low)
  • The way I transform from Things to Wunderlist does not match your workflow.
  • After testing Wunderlist or Todoist you will return to Things. But hey, at least you had a chance to test drive another GTD app with real live data!

Copyright

The forklift logo has been designed by Allessandra Antonetti.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Ich bin die Michaela vom ehemaligen Nexus Vienna und möchte das Geschäft mit eurer Hilfe wieder neu eröffnen.

Ich möchte ein Ladenlokal und einen Onlineshop mit all den schönen Sachen füllen, die mir und euch so gut gefallen haben und gefallen und euch einen Ort zum Wohlfühlen,Stöbern und Einkaufen schaffen.

 Im Großen und Ganzen möchte ich aus dem Bereich  Gothic, Metal, Steampunk

Kleidung, Korsetts,Schuhe,Schmuck, Kosmetik,Magazine, Merchandise und eine kleine Auswahl an Horrorfiguren anbieten.

Das Sortiment sollt auch ihr über Facebookumfragen ein wenig mitbestimmen können.


Mir liegt es echt am Herzen das Nexus wieder zu eröffnen, da es ,neben der Einkaufsmöglichkeit, immer ein Ort der Zusammengehörigkeit, eine Art eigene Welt in der jeder willkommen ist, war.
Und das möchte ich wieder ins Leben rufen.

Es gäbe auch schon ein passendes in Frage kommendes Mietobjekt.
Durch meine 10jährige Erfahrung bin ich überzeugt, das Nexus wieder zu dem tollen Ort machen zu können!

Um dir ein Bild über das vorherige Sortiment machen zu können , schau dir einfach die Nexus Facebookseite an


Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst


Wenn du das Projekt unterstützt, fließt das Geld in folgende Ausgaben:

  • Mietkaution
  • Ware Startkosten (Kleidung,Schuhe, Kosmetik, Korsetts)

Mir ist es auch wichtig von Anfang an Artikel in allen Größen, in vielen verschiedenen Ausführungen u für jede Preisklasse anbieten zu können!


Als Dank für jede Unterstützung kannst du dir verschiedenste 'Perks' sichern:

.) Limitierte T-Shirts
.) Die bekannte lebensgroße Todfigur als Beschützer für dein Heim
.) VipCards mit bis zu 15% Rabatt auf jeden Artikel ein Jahr lang
.) Sei das erste Flyermodel am ersten Nexusflyer nach der Neueröffnung
und noch viele mehr.....
Zusätzliche Perks werde ich in den nächsten Tagen auch noch hinzufügen!


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Auch wenn du keinen Beitrag leisten kannst, kannst du trotzdem helfen:

  • Spreche über diese Kampagne, mache sie bekannt.
  • Teile die Kampagne in Foren und sozialen Medien wie Facebook, Twitter, TumblR. Nutze dafür das Tool von Indiegogo.
  • Teile die Nexus Facebookseite
  • Du möchtest mein Vorhaben sponsern, jedoch nicht über das Crowdfunding? Dann melde Dich einfach über office@nexus.co.at oder über die Nexus Facebookseite
  • Du kennst dich mit der Erstellung von Homepages und Onlineshopsystemen aus und auch mit deren rechtlichen Grundlagen? Du möchtest mir für den Anfang freiwillig helfen und nach Start auf Gewinnbasierter Basis die Homepage betreuen?Dann melde Dich einfach über office@nexus.co.at oder über die Nexus Facebookseite

Für eine Unterstützung mit 25.- bekommst du dieses limitierte Tshirt

Unser Tod ist auch zu haben! :-)

story:
We need your Love, Support, Feedback and some money to make this product come true.

 

 

 

 

 

Where can I design my site?

Here at http://cmsbots.com

 When will you deliver the files?

We are trying for instant delivery of files soon after you make the payment. However, in beta stage, we need 24 to 72 hours to verify each file manually and then deliver.

 I want to become an affiliate

Glad to hear, Please see here for more details

 I want to be a reseller for your product.

Wonderful, click here for more details

 I want to export the design in a different CMS not listed here.

We are sorry, but we are working on to make provision to port this tool to maximum possible CMSs / Frameworks, and should be adding one by one.

I have a lot of questions

Look at our full FAQ or contact us here

 

 

We have 7 years of web design / development experience. We did more than 200 web projects. We have clients all over the world. Now we have decided to automate what we have been manually doing for the last 7 years.

story:
Side Street Coffee has been serving the community of Kaufman for two years now (we opened November 1, 2013), and we'd love to continue doing so, but we're going to need your help. If you'll join us, we're going to give you some great perks just for being part of the team. Keep reading to find out more!

THE VISION

Side Street came about as a dream to offer Kaufman residents some great quality coffee, a relaxing space to meet with friends, and a productive work environment. We hope you've enjoyed our quaint little shop so far, as well as our friendly staff.

Our customer base continues to grow, but the private funding behind Side Street is soon to run dry. We need your help to cover some expenses so we can remain open and Kaufman can continue to enjoy a great coffee shop. Without you, we'll have no choice but to shut our doors.

COFFEE WITH A PURPOSE

Side Street has never been about profit. Although not a designated nonprofit, owners Dick and Nancy Murphy are committed to the vision of the coffee producers Side Street supports. HOPE Coffee uses 100% Arabica coffee beans that are cupped for quality and classified as specialty grade strictly high grown (SHG) coffee. This delicious coffee comes from Honduras through  partnership with small local coffee farmer associations like Cultivadores del Reino (Kingdom Growers). Additionally, HOPE coffee exists to make a real difference. Each year the company produces a report that tells many of the stories and shares the impact HOPE Coffee’s profits have made in the lives of the poor in Honduras. Families receive shelter, clean water, and renewed hope. There are plenty of places you can buy good beverages, but do you know where all your hard-earned money is going when you do? At Side Street, you know that every purchase you make contributes directly to helping reduce poverty in Central America. Drinking our coffee saves lives!

THE NEED

The community of Kaufman is growing, and with that growth comes a demand for great coffee. We've worked hard to produce creative, quality espresso drinks just for you. Our menu continues to expand to offer you more and more coffee and coffee-free options. But we know that with your support we could take our production to the next level. Your contributions will give us the opportunity to purchase a better espresso machine, leading to better coffee and more efficient service. Additionally, we'll be able to compensate our staff to be open at more hours that are most convenient for our varied customer base, as we continue to grow.

With your help, we'll offer more food options like you've been asking for. And of course - we want to remain Kaufman's go-to spot for FREE wireless internet.

Additionally, Side Street's hope is to increase cultural opportunities for Kaufman. We display and highlight the art of numerous local artists, only adding to our already unique and homey environment. We've also hosted musicians and more! With your help, we'll be able to partner with more and more groups and individuals with similar aspirations to bring more cultural opportunities to Kaufman.

We hate to even think about it; but without Side Street, Kaufman would be left without its best espresso, best art, and comfiest public couches!

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU

And now for the fun part! If you'll help us meet our funding goal, you'll get some great perks! Things like free espresso drinks, t-shirts, travel mugs, and other cool swag. As well as fun, unique gifts like catered meetings and drink-naming. Just take a look at the right side of this page and choose your preferred gift level!

THANKS!

If you'd truly like to see Side Street succeed, share this page with your friends! Use the provided share tools to get the word out on social media and through text messages and emails. The more the merrier!

We're grateful for our many loyal customers, and we're confident that your gifts will get us to a self-sustaining place very soon. As always, feel free to contact with questions, concerns, or suggestions on how we can make Side Street your favorite place to relax, savor, and connect.

Thank you in advance!
story_txt:
Side Street Coffee has been serving the community of Kaufman for two years now (we opened November 1, 2013), and we'd love to continue doing so, but we're going to need your help. If you'll join us, we're going to give you some great perks just for being part of the team. Keep reading to find out more!THE VISIONSide Street came about as a dream to offer Kaufman residents some great quality coffee, a relaxing space to meet with friends, and a productive work environment. We hope you've enjoyed our quaint little shop so far, as well as our friendly staff.Our customer base continues to grow, but the private funding behind Side Street is soon to run dry. We need your help to cover some expenses so we can remain open and Kaufman can continue to enjoy a great coffee shop. Without you, we'll have no choice but to shut our doors.
COFFEE WITH A PURPOSE
Side Street has never been about profit. Although not a designated nonprofit, owners Dick and Nancy Murphy are committed to the vision of the coffee producers Side Street supports. HOPE Coffee uses 100% Arabica coffee beans that are cupped for quality 
and classified as specialty grade strictly high grown (SHG) coffee. This delicious coffee comes from Honduras through  partnership with small local
 coffee farmer associations like Cultivadores del Reino (Kingdom 
Growers). Additionally, HOPE coffee exists to make a real difference. Each year the company produces a report that tells many of the stories and shares 
the impact HOPE Coffee’s profits have made in the lives 
of the poor in Honduras. Families receive shelter, clean water, and renewed hope. There are plenty of places you can buy good beverages, but do you know where all your hard-earned money is going when you do? At Side Street, you know that every purchase you make contributes directly to helping reduce poverty in Central America. Drinking our coffee saves lives!
THE NEED
The community of Kaufman is growing, and with that growth comes a demand for great coffee. We've worked hard to produce creative, quality espresso drinks just for you. Our menu continues to expand to offer you more and more coffee and coffee-free options. But we know that with your support we could take our production to the next level. Your contributions will give us the opportunity to purchase a better espresso machine, leading to better coffee and more efficient service. Additionally, we'll be able to compensate our staff to be open at more hours that are most convenient for our varied customer base, as we continue to grow.

Additionally, Side Street's hope is to increase cultural opportunities for Kaufman. We display and highlight the art of numerous local artists, only adding to our already unique and homey environment. We've also hosted musicians and more! With your help, we'll be able to partner with more and more groups and individuals with similar aspirations to bring more cultural opportunities to Kaufman.
We hate to even think about it; but without Side Street, Kaufman would be left without its best espresso, best art, and comfiest public couches!
WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU
And now for the fun part! If you'll help us meet our funding goal, you'll get some great perks! Things like free espresso drinks, t-shirts, travel mugs, and other cool swag. As well as fun, unique gifts like catered meetings and drink-naming. Just take a look at the right side of this page and choose your preferred gift level!
THANKS!
If you'd truly like to see Side Street succeed, share this page with your friends! Use the provided share tools to get the word out on social media and through text messages and emails. The more the merrier!
We're grateful for our many loyal customers, and we're confident that your gifts will get us to a self-sustaining place very soon. As always, feel free to contact with questions, concerns, or suggestions on how we can make Side Street your favorite place to relax, savor, and connect. 
Thank you in advance!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jacob. I have researched and produced marijuana for over 20 years now. Medical marijuana and CPD oils has proven to be my leading form of natural medication. CPD oils has helped greatly with my chronic pain and arthritis over the past several years. Medical marijuana and CPD oils has helped our family and friends achieve positive health results and improved quality of life.  Pharmaceutical medications can cause permanent disfunction to the liver and kidneys which as a result can lead to severe health problems and ongoing treatment. The natural healing properties from cannabis are proven to help with mental health, disease and may even prevent cancer.  Medical Cannabis is known and proven to help with many forms of :

ADHD, BIPOLAR, ANXIETY, SLEEP APNIA, DEPRESSION, TUMORS, CANCER, SEIZURES, PARKENSONS DISEASE, HEADACHES, PTSD, EATING DISORDERS, the list just keeps going...

We are licensed suppliers to our registered members providing medicinal cannabis for over a year now. Our customers love our organic and hydroponic medicinal flower, fully lab tested and deemed "Some of the cleanest cannabis in Canada." Obviously we can't tell all of our secrets. The recreational side is now legalized Canada wide. We aim to target that massive market and supply everyone with the same Premium Medicinal Cannabis that we supply our patients. Not only do we grow some of the best Cannabis in Canada, we also produce our own honey oil, moonrocks, and will be introducing our own line of platinum quality solvent-less vaporizer pens.

We are very dedicated and driven to provide patients and customers with a very high quality product that you can depend on every time and a price that can't be beat!

 

We are seeking $525,000 to secure and open a new recreation location in Ontario, Canada.

Funding will go towards:

- Application Fee's

-Securing a  Location

- Mandatory Security for said location

- Start up Inventory

- Over Head / Running Costs

The profit margins on Cannabis when grown properly can be very profitable year round. We have a lot of connections with all of the edible and concentrate producers as well as other farmers and can provide products cheaper than our competition.  We have our own line of premium Honey Oil extract, Moon Rocks concentrate, and are currently developing our own line of Vaporizer pens that will be featured in PURE CBD - SATIVA - HYBRID - INDICA in 1000mg tanks with a few extra function perks such as three power setting, universal mini USB charging, Cold Filtered, and the highest quality distillate sourced. With the production of our own Cannabis Flower, Extracts, Concentrate and Vaperizor Pens it gives us a major advantage over any of our competition.

We have an amazing team of cannabis legal specialists that will help us navigate the application process to help insure a smooth approval, strain specialists such as my self to insure a popular inventory to satisfy demand, and a highly secured location featuring security guard, camera's, and anti intruder measures taken such as secured entry, and barred windows.

 

Contributing to our cause will impact the community directly. Providing a safe and secure place to purchase legal recreational cannabis and all of its health benefits. Lab tested by a Health Canada approved facility and quality guaranteed.

Some of the crowd favorite strains we plan to have in stock regularly  are: 

Girl Scout Cookies / Jack Herrer / Death Bubba /

King Thunder Fuck (C.C. Exclusive) /  Obi Wan Kush / Platinum Kush / Sour Diesel /

Gorilla Glue #4 /  CBD Charlottes Web /  Kosher Kush

That's right Crown-Canna has developed its own strain "King Thunder Fuck" developed by our own Jacob Postma he cross bred Alaskan thunder fuck + King Bubba to create the amazing and flavourful King Thunder Fuck strain a perfect hybrid blend of 50% Sativa and 50% Indica.This is a Crown-Canna Exclusive...that's right only we will be able to feature this strain. No on else will have access to the seeds or clones.

5% FROM ALL CBD SALES WILL BE DONATED TO LOCAL HOSPITALS AND CANCER FOUNDATIONS.

for the first 6 months of opened doors! 

We hope to achieve at least 50,000 in donations threw CBD sales within the first 6 months of doors being open!

you will be able to track our donations performance threw CBD sales on our website once doors have opened.

www.crown-canna.ca

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant help out financially...no worries help our cause and help us contribute to local hospitals and cancer foundations by SHARING on all your social media...help us create a buzz tell your friends your family. Lets build a healthy Canada everyone!

DONT FORGET YOUR INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS :)

 

CROWN-CANNA

"HEALING THE NATURAL WAY"

We sincerely thank you for your contributions and helping us build a better country for all to enjoy!

story:
In an effort to sustain as a women entrepreneur I realized that it was time to form a solid collective of like-minded individuals who as a unit could move in power and truly maintain healthy, mentally sound, successful businesses. Time 2 Launch was formed from that need, a women’s entrepreneurial incubator that supports women of color in every area.  Time 2 Launch has become a dynamic support system offering access and resources to promotion, production, manufacturing, research, marketing and sales amongst many other useful tools. Our dilemma however is our access to funding to launch or re-launch the businesses in the incubator on a larger platform. Without proper funding to start off with, most of these women will still maintain 9 to 5’s making it extremely difficult to invest one hundred per cent of a creative drive into the startup.

     Most of our members have applied for loans, grants and angel investors and have found that similar and identical platforms have been fully funded but for minority women it has been extremely difficult to secure startup capital.  It’s a fact that only through having sufficient start up capital, consulting, support and mentorship, individuals that have dreams of building businesses that drive economic growth will thrive and those without will suffer many unfortunate hardships. In a New York Times article Dell Gines, the author of an intriguing new report from the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City, Black Women Business StartUps, loves this quote attributed to Reid Hoffman, co-founder of LinkedIn: “An entrepreneur is someone who will jump off a cliff and assemble an airplane on the way down.” But for black women entrepreneurs, Gines quickly adds, “they do it with only a toothpick and a napkin.” What he means is that black women entrepreneurs typically lack the resources and capital to launch, yet take-off they do — in droves. According to The 2018 State of Women-Owned Business Report commissioned by American Express, while the number of women-owned businesses grew an impressive 58% from 2007 to 2018, the number of firms owned by black women grew by a stunning 164%, nearly three times that rate. There are 2.4 million African American women-owned businesses in 2018, most owned by women 35 to 54. Black women are the only racial or ethnic group with more business ownership than their male peers, according to the Federal Reserve. But not everything about being a black women entrepreneur is so rosy. 

American Express found that the gap is widening between the average revenue for businesses owned by women of color and those owned by non-minority women. For women of color, average revenue dropped from $84,000 in 2007 to $66,400 in 2018, while for non-minority businesses, revenue rose from $181,000 to $212,300. And the gap between African American women-owned businesses' average revenue and all women-owned businesses, Amex found, is the greatest. We absolutely know why that is, the access to good START-UP funding and the ability to commit the proper amount of time towards the business. We’re fundraising for several reasons,

  1. To gift each minority women entrepreneur in our mini doc  1500.00 to 5,000 dollars in start-up, launch or re-launch funding.
  2. To provide by purchasing or leasing a building/space for all women to create, meet, manufacture,  train youth, exchange ideas, workshop, hold events, retail and to co-op the goods being produced.

  These women and many like them have created dynamic business plans, great start-ups and amazing ventures that are awesome, sustainable energies for our communities!  With your help we may push further by supplying more resources that will catapult these women’s efforts and help sustain them longer with the funding that is so needed!  We’re everything as a community and most definitely have the means to support this fundraiser. We ask that you please donate, donate and donate again, share, share and share again. Be excited with us that such a thing is happening in our communities and as we grow we may be the resource that helps you achieve your start-up dream. Thank you in advance.

A Time2Launch Business Incubator!

story:
ONLY FOR SINGAPORE & NEIGHBOURING COUNTRIES

What, Why, Who?

How many of you like Chilli Crab? We know we do! Being touted as one of Singapore's National Dishes by The Singapore Tourism Board, it is a must try dish for any tourist visiting Singapore. Mud Crab is usually used in this dish as it is the most common and available crab in Singapore.

Do you know what is better though? Chilli Crab that used KING Crab as its ingredient! Out of all the people that we talked to that have tried King Crab, NOT a single one of them said they prefer Mud Crab over King Crab. But why has not King Crab gain more popularity in Singapore? 

One logical explanation about this is that King Crab is a luxury item that costs much more than the usual Mud Crab - which the masses can afford. One notorious example is the case where a Filipino tourist is over-charged with $700 bill for the dish (read here: http://singaporeseen.stomp.com.sg/singaporeseen/this-urban-jungle/filipino-family-receives-1200-bill-for-dinner-at-boat-quay-which-includes-707). Which then bear the question: If we can price the King Crab to the level of Mud Crab, will it gain more popularity, and change the face of Singapore Chilli Crab forever, for the better?

Do YOU want to see our Chilli Crab improved?

We have been working with many businesses in Russia, and right now we got the chance to bring over their King Crabs to Singapore, with all the right prices! Imagine this: King Crab that is priced the same as a Mud Crab in a popular restaurant. Do you feel it?

What We Need & What You Get

There is only a slight problem before we can make it happen: we can only ship the King Crab in bulk, in fact we need 7,000 Kgs to be shipped in (1 full container) so that the shipping cost makes sense. We cannot share the container with other people and products (easily that is) because we will be using a Deep Frozen Container.

Cost price of the crab is USD 30 per Kg (or around SGD 40, which from our survey is about the same price as (or cheaper than) a Kg of Mud Crab in a restaurant), for a total of USD 220,000 for the whole 7,000 Kgs, plus 5% fees that Indiegogo charged for this campaign.

In short we will need to secure your pre-order of a total of 7,000 Kgs to make sure that we can bring the crab in to Singapore without any waste. The crab will be in a Cooked & Flash Frozen state (to lock in the flavor), so it will be easy for you to prepare the dish.

If we hit our fund-raising target, and more, we will set up a small restaurant where you can enjoy the King Crab dish without hassles!

For your contributions we will allocate the King Crab for you based on the amount of your contribution. For some limited VIP contributions, we will give a lifetime discount card which will entitle you to buy the King Crab at cost price for the rest of your life.

Note: This is an all or nothing campaign. If we do not hit our target we cannot ship in the crabs at all (we cannot ship in the crabs half-container load, because it will inflate the price of the crab).

Please help us change the face of crab dishes in Singapore. Share our campaign with your friends and families!

For restaurants and reseller enquiries, please email us at info@crabetal.com

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

- I don't have a paypal account. Can I still contribute?
Yes. Paypal allows you to contribute using your credit card, without registering for an account with them.

- Why is it taking so long until delivery?
This will be our first shipment in, and as such there are some permits and regulatory items that we need to satisfy by the authorities, and it will take some time.

story:
I have always liked cooking and had a special flare for flavors and seasoning but it was always for friends and family. During teacher conferences a couple of years ago the school asked for volunteers to bring dinner for the teachers that had to work such late hours that week. I did my parental duty and signed up to bring some dishes. They loved it. I was thrilled with the reviews and even more excited when they asked if I would consider catering a bridal shower for one of the teachers they were having in a week. I accepted and the rest is history.  Since then I have catered several events and continue to get orders simply through word of mouth.

Now I am looking to expand into a legitimate business.

To make the Rocky Mountain Bakehouse a reality I need a food truck. After researching ordinances and store costs I have decided that a food truck would be the best solution. With a food truck I will easily be able to pass city inspections to operate and I will be mobile and able to be right at the many local events around the city.

I want to reward any effort to help with our food truck! I feel I have come up with some great rewards and the best tasting chance to help get a business off the ground!

The delicious rewards include delicate cheesecakes, light and fluffy cupcakes and scrumptious sweet rolls.

Like us on Facebook and on a successful campaign you will receive a buy one get one free coupon.

The biggest risks that I see is getting a food truck with the right appliances and passing inspection. I should be able to overcome these risks with hard work and persistence.

The
biggest risks that I see is getting a food truck with the right
appliances and passing inspection.  I should be able to overcome
these risks with hard work and persistence.

story:
A new global social network Platform aimed at the artistic community.

Our difference is that we help you store and display your art projects in a professional way.

Destiny
To build a unique on-line community that encourages people to publish their innovative work and share their talent in a professional manner.

Current target
Create awareness of the artistic world that surrounds us.

Your support will help us to:
1. Enhance the Platform and design brand new user interface;
2. Implement different accounts tailored to consumer needs;
3. Develop online tools to deliver, improve and publish your art on a single work-table;
4. Expand the market to enable “buy & sell” functionalities;
5. Launch mobile apps for Android and iOS smartphones and tablets.

ALL our supporters will gain an early access to a brand new Platform + Perks (depends on your chosen package).

Top supporters will be named (unless you prefer not to) on our ''VIP list'' and will be accessible for all our visitors.

Further targets
Implement more online tools to help you to create / edit pictures and videos online, in real time.

Join our journey and become a part of creative community!

Thank you very much!

Team ReMi-Net

story:
As of 19 October, this campaign is no longer accepting funds. Please visit our website for more details - intheferns.org

 

We've been digging holes, wood chipping paths, climbing trees, tending the earth, meeting wild boars, setting boundaries with raccoons and rescuing dragonflies from tent flaps. We've been listening to the calls of owls and distant barking of coyotes. We've been stung by bees and devoured by mosquitos. We've been having sex in the dirt, under the night sky, on sloped ground in poorly pitched tents. We've been dancing until the sun came up, a hundred times over. We have been walking and walking and walking through the ferns, on every trail and wild sanctuary on this land. With hundreds of combined years of LOVE AND WORK on this patch of earth, In The Ferns Womyn's Cultural Trust Collective holds many kinds of knowledge about the land. We want to keep growing with it. We want to grow it with you. 


In the Ferns Womyn’s Cultural Trust is a collective dedicated to preserving the herstories of the land of the Michigan Womyn’s Music Festival. Our vision is to build upon the energies of this herstory and to create an ever growing and vital community space for all women into future generations. We welcome and celebrate the inclusion of all trans*, intersex and gender diverse wymmin.


We have intentionally started small with our outreach, building trust and gathering momentum among the Michfest community; making sure we have a strong conscious foundation to expand our effort. We are ready to expand our outreach efforts now and we need your support.

We are working to purchase the land; to create a financially sustainable, ecologically healthy, socially just and visionary place. We will continue to build upon the years of dedicated, heart and soul work and community building that the Michfest community has created over the past 40 beautiful years.

We are not recreating Michfest but instead imagining a new future with deep roots. We will nurture a dynamic, safer, accessible, intersectional and inspiring womyn’s community. This could take place in many forms: conserving the Land, hosting events or retreats, camping space, giving back some of the land to a local Indigenous group, or building more permanent structures – we are still dreaming up the possibilities. The first step towards our vision is to ensure that the Land is owned and run by wymn. Let’s do this together.

In the event that we are not able to purchase the land, all donations will be return to contributors. In other words, if we don't make it happen, you'll get your cash back. 

About us: We are a small group of Land lovers and organizers who are thinking creatively about how to keep the Land in the Festival community and what to do with it once it's purchased. We are Anna Wolk, Kyoko Nakamaru, Tracy Tidgwell, Amanda Leinberger, Lisa Zawacki, Lynn Breedlove, Tema Sarick, Deb Kennedy, Kathryn Grooms, Mary Doyle, Mariasha Sussman-Hall, Kim Wilson and several other willing and innovative community members.

We want to work with you! We are especially looking to work with people of color, indigenous people, trans*people, people who identify as disabled, and our elders.

 

Contact us at: intheferns@intheferns.org with any questions.

story:
Let’s do this!  If you are reading this you are already one step closer to helping a sustainable event planning business grow and flourish in an area lacking that option.  Kristina is blending all of her diverse professional background from being a jewelry designer to organizing events for the large companies she worked for into a sustainable event business.  It may have taken a little longer than some, but she has found her calling.

 

Building a sustainable green event planning business

I am hoping my years of crafting will help springboard my new business by my handmade goods.  It all started 2009-2012 designing jewelry for a company in the SF Bay Area which got me exploring stationary and invitations.  More and more family and friends were requesting my invitations and handmade cards, and that led to them asking about helping them with parties.  Now into 2015, Savory and Juicy Design was born and began actively making invitations, greeting cards, planning weddings and private events for all sorts of people.

All the handmade goods are made by @savoryandjuicy and consist of greeting card stationary, invitations, earrings, mala bead necklaces, and mason jar cozy’s.  The greeting cards & the jewelry will be a secret mixed bag of handcrafted beauties (see photos to get an idea of style).  Enjoy being fashionably sustainable by bringing your own mason jar cozy to your favorite coffee shop. Check out the beautiful printed fabrics (fleece or wool editions). Kristina Olson’s Gatherings will be the event planning business name and offering event planning packages through this crowd-sourcing campaign as well.  The early stages she will be running her event business through properties in San Luis Obispo, CA area and move towards getting property where she will convert the land back to native plants and develop the property to support off grid systems.  But we are getting ahead of ourselves...

Let me support you while you entertain!

Why crowd-sourcing the goods?  Each person that provides support, will get Kristina Olson’s Gatherings one step closer to making the business financially sustained.  Kristina had this to say:

“Following a dream, from two years ago, I felt I was supposed to move in the direction of having my own event business.  So now it’s 2016.  I sold everything, and left my job up in the Bay Area to convert land into a sustainable off the grid event space in San Luis Obispo County.  After doing extensive research and seeing grand opportunity because this is a destination location for weddings and events, why not incorporate my knowledge in sustainability & fitness events.   I believe sustainability minded companies and ideas are the new wave of the future that we are already starting to see that impact on all sorts of different fields.”

Who you are getting...

Kristina has immersed herself in Worldly and community causes before.  When she lived in San Luis Obispo (SLO) she was one of three key organizers for Earth Day Celebration downtown for three years, while she was the president of the Wildlife Club for Cal Poly.  She reinstated the program upon her arrival at Cal Poly and while president she planned many community events on campus, as well as, events in the local area.  She got her degree in Systematic Biology and Ecology at Cal Poly so she knows the area and demographic well.  While she was going through school she went to massage school to pay for college and continued as a side career for 15 years. Whenever it was feasible she blended the other companies she worked at or volunteered for to work together to have a greater impact in the community.  

She then lived in Zambia, Africa and was one of 6 people in charge of overseeing the water project within that country for four years.  She then moved to Australia and continued working with events and building communities.  When she moved back to the states in 2007 she organized local events for the companies that she worked for, as well as, private events.  Now for the last three years she has remained planning and organizing private events such as parties, local community events, weddings and showers on the side of her full time job.   

 

What is needed and how your money is going to be used...

$12,600 

Kristina has personally contributed $15,000.  She is in need of an additional $12,600 to help fund her event business for the next 6 months.  The funds will be used for the office rental each month, rental space of prime property in Arroyo Grande to perform various events, insurance and a fast updated website. 

Some have wanted the breakdown:

$800 Property rental each month

$460 Office rental each month

$990 Upgraded website - hire out

$1,100 Inspirational shoot with local vendors

$2,600 New social media plan implemented and local marketing - hire out

$350 Internet

TOTAL $12600

The success of this campaign will help support several local small businesses through the yoga popup festivals that Kristina Olson’s Gatherings plans to host there.  Along with helping small local businesses, KO’s Gathering plans to continue acting on its social responsibility mission by giving back to the community, planting trees, transforming her company to be more sustainable and helping animal shelters.  She notices the need in the San Luis Obispo community for this type of unique space because there are only two other spaces like this in the entire SLO Central Coast County.  Along with that mission, she plans to restore an airstream trailer and make it as energy efficient as possible.  She will then move that trailer onto some land in the next 3 years where she will start to build her eco-retreat space to use for events and education.  

Kristina finishes by saying, “This is the new American Dream for this California girl.  Maybe I was looking at this all wrong before?  There was all these hardships that kept coming at me, losing my father at a very young age, striving for the American Dream of working in a big company and owning a home but then the crash happened and I lost my full time job, house and then the major health issues came with that.  I kept thinking why is all this bad happening?   I just needed to step out of it and look at it differently.  Not as simple as it sounds.   I realized after years of constant trial that I was going about this all wrong.  Get back to your roots, live out your purpose.” 

If the project is not fully funded she will find another way to make this a reality as she has selected the fixed funded option (if you don’t know what these means if not funding she will not get any money).  So in other words she is all in... if you are!  She appreciates all support even if you can’t give funds, sharing her cause is also meaningful!  

How you can help...

After making a contribution and getting one of the awesome perks, you can help by inviting friends, family and peers by sharing the campaign. Please back the project and tell everyone you know to help spread the word so Kristina Olson’s Gatherings can bring a bit of sparkle to one event at a time.

Frequently Asked Questions...

Please comment below if you have a questions that I can answer to help everyone that wants to support my small business.  

When will I get my items? 

All handmade items are ready to be shipped out.  Once the campaign is over and fully funded, all items will begin getting shipped out promptly.   For the event planning packages, once the campaign is completed and funds are received you will be contacted for your 2017 or 2018 party.   Each person will be contacted in the order which they came in.   

What items should I expect to get?  

  • Every item is handmade.  For the cards there may be subtle paper color differences and will be randomly selected if you pick a pack (see photos to get an idea of style).  If you choose a yearlong pack then I will be randomly selecting cards to fill each category.  
  • Card categories will be listed by type of card in each perk so you can choose which cards would fit you best: Birthday, Thank You, Baby, Love, Journey, Growth, universal Winter Holiday theme, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Graduation, Christmas.  
  • The the card category dog theme and water theme are slightly different with 20% of the proceeds going to those causes.  
  • I will be sending out a secret selection bag for the jewelry perks.  (see photos to get an idea of my style).  If you don’t prefer these options then select the custom order option and I will  make something specific.
  • Same goes for mala bead necklaces because there are many different color combos and that will be randomly selected.  
  • Mason Jar Cozy’s will have a few options.  Natural or color editions.  Fleece or wool fabrics.  Please select the kind you would like and then will be randomly selected from the various of fine fabrics.  
  • The amount you pay for the event package will be used as your deposit.  Depending on the level of event you will be responsible for paying the balance when the contract is signed.

story:
Resumen

 

Los colaboradores financian ideas que los apasionan y a la gente en la que confían. Estas son algunas cosas que puedes hacer en esta sección:

 
     
  • Preséntate y cuenta tu historia.
    •  
  • Describe brevemente tu campaña y explica por qué es importante para ti.
    •  
  • Expresa la magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores.
    •  
 

Recuerda, sé breve pero personal. Pregúntate: si alguien dejara de leer aquí, ¿estaría listo para colaborar?

 
 
 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Presenta más detalles:

 
     
  • explica cuánto financiamiento necesitas y a dónde va. Sé transparente y específico, la gente necesita confiar en ti para que quiera financiarte.
    •  
  • Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!
    •  
  • Describe a dónde van los fondos si no logras la meta total.
    •  
 
 
 

El impacto

 

Explica tu campaña en mayor detalle y cuéntale a la gente la diferencia que hará su contribución:

 
     
  • explica por qué tu proyecto es valioso para el colaborador y para el mundo.
    •  
  • Describe tu historial de éxito en proyectos como este (si lo tienes).
    •  
  • Haz que la gente lo sienta real y genera confianza.
    •  
 
 
 

Riesgos y desafíos

 

Las personas valoran la transparencia. Sé abierto y destácate al ofrecer perspectivas sobre los riesgos y obstáculos que puedes enfrentar en el camino hacia lograr tu meta.

 
     
  • Comparte lo que hace que te destaques para superar estos obstáculos.
    •  
  • Describe tu plan para solucionar estos desafíos.
    •  
 
 
 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:

 
     
  • pídele a la gente que difunda tu campaña y que genere eco.
    •  
  • Recuérdales que usen las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.
    •  
 
 

Y eso es todo.

story:
¿Que es Printee?

Printee es una plataforma de impresión bajo demanda que nace de la idea que ayudar a artistas, emprendedores y apasionados del diseño para que puedan impulsar su marca a través de varios productos de consumo.

El proceso es sencillo: creas tu cuenta, elige los productos de nuestro catálogo para personalizar con tu diseño, establece el precio y ponlo disponible a la venta mediante nuestros distintos canales. Nosotros nos encargamos de producirlo y enviarlo a tu cliente cada vez que un pedido llegue. Sin costos iniciales,  sin inventario, sin riesgos. Solo pagas comisión cuando vendes.

Nos juntamos varios amantes de la personalización a darle forma a este proyecto y buscamos financiamiento para hacerlo realidad.

 

3 modelos de negocio en una misma plataforma

 

Con Printee puedes vender tu producto mediante nuestro marketplace de forma sencilla. Promueve tus productos publicados y recibe la ganancia de tus ventas a fin de mes. Tú eliges los precios de venta y así estableces tus comisiones.

Si ya posees una tienda en linea, puedes usar alguna de nuestras integraciones que estarán disponibles. De esta manera el pedido llega a nosotros para procesarlo y enviarlo a tu cliente. Los costos de producción son descontados en el momento de procesar el pedido. Fácil y cómodo.

En el caso que solo desees un lugar donde personalizar productos de forma ocasional o buscas un regalo original nuestro personalizador en línea es para ti: busca el producto que deseas personalizar, elige entre diseños ya existentes o sube el tuyo, ingresa tu datos de envío y paga de forma segura. En pocos días recibirás tu increíble producto. 

 

¿Qué necesitamos y qué obtendrás a cambio?

 

Printee basará su funcionamiento en dos tecnologías de impresión: la impresión directa a prenda (DTG) para ofrecer estampados sin límites de colores y de alta calidad en textiles (playeras, sudaderas, mandiles, etc) y la sublimación que permite llevar los diseños a tazas, carcazas de celulares y gorras, entre otros sustratos.

Queremos tener equipos profesionales que den resultados de calidad a nuestros clientes.

Además Printee como plataforma digital, necesita fondos para costear servidores de alto desempeño, que permitan que todo el proceso desde que publicas tu producto hasta que el cliente lo recibe, sea confiable y rápido.

Para motivar a nuestros colaboradores tenemos varias recompensas pensadas para todo tipo de posible usuario: desde él que solo quiere un producto personalizado hasta el creador que busca establecer su marca en el mercado.

Si ninguna recompensa es de tu agrado, pero quieres aportar al proyecto, el botón en la parte superior que dice "back it" te permite contribuir con el monto que gustes, estaremos super agradecidos.

Todas las recompensas tienen envío gratuito en toda la República Mexicana, una vez la campaña finalice exitosamente. Tranquilo, tu dinero esta seguro, solo lo recibiremos si somos fondeados al 100%, de otra manera se te será reembolsado en un lapso de 5 días.

Estaremos eternamente agradecidos por tu ayuda, y no te sorprendas si recibes alguna sorpresa adicional si el proyecto es todo un éxito en el financiamiento.

 

¿Alguna otra forma de ayudarnos?

 

Si no puedes ayudarnos financieramente sería genial para nosotros que corras la voz: comparte esta campaña en tus redes, háblale a tus amigos del proyecto y quizás alguno vea en Printee una oportunidad para construir su marca. Quizás tu vecina quiera crear playeras con memes de gatitos y nosotros seamos su solución ;)

 

El futuro de Printee

 

Tenemos muchas cosas pensadas si Printee se hace realidad: hacer crecer el catálogo de productos que puedas personalizar, agregar el servicio de bordado, envíos internacionales, ayudar a otros con campañas sociales.
 

Queremos que Printee sea la plataforma definitiva para la personalización de productos en México.

 

#CreaConPrintee
story_txt: ¿Que es Printee?Printee es una plataforma de impresión bajo demanda que nace de la idea que ayudar a artistas, emprendedores y apasionados del diseño para que puedan impulsar su marca a través de varios productos de consumo.El proceso es sencillo: creas tu cuenta, elige los productos de nuestro catálogo para personalizar con tu diseño, establece el precio y ponlo disponible a la venta mediante nuestros distintos canales. Nosotros nos encargamos de producirlo y enviarlo a tu cliente cada vez que un pedido llegue. Sin costos iniciales,  sin inventario, sin riesgos. Solo pagas comisión cuando vendes.Nos juntamos varios amantes de la personalización a darle forma a este proyecto y buscamos financiamiento para hacerlo realidad. 3 modelos de negocio en una misma plataforma Con Printee puedes vender tu producto mediante nuestro marketplace de forma sencilla. Promueve tus productos publicados y recibe la ganancia de tus ventas a fin de mes. Tú eliges los precios de venta y así estableces tus comisiones.Si ya posees una tienda en linea, puedes usar alguna de nuestras integraciones que estarán disponibles. De esta manera el pedido llega a nosotros para procesarlo y enviarlo a tu cliente. Los costos de producción son descontados en el momento de procesar el pedido. Fácil y cómodo.En el caso que solo desees un lugar donde personalizar productos de forma ocasional o buscas un regalo original nuestro personalizador en línea es para ti: busca el producto que deseas personalizar, elige entre diseños ya existentes o sube el tuyo, ingresa tu datos de envío y paga de forma segura. story:
Aazer.org is a web and mobile app where we fund together, decide together and work together.

Throughout our previous experiences working on self-organized solidarity aid initiatives, we invested so much time and energy building a supportive community but receiving money for our projects was always the hard to source and a problem to depend on.

The absence of fund is a huge wall for ours or any endeavour; it can stop students from pursuing their educational dreams or others from getting the healthcare they deserve, etc.


"We are sick and tired of the status quo and we believe we can make a difference"


At Aazer.org We believe in the power of people and we believe in the power of the collective.

And we are here to transform social aid in a totally revolutionary way to be directly from the people to the people.

No bureaucracy, no middle institutions, open access to sustainable growing fund and fair collective decision making.


The problem


We live in a world where everything is about money. We live in a world where money is favoured over Human Values.

As college tuition rates increase, the number one reason students give for leaving school is the lack of money.

The absence of money stops people from getting the healthcare they deserve.

Bureaucratic funding methods are not flexible to on-ground changes and difficult to access to dreamers who want to change the world.


The solution 


Bringing people globally in solidarity with each other, taking matters into our own hands, and supporting each other morally and financially.

We invest $1-25 each month in one single pool to support the people we care about each month.

The Aazer platform helps us generate a sustainable budget every month that is accessible to every member so that they can support their causes, beloved family members, friends, community or even themselves.

We have total control over the monthly budget and through a democratic voting process we collectively decide on how to use the monthly budget to develop ourselves and thrive.


This is what makes Aazer unique

Aazer is not another crowdfunding platform: The success of a crowdfunding campaign is based on the supportive community you have. Aazer is the other way around. The success of a campaign is no longer based on how rich your supporters are rather how important your project is. The money donated by the members of Aazer are also accessible to the members of Aazer

Aazer is truly independent - we fund together, we decide together, we help together, we own it.  This is why we truly succeed.  

Aazer is for the people and by the people - there are no middlemen institutions.

So from now on, whenever you decide to take an action to help someone, a community or even yourself, you will receive the moral and financial support you need


How Aazer works

This video shows you how Aazer works in 30 seconds



Members of the platform are the donors, voters, project proposals and project doers. We fund together, we decide together, we work together.


Step 1: When joining the platform and becoming a member, you commit to donating a small amount of money anywhere between $1 to 25 every month.


Step 2: All members are equally allowed to propose any social aid initiatives to be funded from the monthly budget.


Step 3: Through a democratic voting process, all the members will decide collectively on how to distribute the monthly budget on the proposed social aid initiatives.

Step 4: Money is then distributed on the top voted Solidarity aid initiatives until the money available this month is used.


Step 5: The process of proposing a solidarity aid initiatives as well as prioritising and assessing them is repeated on a monthly basis


The Impact you can create


Imagine a decentralised community of hundreds of thousands of members from all over the world uniting and coming together under the framework of Aazer to support each other morally and financially in a way that is democratic, flexible and sustainable.


As the number of the members increase every month we will end up reaching a critical mass that will indeed transform the life of people to the better. We will be able to support our beloved family members, friends, community and even ourselves.


- Students can start fresh and receive money to pay their student debt.

- Students can receive scholarships to pursue their educational dreams.

- People can receive the health care they deserve, regardless of how expensive it is.

- Dreamers and social activists can receive funds to develop their social projects.


Imagine the power of the people coming together, Imagine the number of people who will find relief, who will receive better healthcare, better education or other help and aid. Together there is nothing we can not do !


"We think globally and act locally"


How will your donations help


Stage 1 goal $25,000: We will technically develop the MVP for Aazer platform via a third party and finish legal registration.

Stage 2 goal $50,000: We will technically develop the Aazer platform via a  third party and finish the legal registration. We will be able to receive legal and business consultation and boost Aazer according to our marketing plan.

$50,000 and more: All the money we receive above our goal will be accessible on the platform as soon as we go live. Members of Aazer will have access to that money to fund their Solidarity aid initiatives.  

We expect to go live in February 2017, 


What you get from supporting our campaign


We decided not to distinguish between our supporters based on their donations so for now, we offer all our supporters the following perks:

  • Exclusive access to the platform
  • You will be listed as on the platform’s wall of fame
  • Your profile will be marked with a badge as one of the early supporters
  • You will be able to connect and link with early supporters and great minded people like you

Take the extra mile:

Your financial support will allow us to bring The Aazer platform online.

If you can’t support us financially,

  • Join us now NOW here.
  • Share, share and invite your friends to join us
  • Comment and tell us what kind of solidarity aid initiatives you would work on when Aazer goes live

Our previous victories


On ground campaigns

In 2014 we launched a crowd-funding campaign to supply a refugee camp with basic medical supplies. With the help of more than 100 donors from 14 different countries, we managed to collect more than $12,000, almost a whole year’s worth of medical supplies.

The campaign was successful because of the global financial support we have received and the effort exerted by volunteers to make it happen.

The following videos describe everything you need to know …


In 2013 we launched an on-ground funding campaign to supply a small town in Syria with a water well, we successfully raised $8,000 which helped to fund 25% of the whole project.

The following video is a short report on how the town conditions and the importance and implementation of the project.


Note: We used a very effective technique in our campaigns, Let me tell you a little secret

1-We don’t show up and tell people what to do.

2-We listen and try to give people the resources they need to implement the projects they find important.

3-The campaigns are initiated, funded and accomplished by regular individuals.


Aazer's Diary
We have been reaching out to amazing people and inviting them to share their thoughts, ideas and social projects on our Blog. Here are some blog posts you don’t want to miss.

  • At Hamtramck Soup, Solidarity is the Goal

  • What if we spend $12 million an hour on education and health care instead of this

  • No one chooses to be Homeless - The Story of a Catholic Worker

  • Support the Grassroot movement in Jerusalem

  • Why Solidarity matters on a Spiritual and Practical Level

  • The story of an Artist and Worker Owned Cooperative Enterprise

  • How volunteering on a campaign by Aazer changed my perspective towards militarization

  • US Wealth Inequality - How the Rich keep you poor

  • Solidarity is the natural state of humanity

  • Who best to fight against our day to day struggles than us

  • An open letter to the 99 percent

Professional experience


Aazer participated in The DO School program in Berlin. Ahmed participated in an intensive 2.5 months of entrepreneurial classes and workshops. Aazer also has 10 months mentorship and guidance from The DO School to bring the platform online.

Meet the founders

Ahmed Elsharkawy (Co-founder): Having founded several companies, Ahmed has the knowledge basically to run anything. If we have a problem he normally thinks about it and finds the solution in his dreams. Ahmed 

Saleh Elsayed (Co-founder): Has been organising and executing Aazer's solidarity aid initiatives. A former chemical engineer working in full capacity on Aazer.

FAQs

How do I know that someone won't try to "put" some money into his pocket?

let me add to your question and say, "how can I gain the trust of the rest of the members so they can vote to my action"

Through your “Credibility points”, it is part of a system implemented by Aazer that helps members know that their money is falling into the right hands and being used honestly, effectively, and efficiently.  It is a verifiable sign of trust that the person who proposed the action is credible. Like "Endorsement" on linkedIn or "References" on Couchsurfing .

You gain Credibility points from friends and members who credit you for your integrity, credibility, and honesty.

So don't try to risk your repetition by doing something stupid. Otherwise, all your network will know about it and then the whole world


Who will have access to the monthly budget?

Only members of the Aazer platform can have access to the monthly budget. Still every member is free to decide whether to ask for money to support himself or any other person among his network.

In other words, being a member will allow you to financially support your family, friends, your cause, your community or even yourself.

story:
Sexy Event Staffing

Sexy Event Staffing takes sexy to a whole other level with professional Bartenders, Servers, Shot Girls,GoGo Dancers, Hostesses, Promotional Models and all different types of Entertainment Acts including Burlesque Dancers, Hip Hop Dancers,Musicians, Singers, Stilt Walkers, Aerialists, Photographers, Dj's, Hula Hoop Performers,Impersonators and many other specialty acts, that help create a fun and tantalizing atmosphere. Our main goal is to add to an events atmosphere, increase exposure and revenue, and add an unforgettable experience for our guests. We cater to many private events,sporting events, poker parties, birthday parties, corporate parties, bachelor parties, clubs, lounges, weddings, and many other events throughout Los Angeles. 

About this project

Sexy Event Staffing is raising funds with IndieGogo to essentially get this staffing company up and running. As the Owner of Sexy Event Staffing, I have utilized all of our free services including craigslist ads, referrals, free ad listings, and word of mouth. Currently my only source of income comes from entertainment and service (gigs) being the key word, that I don't make steady money and unfortunately I am only making enough money to survive. I have already invested my life savings in to what I have been able to accomplish for this business thus far ,including a website and 500 business cards.  I will use all the donations for marketing purposes including Business Cards, Google Ads, Advertisement, Hiring Sales People,Portable Bars and much more. Whether you can donate,  spread the word, or even follow us on Instagram, Facebook and other social media, we appreciate all the help we can get.Thank you so much for taking the time out to check out our IndieGogo campaign.With your help, Sexy Event Staffing will become La's #1 Staffing Agency. :)  

Instagram: @SexyEventStaffing   @SusieRossWorld

Twitter:@SexyEventStaff                @SusieRossWorld

www.sexyeventstaffing.com

http://www.yelp.com/biz/sexy-event-staffing-los... 


Risks and challenges

Some of the risks of getting started is the fierce amount of competition already in Los Angeles for event staffing companies. It is always a challenge to start any sort of business when you know the market place is competitive. Since I have worked for many other event staffing companies here in LA, I have an advantage of knowing both their strengths and weaknesses so I'll be able to bring this knowledge to the table to help create an amazing event staffing company that is sure to provide quality wages to it's employees and brings a smile and sense of fulfillment to the customers we serve. I am up for the challenge and I appreciate you taking a leap of faith and putting your trust in me in order to make this dream become a reality.


Biography

Susie Ross is an Actress, Singer, Dancer, Choreographer, Teacher,Model, Bartender, Server, Bottle Server, Shot Girl,Gogo Dancer, Entreprenueur and Savy Business Woman.She was born and raised in New Jersey where she attained most of her street smarts as well as qualities that would inevitably make her the savvy business woman she is today. She then worked her way to New York City where she received her B.F.A in Musical Theatre and a Minor in both Marketing and Dance. While attending college, she was awarded the Friars Foundation Association Scholarship, a prestegious honor previously awarded to Elizabeth Taylor, Frank Sinatra, Irving Berlin, Billy Crystal and many more. She has been performing for 24 yrs of her life and professionally working for 9 of those yrs in the entertainment world. Some of her past credits include, touring and singing all over Europe in 10 countries - 70 cities within those countries, working with Missy Elliot, Naughty By Nature, summer stock-regional theatre, and much more. 
Susie has also accomplished great heights in the service industry, working as a Bartender, Bottle Server,Server, Hostess , and Shot girl in both New York City and La in clubs, lounges, bars, restaurants, fine dining and event companies for 10 yrs of her life now. She knows the ins and outs for providing great service for her customers as well as also being knowledgeable of many types of beverages including wines, liquors, spirits and mixology. She received her Bartenders License from New York City as well as her Food Handler Certification from LA. 
Who better then to run a staffing business to make sure all clients needs are met, then someone who has many years of experience in the entertaining and service industry.Susie Ross continues to improve on her skills both in the entertainment world as well as the service industry and with your help, believes she can accomplish her next goal of having a very successful event staffing business.
