I am up for the challenge and I appreciate you taking a leap of faith and putting your trust in me in order to make this dream become a reality.

Biography
Susie Ross is an Actress, Singer, Dancer, Choreographer, Teacher,Model, Bartender, Server, Bottle Server, Shot Girl,Gogo Dancer, Entreprenueur and Savy Business Woman.She was born and raised in New Jersey where she attained most of her street smarts as well as qualities that would inevitably make her the savvy business woman she is today. She then worked her way to New York City where she received her B.F.A in Musical Theatre and a Minor in both Marketing and Dance. While attending college, she was awarded the Friars Foundation Association Scholarship, a prestegious honor previously awarded to Elizabeth Taylor, Frank Sinatra, Irving Berlin, Billy Crystal and many more. She has been performing for 24 yrs of her life and professionally working for 9 of those yrs in the entertainment world. Some of her past credits include, touring and singing all over Europe in 10 countries - 70 cities within those countries, working with Missy Elliot, Naughty By Nature, summer stock-regional theatre, and much more. Susie has also accomplished great heights in the service industry, working as a Bartender, Bottle Server,Server, Hostess , and Shot girl in both New York City and La in clubs, lounges, bars, restaurants, fine dining and event companies for 10 yrs of her life now. She knows the ins and outs for providing great service for her customers as well as also being knowledgeable of many types of beverages including wines, liquors, spirits and mixology. She received her Bartenders License from New York City as well as her Food Handler Certification from LA. Who better then to run a staffing business to make sure all clients needs are met, then someone who has many years of experience in the entertaining and service industry.Susie Ross continues to improve on her skills both in the entertainment world as well as the service industry and with your help, believes she can accomplish her next goal of having a very successful event staffing business.

story:
Hi! I'm Jacqueline.

My first job was with one of those summer work programs when I was 16. Every year after that, I always worked at some time. I liked working and, luckily, there was never a year that passed when I was unemployed for that whole year. For me, that was what life was about. Working, studying, and enjoying my youth because as I got older it would be just about working. Sure, I saw a family in my future but in my mind I would always be a working mom.

Fast forward many years and I realized life wasn't just about working. Some of the jobs I had drained me physically but a lot of them also drained me mentally and emotionally. I liked working, but the jobs I held didn't make me happy. I worked as a receptionist, sales attendant, cashier, nail technician, waitress, camp teacher's assistant, clerical assistant, embarkation officer, interpreter, operations manager, and I can't remember what else, but they all made me feel that something was missing from my life.

Fast forward some more years (and life lessons) and I found myself with a job that some may not have thought as a "success"-type of employment, but I felt less stressed and I smiled more often. It was the first job I ever had that I could smile and say "I love my job" and actually mean it.

It's why, after having my rainbow baby and being allowed to take him to work with me, I cried like a child when I resigned. The stress (and tropical heat) I was putting my newborn through getting to work and back (on public transportation and walking) was too much for my heart to handle. I made the tough decision of becoming a stay-at-home-mom....and it has been the second best decision I've ever made (the first being becoming a mom).I've been a SAHM for some time now and I have loved every minute of it. I have been able to see every second of my king as he's grown and every day he surprises me with something new.

What I Would Like To Do

I have always loved creating and after studying patternmaking after high school, I started exploring making other accessories. After becoming a SAHM, I realized I could dedicate nap time to creating and just making the ideas in my head into tangible things as well as looking into new techniques and medium. Now that my king is older, I feel like it's the right time to launch this business idea that's been going around in my head for such a long time. I've come up with different accessory ideas and have gotten the necessary information for some of those, but I think the best way to start is to start small.

Originally organized in the 1950s by a priest of the San José Church (to celebrate Saint Sebastian's feast day, raise funds for the parish, and restore San Sebastián Street), the "Fiestas de la calle San Sebastián" (San Sebastián Street Festival) is nowadays mostly known as the celebration that ends the Christmas holiday season. It is an annual 4-day event celebrated during the third weekend in January from Thursday to Sunday. It begins with the traditional mass dedicated to Saint Sebastian and includes other traditional festivities such as the "cabezudos" parade and traditional dancing. There's food, music, AND artisans selling their wares...and I think it's also the perfect place to launch.

What I Need & What You Get With Your Contribution

Because I would need stock to sell at the festival, most of the funds raised through this campaign will be used for inventory and replacement of nicked tools and equipment. I also need to register the business and pay the fees related to selling at the "Fiestas de la calle San Sebastián".

To show my appreciation for your contribution, I would like to share with you some of the items I have made that have been most liked by my friends and family as well as a couple of extra things some others have mentioned interest in.


The Impact

If I'm able to sell at the FCSS, it would be another check on my vision board. I know that it would be a step in the right direction to starting my home-based business, which is something I dream of just so that I can work "with my baby on my hip". The reason I am so intent on starting this business is because I would like to create a sustainable business that my king could be a part of and with your support I am pretty sure I can achieve that.

What Are the Risks & Challenges?

Like every business, no one can guarantee success. (Actually that goes true for everything in life, really.) But, being able to sell at this festival I can come in contact with my ideal customer and speak with them face to face. This will allow me to understand if I am not meeting their wants when it comes to fun eclectic accessories and if I am not, I can take that feedback and make adjustments to future items.

Can't Contribute?

I've been there and totally understand. It doesn't mean you can't help, though. You can spread the word of my campaign to your friends, family...anyone. You can spread the word by:

  • using the Facebook, Twitter, and Google+ buttons on the top left to share my campaign on these social media sites,
  • using the iframe embed code on the left to share it on your site or blog, and/or
  • sharing the link (from the link button) through email, signatures, or any other way!

You can also click on the heart button so that you can follow this campaign and get notified of updates.

No matter how you help, I want you to know I appreciate it.

Thank you,

Jacqueline

story:
Our Mission

What doityourselflegaldocs.com does for the online legal services industry is break away from the cookie cutter style fill in the blanks legal documents that you recognize in the industry today.


Do It Yourself Legal Docs has reverse engineered the business model of its competitors, and the company's software will offer a more comprehensively customized legal document in the areas of business formation, estate planning, and consumer Chapter 7 Bankruptcy. Each document that a customer receives from doityourselflegaldocs.com will be specific to the needs of the individual consumer.

In the area of bankruptcy, Do It Yourself Legal Docs will offer complete consumer Chapter 7 Bankruptcy software that will identify the property exemptions for the State a customer resides in, without having to research any Federal Bankruptcy Codes or State Statutes. Do It Yourself Legal Docs will also provide links for consumer credit counseling courses which every debtor must take before filing bankruptcy. Doityourselflegaldocs.com will provide step by step virtual customer service assistance as well as real time professional legal assistance.

Doityourselflegaldocs.com is confident it will offer its customers a new and innovating way online legal documents and services are delivered to the public.

With financial instability still looming in the United States, I have dedicated the better part of twenty years to helping clients restore their businesses through the bankruptcy process and secure a future for their families through estate planning. doityourselflegaldocs.com will consolidate all of these functions into one website with an interactive customer service platform.

We are currently in the final design and development phase for our website. We need backers to help us complete this phase and launch our website. Contributions will go directly into development and marketing.

The idea that an online legal site can only provide fill-in-the-blank forms is completely outdated, today, multiple online legal sites give people the option of do-it-yourself or a technology enabled, attorney assisted service. Our own online process will work like Turbo Tax, where a customer answers a series of questions in an online interview, and that information is used to create a personalized last will. In most states, customers can have the will reviewed by a licensed attorney at no additional cost."

For middle income families, the high price of legal advice can provide a convenient excuse to put off something that nobody wants to think about anyway. Only about half of people earning less than $75,000 a year have a will, compared with about 64 percent of people with higher incomes. 

Many experts say that do-it-yourself estate planning is best suited for people with estates worth less than $2 million, the amount at which federal estate tax kicks in, and for people who are in first marriages with simple family situations.

 

doityourselflegaldocs.com will provide thousands of low cost legal documents with software that gives simple instructions that can help consumers navigate the documents.

How The Contributions Will Be Used

We are currently in the final design and development phase for our website. We need backers to help us complete this phase and launch our website. Contributions will go directly into development and marketing. Once our campaign goal has been reach there will be weekly updates to all of our backers via email and invitations for scheduled Skype meetings on the progress of our website and marketing campaign before its official launch date, the funds will utilized as follows:

  1. We have employed website engineers that will be able to develop a comparable industry standard online legal documents and services company.
  2. Our company will launch a massive national grassroots marketing campaign including podcasts, small independent radio time slots, Internet blogs, and business and estate planning workshops.
  3. Our software builders will have an integrated design which allows itself to constantly update and keep pace with the current law in all fifty states.

Documents Offered By Our Company

These are only a limited amount of documents and services that will be available in all 50 states.

Exciting Promotional Perks

Men's T-shirts

Women's T-shirts

Tote Bags

Back Packs

Wool and Leather Letterman Jacket

Mouse Pads

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to our campaign, you can help out by sharing our URL on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platform you may use. The more people know about Do It Yourself Legal Docs the better our chances will be for reaching our funding goal.

With our combined experience in the legal industry, we are confident that with the right level of funding, we can make this work.

PLEASE GET THE WORD OUT!

 

Thank You!

Thank you so from the bottom of our full hearts for your support. For the last two years, our concept and our programs have been proven as a model of success to drive and grow the entrepreneurial community in Scottsdale, Arizona. With your help, we can make exponential impact. Together.

story:
Please watch our mission video if you haven't already. It explains everything about Cellideli and what we stand for... this way you can spend less time reading and more time changing the world. Thank you!


Our Story 

Cellideli was founded in August of 2015 with the intention to make the world a better place, even if it was only a little bit better. We love people and we love technology so we combined the two and decided to make a working business out of it. We made feeding people in need the core of Cellideli's mission because we feel that the world doesn't need another company without a heart. We also wanted to create something that was much greater than ourselves, and to inspire others to do the same.

Our Mission

Our mission is to bridge the gap between for-profit and non-profit organizations. We want to prove to other companies that it is possible to run a successful for-profit company while also acting as a non-profit in the sense that the main goal of the company is to help others, not just make a buck. We dream of a world where companies are no longer measured by how much money they make but by how much of that money they invest in helping others live.

Why We Need Your Help?

We have created this campaign because we need a little help to get our company off the ground and help spread the word about our service because we don't have enough funds to educate the public about us, not to mention educating them on the cell phone recommerce industry as a whole. Other companies in our field spend hundreds of thousands and sometimes millions of dollars on advertising each year. Since we don't have that kind of money to throw around, we need your contribution to help us grow and to inform people through social media word of mouth about our service and our mission. We also knew that Indiegogo is a great opportunity for real, genuine people like you, to contribute to and stand behind the projects and causes that are important to them.


Stay tuned, we will be adding more pictures and posting an FAQ section which will hopefully answer all of the questions you may have.

story:
The need for safety of our families gave birth to an innovative idea.

We are Blast Lab - a company from Tri-City in Poland specializing in mobile applications, machine-to-machine communication and the Internet of Things. Our strong sides are the R & D and innovation. Our team was created by two doctors of physics at the beginning of 2013 and currently consists of eight enthusiasts, lovers of technology.

Who we are?

In addition to passion for technology we are just human beings. We love our families, without which we cannot imagine everyday functioning. Our wives and children are the most important for us and the time spent together we want to utilize fully without undue stress, pressure, and fear.

For us, busy fathers, the end of August is the perfect time to plan family vacation. Because we live by the Baltic Sea what we fear the most is loosing the sight of our kids at a crowded beach. 

Losing children out of sight is one of the main and most serious problems during family trips. Most of the missing kids happily find their parents but stress and fear for a long time remain in memory and prevents you from spending your holiday in a peaceful atmosphere.

Therefore, as we would like to make life easier and more enjoyable to all those who care about the safety of their family members, we began intensive work on the ideal solution ...

What have we done?

Useing the power of our knowledge and experience in technology and boundless love for children, we set ourselves the objective of creating smart solutions that provide:

  • Reliability
  • Functionality
  • Usefulness
  • Simplicity in use
  • Guarantee of quality

It had taken us months of hard and intensive work, multiple tests and a studies of various materials until we have developed something that is missing in the market for a long time ...

We introduce to you Kiddo bracelets – bracelets which connect a parent and a child in a way that prevents the child to move far away from the guardian.

With Kiddo Family your child can explore the magical mysteries of this world and you get a well-deserved stress-free relaxation.

Our solution has already impressed the participants of the trade conference who proclaimed Kiddo to be a promising product:

How did we do it?

The bracelets contain a hidden communication module with Bluetooth 4.2, vibration and long battery life.

 

Once configured, using a special mobile application, bracelets communicate with each other in two alternative modes: silent or alarming.

Who did we do it for ?

Innovative Kiddo bracelets were originally designed for parents. Over time and product development, we discovered that we have created the ideal solution for anyone who spends time with a child or larger group of children.

Our target groups are:

  • Parents
  • Principals and teachers of schools
  • Caregivers / Nannies
  • Educators at camps and colonies
  • Trainers

  • All those for whom safety is important

We made the members of  Gdańsk City Council interested in Kiddo bracelets! We believe that we should ensure safety of the young residents of Gdańsk from every possible side.

How does it work?

The principle of using Kiddo is childishly simple: you get a set of two bracelets, one for you and one for your child. Then you install the application on your smartphone and set accepted by you, safe distance. At this point, you are hiding the phone and enjoy the time with your child. At the time, the child gets too far, the bracelet automatically responds, and you are able to immediately check the location of your offspring. Simple, isn't it? And stress-free.

Kiddo application also Allows for the registration of additional bracelets, e.g. the other parent or child. This way, you can expand your network and keep in touch with the whole family.

Kiddo is also communicated with the so-called social GPS. This means that when a child disappears, you can quickly send a message to your friends in the area using social media and notify the nearest services. Everything is done to act immediately and effectively.

Intelligent bracelets will notify you of a low battery level. You can charge it with POWERBANK or the USB port on your computer.

Kiddo bracelets are designed in a minimalistic  style. Studio Manycolors and Razy2 group from Gdynia are responsible for the design. The designers made sure that special waterproof fasteners will prevent the child from easy removal of the bracelet. and Razy2 group from Gdynia are responsible for the design. 

 

Advantages of Kiddo Family

  • Reliable system that controls the distance that the child can walk away from a parent or guardian
  • Simplicity of use, without any complicated gadgets
  • Functional clasp which will prevent loss of bracelets by the child
  • Robust certified materials
  • Waterproof construction, which will allow each child's activity, also swimming and bathing in the sea

In addition to the above, Kiddo Family enables you to:

  • Expand the network of Kiddo users by adding additional bracelets
  • Inform the dismissal of the child in soInform about the disapearance of a child in social media (ie. Social GPS)
  • Contact with other Kiddo users who are close
  • Individual settings of alarm options (day / night)
  • Quick connection to emergency services

 

When and how can you get started?

Here comes the magic answer: nine months.
Just like the parents expect their babyy, so we plan to give birth to the first series of bracelets Kiddo Family just nine months.

To bring the product to you, we need to gather

650 000$*

* to produce 5000 sets of Kiddo Family (each set includes two bracelets)

With the standard set, you will receive a set of two bracelets, charger, and clear instructions.

Pricing:

Kiddo Family Standard: 199 $

Only for the first group of customers:

  • x600 Early Birds: Kiddo Family standard 20% cheaper!
  • x500 Early Birds: Kiddo Family Premium: 3 bracelets in the set for 269$!

Join the elite group of early users of Kiddo bracelets and start the safer and less stressful phase in your life! We create and propagate Kiddo network for children to  explore the world without any risk of getting lost.

By supporting us, you are participating in the birth of something beautiful. You open up to the world, full of children's fascination with discovery and magic. You let yourself and your children spend time together on the search for unforgettable adventures. 

Join us - you and your dear ones

FAQ

How much Kiddos can I connect into one children-controlling system?

Currently up to 18 Kiddos can be connected in one system to support security of a group of children and their teachers

How much does it take to fully charge Kiddo?

Up to 4 hours. We are working on application of fast charging system to reduce this time.

Is Kiddo water-proof?

Yes, Kiddo is a water-proof device.

Do I have to have a smartphone in my pocket all the time to use Kiddo?

If you have more than 3 Kiddos connected, we recommend to have a smartphone close to you, because Kiddo app would give you a specific notification which “user” (kid) is currently going out of the safe distance.

How would I know which child went missing, if there would be 15 kids with Kiddo bands on their wrists?

You would get a specific information about kid, which went missing on your smartphone.

Do I need Internet connection to use Kiddo?

No, you don’t need Internet connection to use Kiddo.

When will the app be delivered?

During the development process we will publish screenshots of the app. It will be published before delivery of the bands.

What is included in my Kiddo set?

In your Kiddo set, you would get amount of devices, which you ordered, charger and red bands.

Can I change colour of my wristband?

Yes, you can. Check out our “Kiddo extras” perk, which gives you possibility to order band in black, pink and mint colour.

Where would you ship Kiddo sets?

Kiddo will ship to any country in the world, if not limited by its internal politics.

Do you have working prototype?

Yes, we have a working prototype.

How can I reach the team?

Simply by email contact@kiddo.family. Also you can reach us on Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn. You are more than welcome to leave us your feedback about Kiddo.

I’m having trouble making a contribution. What should I do?

Email support@indiegogo.com
story_txt:
The need for safety of our families gave birth to an innovative idea.We are Blast Lab - a company from Tri-City in Poland specializing in mobile applications, machine-to-machine communication and the Internet of Things. Our strong sides are the R & D and innovation. Our team was created by two doctors of physics at the beginning of 2013 and currently consists of eight enthusiasts, lovers of technology.Who we are?In addition to passion for technology we are just human beings. We love our families, without which we cannot imagine everyday functioning. Our wives and children are the most important for us and the time spent together we want to utilize fully without undue stress, pressure, and fear.For us, busy fathers, the end of August is the perfect time to plan family vacation. Because we live by the Baltic Sea what we fear the most is loosing the sight of our kids at a crowded beach. Losing children out of sight is one of the main and most serious problems during family trips. Most of the missing kids happily find their parents but stress and fear for a long time remain in memory and prevents you from spending your holiday in a peaceful atmosphere.Therefore, as we would like to make life easier and more enjoyable to all those who care about the safety of their family members, we began intensive work on the ideal solution ...What have we done?Useing the power of our knowledge and experience in technology and boundless love for children, we set ourselves the objective of creating smart solutions that provide:
Reliability
Functionality
Usefulness
Simplicity in use
Guarantee of quality
It had taken us months of hard and intensive work, multiple tests and a studies of various materials until we have developed something that is missing in the market for a long time ...We introduce to you Kiddo bracelets – bracelets which connect a parent and a child in a way that prevents the child to move far away from the guardian.With Kiddo Family your child can explore the magical mysteries of this world and you get a well-deserved stress-free relaxation.Our solution has already impressed the participants of the trade conference who proclaimed Kiddo to be a promising product:How did we do it?The bracelets contain a hidden communication module with Bluetooth 4.2, vibration and long battery life. Once configured, using a special mobile application, bracelets communicate with each other in two alternative modes: silent or alarming.Who did we do it for ?Innovative Kiddo bracelets were originally designed for parents. Over time and product development, we discovered that we have created the ideal solution for anyone who spends time with a child or larger group of children.Our target groups are:
Parents
Principals and teachers of schools
Caregivers / Nannies
Educators at camps and colonies
Trainers
All those for whom safety is important
We made the members of  Gdańsk City Council interested in Kiddo bracelets! We believe that we should ensure safety of the young residents of Gdańsk from every possible side.How does it work?The principle of using Kiddo is childishly simple: you get a set of two bracelets, one for you and one for your child. Then you install the application on your smartphone and set accepted by you, safe distance. At this point, you are hiding the phone and enjoy the time with your child. At the time, the child gets too far, the bracelet automatically responds, and you are able to immediately check the location of your offspring. Simple, isn't it? And stress-free.Kiddo application also Allows for the registration of additional bracelets, e.g. the other parent or child. This way, you can expand your network and keep in touch with the whole family.Kiddo is also communicated with the so-called social GPS. This means that when a child disappears, you can quickly send a message to your friends in the area using social media and notify the nearest services. Everything is done to act immediately and effectively.Intelligent bracelets will notify you of a low battery level. You can charge it with POWERBANK or the USB port on your computer.Kiddo bracelets are designed in a minimalistic  style. Studio Manycolors and Razy2 group from Gdynia are responsible for the design. The designers made sure that special waterproof fasteners will prevent the child from easy removal of the bracelet. and Razy2 group from Gdynia are responsible for the design.  Advantages of Kiddo Family
Reliable system that controls the distance that the child can walk away from a parent or guardian
Simplicity of use, without any complicated gadgets
Functional clasp which will prevent loss of bracelets by the child
Robust certified materials
Waterproof construction, which will allow each child's activity, also swimming and bathing in the sea
In addition to the above, Kiddo Family enables you to:
Expand the network of Kiddo users by adding additional bracelets
Inform the dismissal of the child in soInform about the disapearance of a child in social media (ie. Social GPS)
Contact with other Kiddo users who are close
Individual settings of alarm options (day / night)
Quick connection to emergency services
 When and how can you get started?Here comes the magic answer: nine months.Just like the parents expect their babyy, so we plan to give birth to the first series of bracelets Kiddo Family just nine months.To bring the product to you, we need to gather650 000$** to produce 5000 sets of Kiddo Family (each set includes two bracelets)With the standard set, you will receive a set of two bracelets, charger, and clear instructions.Pricing:Kiddo Family Standard: 199 $Only for the first group of customers:

x600 Early Birds: Kiddo Family standard 20% cheaper!


x500 Early Birds: Kiddo Family Premium: 3 bracelets in the set for 269$!

Join the elite group of early users of Kiddo bracelets and start the safer and less stressful phase in your life! We create and propagate Kiddo network for children to  explore the world without any risk of getting lost.By supporting us, you are participating in the birth of something beautiful. You open up to the world, full of children's fascination with discovery and magic. You let yourself and your children spend time together on the search for unforgettable adventures. Join us - you and your dear ones FAQHow much Kiddos can I connect into one children-controlling system?Currently up to 18 Kiddos can be connected in one system to support security of a group of children and their teachersHow much does it take to fully charge Kiddo?Up to 4 hours. We are working on application of fast charging system to reduce this time.Is Kiddo water-proof?Yes, Kiddo is a water-proof device.Do I have to have a smartphone in my pocket all the time to use Kiddo?If you have more than 3 Kiddos connected, we recommend to have a smartphone close to you, because Kiddo app would give you a specific notification which “user” (kid) is currently going out of the safe distance.How would I know which child went missing, if there would be 15 kids with Kiddo bands on their wrists?You would get a specific information about kid, which went missing on your smartphone.Do I need Internet connection to use Kiddo?No, you don’t need Internet connection to use Kiddo.When will the app be delivered?During the development process we will publish screenshots of the app. It will be published before delivery of the bands.What is included in my Kiddo set?In your Kiddo set, you would get amount of devices, which you ordered, charger and red bands.Can I change colour of my wristband?Yes, you can. Check out our “Kiddo extras” perk, which gives you possibility to order band in black, pink and mint colour.Where would you ship Kiddo sets?Kiddo will ship to any country in the world, if not limited by its internal politics.Do you have working prototype?Yes, we have a working prototype.How can I reach the team?Simply by email contact@kiddo.family. Also you can reach us on Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn. You are more than welcome to leave us your feedback about Kiddo.I’m having trouble making a contribution. What should I do?Email support@indiegogo.com

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm senior UI/UX designer and front-end developer doing freelancing at upwork for more than 4 years http://sheikh-designs.com/.
  • I'm thinking to launch a combination of 99designs and fiverr where users will get design ideas at only $5. Each contest will end in one day http://www.fiverrcontest.com/ (The project is still under construction).
  • I'm seeking contributors where the money raised from the fund will be disposed off in hiring a developer, a designer, and CEO (Who will make that idea happen).

What I Need & What You Get

Breaking it down for you guys in more detail:

  • I'm seeking around $25,000 where the money will go in salaries of above mentioned employees to bring that startup to life.
  • People contributing $25 will be able to launch 5 contests of $5 each.
  • Version 1 of that site will be launched in 3 months after fundraising and I'm liable in giving back you all the money if v1 doesn't launch within the deadline.

The Impact

Here is more explanation about my campaign, so that you guys know the difference your contribution will make:

  • That project is beneficial for you as I described above and as described in perks. Contest holders will get quick design ideas in one day for only $5. Those quick ideas may get matured by hiring some another designer from the community or some other designer around the world. The basic purpose of this app is to quickly generate design ideas.
  • The community of freelancers will get some quick money, practice, mature their skills and be able to create a good portfolio without worrying about getting a client.
  • That project is under construction here http://www.fiverrcontest.com/ and we have implemented contest script and payment gateway to some extent.
  • Please note these contests basic purpose will be idea generation only. So if a designer comes up with very good, professional and finished design, that will be a plus point.

Risks & Challenges

I understand that you value the transparency. I'm open and providing you insights into the risks and obstacles I'm facing on the way to achieving the goal.

  • The biggest challenge I'm facing is, I'm not able to arrange the time to bring that idea to life as I'm working full-time as a freelancer.
  • I've planned to bring some full-time guys to bring this idea to life. Those guys will be from UI/UX, back-end programming and administration fields. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can't help with raising money, please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

And that's all there is to it.


I'm cancelling this project

As I didn't get good response from the community. I'm going to cancel this project and contributors will get their money back. Thanks for your support.


Thanks for reading.

Sheikh Naveed

story:
Hi!

Some of you know me as your cousin, coworker, or that quirky friend from Florida. Most of you know me as your barista. You've told me you secretly look forward to seeing me behind the bar, making your cappuccino. I have tell you, the feeling’s mutual. Making coffee is how I've made nearly every friend from the east coast to the west and back. I met my boyfriend at a coffee shop. The first place we took our baby boy was out for coffee. Even our secret code word for “I love you” is synonymous with a coffee washing station in the Kochere region of Africa. What can I say, I love coffee. I love my family. I love you too. So much so that I cannot divide my time among the three. This is where you come in. Please help me start YAY COFFEE.

YAY COFFEE is a woman owned bicycle cafe serving coffee wherever coffee is needed. That’s right, I’ll be brewing coffee on a bike. I might even pedal a cup over to you because some days you just need coffee that bad.

YAY COFFEE plans to do serious coffee, in a seriously fun way. You can expect cold brew on draft. There will be sprinkles. I also have extra fun surprises in store for y’all. Oh yes!

I’m excited to participate in the uniquely Gainesville events such as Active Streets, the Fest, et cetera. I can’t wait to bring coffee to your bicycle race, company picnic, you name it.

By supporting YAY COFFEE, you will be promoting

tiny business
empowering women
cycling
creativity and camaraderie
YAY!

How can you help?

There are many ways! The most helpful way would be through a donation. The sooner I raise the funds, the closer I’ll be to making you coffee. Donated time is always appreciated! YAY COFFEE could always use help with that special thing that you do; such as bike maintenance, graphic design, or even baby holding.

Where does the money go?
General breakdown of start up costs:

Bicycle $1,600
Custom coffee cart build out $600
Commercial kitchen space $500
Coffee brewing/serving equipment $3,000
Florida state permits $500
Marketing $600
Point of sale system $200
Misc (the little stuff adds up) $?!
= $7,000 

Thank you!
Everyone, thank you so much for your support and encouragement! I couldn't have done this without you. Now please share this campaign with your all of your eccentric friends. See you on the road!

XOXO, 
Aly

story:
What is it About?

NewMan's Business Accelerator was founded 3 years ago by Irena Chaushevska, a thirty-something female entrepreneur in search for freedom and opportunity one to create and accomplish great things STARTING FROM ANYWHERE only with the resources he/she have. 

She set NewMan's primary offices in her home country - Macedonia. Macedonia is a small country in South Eastern Europe where 90% of the young people speak English, science and technology are among the favourite subjects at school and robotics competitions one of the most attended. However, the number of completed tech products coming especially from the younger generations is very low, primarily due to lack of equipment and funding.

Irena traveled to US for a first time only 1,5 years before opening of NewMan's where she managed to set up meetings with representatives from JPL of NASA and NASA Ames Research Center, and now for the last 3 years she acts as a Local Lead for Skopje (Macedonia) at the world biggest mass collaboration hackathon NASA Space Apps Challenge. The event takes place in around 170 cities around the world with a goal of producing relevant open-source solutions to address global needs applicable to both life on Earth and in Space.

The results and benefits from the event in the country are far beyond anything Irena could imagine. 

Skopje became the city with highest number of projects worldwide in 2014, 3 more cities from the country (Tetovo, Bitola and Ohrid) and 8 more from the region (Belgrade, Tirana, Pristina, Zagreb, Cluj, Ljubljana, Koper and Vienna) joined the event in 2015 and 2016 and this year one of the Skopje teams - AVIS was pre-selected among the TOP 25 by NASA judges in the People's choice category and it is fighting for the 1st place in this moment. Read more for this project at Medium "How a team of high schoolers reverse engineered a fitness trackers to control a drone?"


But what is more important is that through this event Irena managed to accomplish her initial idea - a young people from this region to start believe that they can do GREAT & MEANINGFUL THINGS same as their peers from much more developed countries!!!


Why a Prototyping Laboratory?

Although the teams are achieving great results they don't have where and with what to continue to develop their projects into real life products in order to offer them to the local and global markets. They need fully functional prototyping laboratory along with tools and materials for research, development and testing.

Irena strongly believes that this young people deserve a creative and functional place where they will be able to come and build together... all with different backgrounds, from different universities and high schools, with different personal stories, to be able to build together around the year same as they do for the 48 hours during the NASA Space Apps Challenge hackathon. 

Irena wants the shine in their eyes and the smile on their faces to sparkle all year long, but also to help them to get off the ground their own start-up projects and companies more easily. This is a project that will benefit many young people from the country on a short run but also the country economy as a whole on a long run.


Why We Need Funding?

NewMan's will dedicate its full ground floor and backyard for this cause and will provide technical and initial mentoring and ongoing technical support for the teams, but the funds needed to build and equip a modern and competitive prototyping laboratory are much more than NewMan's or the students can afford. NewMan's is self-funded by selling entrepreneurship and job-specific trainings and it is not using any government or EU funds support.

The products that will be built within the Prototyping Laboratory with the funds received from this campaign will be sole ownership of the individuals and teams that created them and NewMan's will not have any ownership in them coming from the campaign funds.

The campaign funds will be sufficient to cover the costs for equipment, utilities and operating supplies for period of 2 years when the teams should become able to contribute small amounts on a monthly basis toward the utilities and the operating supplies costs. If there is a need for further purchase of a new equipment NewMan's will make sure to identify additional opportunities and solutions in future.

Here is how the ground floor looks like now:


The Impact

  1. Around 1000 young people (mainly High School and University Students) would be able to benefit from the Prototyping Laboratory during 2 years period, to practice Design thinking methodologies, to Research, Prototype and Innovate. 
  2. The best 7 of them accompanied by the NewMan's team will travel to the Silicon Valley to meet peers from the School of Mechanical Engineering and d-School at Stanford University and to learn about their Prototyping and Product development practices, but also to showcase their products in front of big tech companies and potential investors, and than transfer the lessons learned back to their peers in Macedonia.
  3. Some of all these young people will eventually create fully functional  and profitable products and will build their businesses, their lives and maybe even this country economy around them!
  4. NewMan's will involve the users of the Prototyping Laboratory to develop together a business model beyond the 24 months period in order to continue to deliver benefits to the community.


Why Fixed Funding?

We could easily chose Flexible funding and walkaway with whatever we raise. But we don't work like that. We don't want to get into situation of raising only 20.000 or 30.000 $ and being asked by the public to build the Prototyping Laboratory anyway... We don't want to make off with your money with no hope of delivering on our promises neither to you - our contributors, neither to the one for whom we are doing this. It makes no sense to us. 
Here is our Indiegogo budget breakdown (66.000$ in total):
  • 5.200$ for Prototyping Laboratory interior and office equipment
  • 20.000$ for Prototyping Laboratory working equipment
  • 7.200$ for Prototyping Laboratory operating supplies for 24 months
  • 16.800$ for 7 people for travel and accommodation in USA for 2 weeks
  • 7.200$ for utilities for 24 months
  • 3.600$ for snacks and representation costs for 24 months
  • 6.000$ for the Indiegogo and bank transaction fees to receive the collected money
We can not do it with less than 66.000$. So if we raise less in total, we will release all your money back.

NewMan's contribution budget breakdown (32.000$ in total):

  • 15.000$ for rent of the Prototyping Laboratory space for 24 months
  • 17.000$ for a salary of 1 full-time employee in the Prototyping Laboratory who will provide technical support for the users, will help them operate with the equipment and will manage the operating supplies.


Perks - What do YOU GET if you Contribute?

  • $10,000 - Honorary ProttoLab Patron (only 3 available) - Engraved Plaque featuring you as a Honorary ProttoLab Patron.
  • $5,000 - Honorary VC Founder - Written acknowledgment of you as Honorary VC Founder signed by the Prototyping Laboratory team.
  • $3,000 - Corporate Corner (only 3 available) - Branded corporate corner within our Prototyping Laboratory where you can showcase your tools, products or technology and/or identify and recruit great talent!
  • $2,000 - Honorary Angel Founder - Written acknowledgment of you as Honorary Angel Founder signed by the Prototyping Laboratory team.
  • $1,000 - Honorary Seed Founder - Written acknowledgment of you as Honorary Seed Founder signed by the Prototyping Laboratory team.
  • $500 - Big Wall of Fame Star & T-Shirt - Personalised Thank you Star at the Wall of fame at the entrance of the Prototyping Laboratory and special T-Shirt!
  • $300 - Wall of Fame Star - Personalised Thank you Star at the Wall of fame at the entrance of the Prototyping Laboratory! 
  • $200 - Novel: "I AM ENOUGH" (only 70 available) - Signed copy of the 1st edition of the Novel "I am Enough" by Irena N. Chaushevska... Limited Unedited Hard Cover copy! eBook available in meantime by August 2016 upon your request. 

Check more at: https://www.facebook.com/NovelIAmEnough
  • $100 - Social Media Thank you Story - Acknowledgment of your contribution via social media (Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter) and Personalised Pin at the Prototyping Laboratory web page!
  • $50 - Pin at Webpage - Personalised Pin at the Prototyping Laboratory web page featuring your contribution!
  • $25 - Thank You eNote - Personalised Thank you eNote signed by the NewMan's Prototyping Laboratory team!
  • $10 - Good vibes - We'll send you good vibes and wish you lot of happiness!

Other ways to support us

However, if you can not contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share this campaign via e-mail or on social media and ask your friends and peers to contribute;
  • Create a story around and make it go viral;
  • Contribute with your knowledge, time and connections;
  • Contribute with equipment and office or operating supplies and materials;
  • Offer something you have as our Perk!!! I.e. Your eBook... We would appreciate tremendously.

Some of the students current projects

Here you can preview some of the latest students projects:

  • Solar Jump Jet - A jet pack which an astronaut can carry with himself on Mars and uses it's power to accomplish obstruction whenever he encounters one.

  • Space Monkeys' Route 66 - A virtual reality for the Kennedy Space Centre, giving the unique chance to walk around or fly through it as well as to preview its future look.

  • Avis -  A smart wristband and an Android app to help drone operators control the drone, notify them about weather and near no-fly zones. 


If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact at: irena@newmansba.com


Thank You!

NewMan's BA Team and 

NASA Space Apps Challenge Skopje-Macedonia Team

https://www.facebook.com/NewMansBA

https://www.facebook.com/SpaceAppsMacedonia

7.200$ for Prototyping Laboratory operating supplies for 24 months
16.800$ for 7 people for travel and accommodation in USA for 2 weeks
7.200$ for utilities for 24 months
3.600$ for snacks and representation costs for 24 months
6.000$ for the Indiegogo and bank transaction fees to receive the collected money

We can not do it with less than 66.000$. So if we raise less in total, we will release all your money back.

NewMan's contribution budget breakdown (32.000$ in total):


15.000$ for rent of the Prototyping Laboratory space for 24 months
17.000$ for a salary of 1 full-time employee in the Prototyping Laboratory who will provide technical support for the users, will help them operate with the equipment and will manage the operating supplies.






Perks - What do YOU GET if you Contribute?



$10,000 - Honorary ProttoLab Patron (only 3 available) - Engraved Plaque featuring you as a Honorary ProttoLab Patron.

$5,000 - Honorary VC Founder - Written acknowledgment of you as Honorary VC Founder signed by the Prototyping Laboratory team.

$3,000 - Corporate Corner (only 3 available) - Branded corporate corner within our Prototyping Laboratory where you can showcase your tools, products or technology and/or identify and recruit great talent!


$2,000 - Honorary Angel Founder - Written acknowledgment of you as Honorary Angel Founder signed by the Prototyping Laboratory team.

$1,000 - Honorary Seed Founder - Written acknowledgment of you as Honorary Seed Founder signed by the Prototyping Laboratory team.


$500 - Big Wall of Fame Star & T-Shirt - Personalised Thank you Star at the Wall of fame at the entrance of the Prototyping Laboratory and special T-Shirt!

$300 - Wall of Fame Star - Personalised Thank you Star at the Wall of fame at the entrance of the Prototyping Laboratory! 

$200 - Novel: "I AM ENOUGH" (only 70 available) - Signed copy of the 1st edition of the Novel "I am Enough" by Irena N. Chaushevska... Limited Unedited Hard Cover copy! eBook available in meantime by August 2016 upon your request. 

Check more at: https://www.facebook.com/NovelIAmEnough

$100 - Social Media Thank you Story - Acknowledgment of your contribution via social media (Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter) and Personalised Pin at the Prototyping Laboratory web page!

$50 - Pin at Webpage - Personalised Pin at the Prototyping Laboratory web page featuring your contribution!

$25 - Thank You eNote - Personalised Thank you eNote signed by the NewMan's Prototyping Laboratory team!

$10 - Good vibes - We'll send you good vibes and wish you lot of happiness!



Other ways to support us
However, if you can not contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help:

Share this campaign via e-mail or on social media and ask your friends and peers to contribute;
Create a story around and make it go viral;
Contribute with your knowledge, time and connections;
Contribute with equipment and office or operating supplies and materials;
Offer something you have as our Perk!!! I.e. Your eBook... We would appreciate tremendously.






Some of the students current projects
Here you can preview some of the latest students projects:

Solar Jump Jet - A jet pack which an astronaut can carry with himself on Mars and uses it's power to accomplish obstruction whenever he encounters one.


Space Monkeys' Route 66 - A virtual reality for the Kennedy Space Centre, giving the unique chance to walk around or fly through it as well as to preview its future look.



Avis -  A smart wristband and an Android app to help drone operators control the drone, notify them about weather and near no-fly zones. 




   If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact at: irena@newmansba.comThank You!NewMan's BA Team and NASA Space Apps Challenge Skopje-Macedonia Teamhttps://www.facebook.com/NewMansBAhttps://www.facebook.com/SpaceAppsMacedonia

story:
We're Bar 41!

Offering unique and delicious cocktails, wine, beer, and food is important. For us, it is also increasingly meaningful to support the community in which we live and work: the Jewel Box neighborhood of Oakland, California.

As a community bar, we are:

  • Dedicated to open, inclusive, and safe space for all;
  • Committed to supporting the community through fundraisers and partnerships with local non-profits, as well as sourcing from local makers;
  • and invested in offering a wide range of classes, workshops, and parties to promote entertainment, learning, and community.  

We want Bar 41 to be a place you can consider your own. Whether it's a place to hang out with friends, wind down after work, stop in for lunch, enjoy weekly events, or rent out for a special evening– Bar 41 is your bar. 

 

Help us keep our Oakland community bar open.

We're reaching out to you, our community, for partnership in our neighborhood's success. At just a year old, we have quickly become an anchor to our community.  We're asking our investors and friends for $25,000 to keep our lights on and our doors open.  

By helping us stay afloat following a challenging season, you'll be supporting your Oakland community. Your contribution boosts the growth of the Jewel Box neighborhood, and keeps our awesome cocktails on the counter.

story:
The Makersville Community

Makersville provides early entrepreneurship experiences to its youth community and mentors.  with focus on hands on doing and making and social responsibility.  We help others through seeking of donations and sales of certain products of our community.

With this campaign, we will help:

  • Support a new International community of youth participating in an Inventing and a Robotics program, the World Robot Olympiad (WRO)
  • Provide a tangible exercise in community and socially responsible entrepreneurship to our Makersville youth and adults.
  • Produce the World Robot Olympiad's first Multi-National tournament on US soil
  • Produce The World Robot Olympiad's Southern California Qualifier that will feed into the US National
  • Offer assistance to bring World Robot Olympiad outreaches to libraries, parks and camps around Southern California

  • Create paid work for our summer interns... There's more.

This campaign is the result of an organically developed community that is now in it's 6th year.  We learn new skills, mentor, coach, teach, make products and develop curriculum.

What We Need & What You Get

Our youth entrepreneurs and their mentors are being asked to donate a percentage of their proceeds to the program, with a suggested 10% minimum.  The remaining amount will be used to source materials, pay for advertising and printing costs, create paid work to our summer interns who will help to fulfill the offered products and their delivery.

We need $1K in donations from this campaign for each library, park and camp location with which we will engage to bring the WRO.  This funding will provide a basic set of equipment and a small coaching stipend to established groups and organizations that agree to develop their WRO presence.  At these sites, we will seek out a core supporter who can take the WRO program into future years.

We need $250 in donations from this campaign to bring our youth entrepreneurs and their adult mentors to each core and extended community site to share what they do or make.  We have core community sites:

  • Through our collaboration with the Robotics Society of Southern California (meets at Cal-State university, Long Beach,
  • At Lincoln Elementary School (A Title I School) in Long Beach, CA,
  • At Grace United Methodist Church in Long Beach, CA
  • DeVry University in Long Beach, CA

WHAT YOU GET

All fullfilments will target the end of August, 2018 for completion and shipping of products.

  • Master Model Builder, Brian Heins, has kindly designed two special promotional kits themed to the 2018 theme of the World Robot Olympiad.  These kits, Harvest Bot and Garden Bot are limited edition kits and will include a custom printed World Robot Olympiad 1x8 LEGO(r) brick.
  • Kid Fan of LEGO(r) (KFOL) NZ Fawkes will coordinate the e-delivery of his self-published book "Beauty of the Brick".
  • Mom Jenny Tate will work to produce the keychains from the custom UV printed 1x8 bricks.
  • Squigglemom, Trish Tsoiasue will coordinate e-delivery of a copy of the 2017 2x4 Day Celebration book.

The HUGE Impact

By now, you may have seen the huge potential in what you can help us to do.  Our community is inclusive, youth focused and crosses causes. 

Our participants have always included neurotypical as well as Autistic and ADD/ADHD youth; well-to-do, middle-class and impoverished youth; boys and girls; elementary, middle school, high school and college aged youth; students in public, private and home school settings; Boy Scouts in camps seeking merit badges; participants in teacher-supported programs; participants at libraries, at a homeless outreach and at open attendance meetings.

We work hard to implement inclusive programs, to identify the learning wants and needs of each individual, to find the motivators and use them to create small successes. We seek to solve problems big and small (to enjoy the creation of the solution) and we need you to help us solve them.  Then we do it again.

Risks & Challenges

As we offer this campaign, we are making plans for the summer... and summer is fast coming upon us.  We are making small commitments for volunteer time, in case the campaign does not gather sufficient community support - your support.  

We need to motivate our summer interns to create the processes and build a fulfillment community for the kits we produce.

There is a big chance that we will not get enough donated funds to do all we want to do... all we can do.

There are many challenges.  Many risks.  We are making small commitments regardless of the outcome, and bigger commitments as funding comes in.  The vision - the possibilities - are huge, and you can help us to help others and in so doing get yourself a World Robot Olympiad (WRO) 2018 souvenir kit, keychain, eBook and/or learn about the 2x4 Day in the 2017 book.

  • We have been building communities for 15+ years, this community since 2012, global communities since 2015.
  • We have big visions and take small steps to achieve them.  Then we take another step.
  • We have training in Creative Problem Solving and LEGO(r) Serious Play and have been working on our problem solving skills since 2015.
  • Our goal is to enjoy the process, learn new skills, share with others, teach, entrepreneur and be socially responsible.  Regardless of the fundraising outcome, we are already successful. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with friends, family, and ask them to share. If you can, please contribute or make a purchase of one of our products.

Thank you for participating!

story:
About PaPRika

My name is Ines Marić and I am the Founder of PaPRika, a startup event management agency in Zagreb, Croatia. We specialize in organizing and producing all kinds of corporate and private events, but our main goal is to organize green events which will make Croatia a better place!

The main feature of green eco events has a positive impact on the planet, local community and the people around us. There are many areas in which we can and must have a positive impact: eco-procurement, waste reduction and management, energy efficiency, water conservation, reduced emissions, biodiversity conservation, and social and economic development. Our mission is to raise awareness of these obligations, but also point out ecological modernization of environment in which we live. 

Croatia is as many of you know, small and beautiful country, but it is still going through the transition process. The Croatian economy is in crisis. Unemployment is high, corruption is pervasive and for many people, life in Croatia is not so easy. I have lived in Zagreb my whole life and after many years of struggle, I felt that I needs to do something. I wanted to start a company with a sustainable and helping mission.

We want to make changes. We want to give people something positive. We want to make Croatia a better place to live and a better place to visit!

The Impact

Eko Limach Fest

Your financial support will help us to organize our first green project – Eko Limach Fest.

In September 2015 and June 2016, we are planning to organize a children's eco festival in Park Maksimir, Zagreb in order to educate the young people on the protection of the environment and nature. 

Also, the children would be educated about other important topics that would be part of other workshops, and all would be accompanied by an entertainment program, as well as sports activities.

Why Eko Limach Fest?

  • Because it is the first real children's eco outdoor festival in Croatia
  • Because it is based on all day interaction of children who pass through various eco, creative and educative workshops and create them
  • Because the main goal is to educate and to raise environmental awareness amongst the young
  • Because it promotes health and a healthy, active lifestyle
  • Because it educates about healthy eating habits
  • Because it fosters the mental health of children
  • Because it promotes the welfare and wellbeing of animals
  • Because it will provide children basic knowledge about the nature and explain the importance of co-existence and harmony between humans and nature
  • Because it is an ideal project to raise environmental awareness among younger generations
  • Because it promotes outdoor activities and Park Maksimir
  • Because the eco-educational workshops and other entertainment will be provided for those with low-income

This kind of festival will be organized for the first time in Croatia and admission for all visitors is free. We expect to have several thousands of children and their parents join us.

The awareness of ecology is still very low in Croatia so this kind of project is ideal for making things begin to change with new generations. Small children, whose brains are still developing, best absorb the messages of their surroundings. Investing in the community in which we live is something priceless and education is the most powerful weapon that can be used to change the world.

Your donation will make the difference!!


Higher Impact

Your donation will have a global impact as it will help Croatia to join with other world countries struggling to promote ecology, sustainable development, ecological modernization of society, healthy and active lifestyles. And we are confident that this project will contribute to the spiritual evolution of mankind. 

So together make the world the better place to live !

Ways You Can Help

Donate! $5...  $15... $25... $50... Every dollar REALLY makes a difference!

Please SHARE the link to our campaign! 

Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools found on this page.

Your support means more than you know! 

You have the power to transform lives in Croatia in new ways!

You will help us make Croatia a better place!


Perks

He:art Collection

Handmade in Croatia from organic materials and it promotes healing art as a way of creating new products.

Made by our creative art manager: Sunčica Taslak


Check out the collection on our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1449592055322718/?fref=nf


Green Wedding in Croatia

PaPRika's discounts for organizing special green wedding in Croatia on beautiful island Pašman.

Thanks to our expert wedding team, there is nothing for you to do but say ’I do’ at the Croatian island of joy and happiness. This is the island without frontiers. Pašman overwhelms and enters the pores of our innermost being.

On the superb beaches and many special, cultural and historical places, your Pašman wedding could not have a more stunning setting.


If you prefer continental regions, we will organize your perfect wedding day in amazing and beautiful Zagreb, a Central European city with interesting history and culture. Zagreb an ideal destination for a surprisingly varied short break with lots of things to do and enjoy!

story:
Hello and Welcome!!!!

We are proud to introduce you to the "Handmade Baskets from Senegal" project here on Indiegogo. These beautifully crafted baskets play an integral role in strengthening Senegalese communities and improving the quality of life  of families. The superior quality and craftsmanship that goes into each piece is the conveyance of the stories of the women who weave them. 


Project Background

While serving as a Peace Corps volunteer in Senegal, West Africa, I worked with women groups, youths and business owners on a variety of issues dealing with business education and development. This is when I first learned about the basket weaving trade which is practiced mainly among the women in the local towns and villages. This tradition has been passed down for generations and there is a great amount of work and pride that goes into each basket.


Project Goal and Funding

The goal of this project is to expand the exposure of the Senegalese handwoven baskets into new international markets. All funding will be used for making baskets, developing new products, and participating in craft fairs and trade shows. 

It has been 12 years since I left Senegal but I am still working to help improve the economic picture of the Senegalese people. This is the most important goal to me.


My Senegalese Partner

Jean Pierre helps the Senegalese basket weavers market their products internationally. He works as my counterpart while I served as a Peace Corps volunteer in his community.


Overview of Baskets

These incredibly sturdy baskets are 100% hand woven. There are literally hundreds of different designs and sizes available. It often takes days or maybe even weeks to make some baskets because many of the weavers are either students or taking care of families.


For your generosity...

To say "Thank You" for your generosity, we are offering our backers an outstanding lineup of vibrant, finely handcrafted baskets. The sizes of the rewards is determined according to the contribution of backers.


Rewards for Backers


Each backer will received something to show our appreciation.

$1 --- You contribution means more than you will ever know. You will receive a "Thank You" note signed by a basket weaver in Senegal.

$35 --- "Thank You" note PLUS a small woven pot


$35 --- "Thank You" note PLUS a mini flat lid basket (Dimensions: H 6" x W 6")

$45--- "Thank You" note PLUS a mini traditional basket (Dimensions: H 10" x W 8")


$60 --- "Thank You" note PLUS a small traditional basket (Dimension: H 18" x W 11")

$65--- "Thank You" note PLUS a Set of Woven Pots --- (Dimensions: Large (H: 10", W: 12") Medium (H: 8", W: 9.5") Small (H: 6", W: 7"))


$75--- "Thank You" note PLUS a medium traditional basket (Dimension: H 23" x W 16")


$75 ---  "Thank You" note PLUS a Large flat lid basket (Dimensions: H 15.5" x W 16")


$150--- "Thank You" note PLUS a large traditional basket (Dimensions: H 34" x W 20")


$200--- "Thank You" note PLUS a set of traditional baskets including small, medium and large (Dimensions: Small H 20" x 12", Medium H 23" W 16", Large H 31" W 18")


Thank You!!!

Thank you in advance for supporting this project.

You will receive a "Thank You" note signed by a basket weaver in Senegal.$35 --- "Thank You" note PLUS a small woven pot$35 --- "Thank You" note PLUS a mini flat lid basket (Dimensions: H 6" x W 6")$45--- "Thank You" note PLUS a mini traditional basket (Dimensions: H 10" x W 8")$60 --- "Thank You" note PLUS a small traditional basket (Dimension: H 18" x W 11")$65--- "Thank You" note PLUS a Set of Woven Pots --- (Dimensions: Large (H: 10", W: 12") Medium (H: 8", W: 9.5") Small (H: 6", W: 7"))$75--- "Thank You" note PLUS a medium traditional basket (Dimension: H 23" x W 16")$75 ---  "Thank You" note PLUS a Large flat lid basket (Dimensions: H 15.5" x W 16")$150--- "Thank You" note PLUS a large traditional basket (Dimensions: H 34" x W 20")$200--- "Thank You" note PLUS a set of traditional baskets including small, medium and large (Dimensions: Small H 20" x 12", Medium H 23" W 16", Large H 31" W 18")Thank You!!!Thank you in advance for supporting this project.

story:
Pricklypear - A Place To Be!

Io sono Bonaventura Poppiti e insieme ai miei amici e collaboratori abbiamo deciso di unire le nostre competenze, in ambito musicale, informatico e di marketing per lanciare un nuovo business, con sede operativa ad Altavilla Silentina (SA), pensato per fornire a chi vuole fare musica tutti i servizi e gli strumenti di cui ha bisogno e allo stesso tempo creare una rete di contatti che permetta loro di farsi conoscere acquisendo visibilità. 

Abbiamo deciso di creare uno spazio sia fisico che on-line, per musicisti e amatori. Un luogo dove poter essere finalmente quello che si vuole. "A Place To Be! "

 

L’idea si sviluppa attraverso due grandi nodi:

- una parte off-line relativa alla creazione di uno studio di registrazione/sala prove

- una parte on-line attraverso l’implementazione di un sito web e un’applicazione per smartphone. 

Se la prima è un’attività che possiamo definire “tradizionale”, la seconda si lega indissolubilmente all’innovazione.

L’applicazione permetterà ad esempio di:

- vendere ed acquistare basi musicali

-richiedere la realizzazione di video e grafiche

-richiedere il supporto di esperti per la realizzazione di campagne pubblicitarie

-richiedere mastering e mixing di brani

-interagire con altri musicisti e attività commerciali

-prenotare lo studio di registrazione

-l'incontro tra domanda e offerta di performance musicali.

Di cosa abbiamo bisogno e cosa avrai in cambio?

Poiché siamo  già in possesso dei locali che adibiremo a studio di registrazione e uffici, i fondi raccolti verranno utilizzati per acquistare la strumentazione mancante necessaria, per avviare l'attività. 

In cambio del vostro supporto abbiamo pensato a dei fantastici doni!

Le ricompense che abbiamo scelto sono:

- Ringraziamento tramite e-mail

- Un jingle musicale, da noi prodotto, che verrà donato a chiunque effettui una donazione di importo pari o superiore a 1 euro.  Questo avrà durata di 20 secondi.  Potrete usarlo come base per i vostri video o come suoneria per il vostro cellulare

- Avatar personalizzato handmade. Inviandoci una e-mail con la vostra foto la nostra grafica realizzerà l'avatar, ottimizzato per qualsiasi social network.

- Felpa Pricklypear- A Place To Be. Disponibile in 5 versioni. Rock, Pop, Rap, Punk e Myself. L'immagine posizionata al centro della felpa raffigurerà una di queste parole. Anche in questo caso, per sceglierla basterà mandarci una mail.

- Zaino Pricklypear. Zaino personalizzato con il logo di Pricklypear

- Your song. Solo 5 disponibili. Una canzone che sarà veramente tua. Potrai farne quello che vuoi. Quante volte nella vita potrà mai capitarti un'occasione simile?

- 5 Video tutorial per chitarra e batteria. Anche in questo caso la scelta sta a voi. Mandateci una mail e scegliete il set di tutorial che preferite. Sono corsi basi, tenuti da musicisti esperti. La durata di ciascun video è di 15 minuti, quindi una durata di 75 minuti a corso.

- Your face. Il tuo viso stilizzato dipinto sulla facciata anteriore del nostro studio di registrazione

L'impatto di Pricklypear

Lanciare un’attività di questo tipo comporta due principali conseguenze: La prima è collegata alla valorizzazione del territorio e la creazione di un network virtuoso fra paesi delle stesso. La seconda, invece, è la creazione di nuovi posti di lavoro. Nel tempo serviranno collaboratori in diverse aree del business. Da quelle digital a quelle prettamente off- line. Da musicisti a grafici e videomaker.

Vogliamo rilanciare il nostro paese attraverso la musica e l'innovazione tecnologica. Vogliamo permettere ai giovani di poter trovare un'occupazione senza doversi allontanare dai luoghi che amano.

 

Rischi e Sfide

I maggiori rischi sono legati all'andamento del covid19. Un'eventuale terza ondata potrebbe rallentare i lavori e la consegna delle ricompense. L'aspetto on-line del progetto però potrebbe bilanciare questa situazione sfavorevole grazie all'erogazione di servizi in rete.
Essendo un'idea innovativa vi sono da tenere in dovuta considerazione i classici rischi di mercato.

Abbiamo già realizzato il business plan da presentare in futuro agli organi competenti per ottenere ulteriori fondi per la nostra iniziativa. 

Altri modi per aiutarci

Potete diventare portavoce dell'iniziativa attraverso la condivisione del progetto sui vostri social e spargendo la voce..

Potete condividere il progetto direttamente da Indiegogo sulle vostre pagine social. Aiutateci a trasformare il nostro sogno in realtà ! 

Pricklypear. A Place To Be!

story:
The Story

My name is Rebecca Fernandez.  I am a storyteller.  The story I am going to tell is of a young Silicon Valley couple attempting to buy their first home.  The journey begins in Milpitas California and ends with a hopeful purchase of a home in the San Joaquin Valley.  

We do not know what the ultimate ending will be, but we do know that millions of young people are in the process of thinking about whether they should buy a home and if/when they can do it.  This documentary is full emotions which will take our viewers on a journey of a lifetime that will feel like an emotional rollercoaster.  They will experience fear, excitement, self doubt, joy and often times, sadness and frustration.  

The end result, like a sporting event, is not predetermined.  This is REAL LIFE and there are no actors.    

What We Need 

We need $215.35 for gas money to get from site to site!  In addition to the gas money, we need $1,100+tax for a high quality digital camera; which will be purchased USED on eBay, $400+ for a website designer, and $1,575 to produce our step-by-step guide to homeownership (which will be a companion piece to the YouTube documentary.  Any additional funds raised will go directly toward the campaign.

The Impact

Many people believe that they can dive headlong into homebuying without any prior eduction on the process.  This is flat wrong!  There are MANY people on the internet who claim you can purchase homes at <60% of the homes value.  This is 100% FALSE in the current housing market.  There is a housing shortage and many people are paying a premium to the listing price.  

This is why we do not know the final outcome of this project.  Will this Silicon Valley couple actualize their dream of home ownership or will they be relegated to renting forever?  Our goal is to guide this young couple and provide them and all of their followers with the necessary tools to achieve homeownership.  

Risks & Challenges

This project will not only address the common challenges with buying a first home; it will also tackle the challenges that COVID-19 has presented.  Home buying has been transformed and you will get a first-hand account of the struggles first-time home buyers are experiencing.  

It will also provide the actual ups and downs of a real estate transaction in REAL TIME!  This is NOT a get-rich-quick scheme or a fantasy or 'reality TV show' like you would see on HGTV where the outcome is already determined.  

We have ZERO knowledge of the eventual outcome.  What we do know is that when you have finished watching the series, you will be equipped with the knowledge and confidence to approach the home buying experience without fear or trepidation.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you are able to contribute monetarily or not, we appreciate word of mouth referrals.  If you happen to know anyone that this project would help, please send them our way.

story:
Okay, maybe $100k is a bit ambitious. In reality, we can make this project happen for $25k but $100k would allow us to really achieve an awesome outcome for the makers and consumers of organic, bio-dynamic and vegan wines.

Whether you have concerns about the bad stuff found in commercial wine (like preservatives) or you want to explore the vibrant taste and experience of organic wine, we hope you will join us on this exciting journey.

Makers of organic wines are typically smaller, independent growers with a real passion for what they do. The marketplace we want to create will empower these smaller operations and introduce wine enthusiasts to winemakers they’ve never heard of or are too remote to access.

Your support of our venture is valuable to us. We want you to share in our success and take you along with us. This is why we’re offering our supporters free membership to the BioWines Club.

                                        

An interactive website within which can find organic and biodynamic wines, learn about winemakers, and more. There will be a wide range of ordering options, including discount bulk buys and monthly pre-orders. BioWines will deliver more than a website where you can buy wine - we'll create an interactive and multi-faceted online space for organic wine lovers. 

 We're inviting you to join us to create a social online community through the BioWines Club. This is a  central pillar of the BioWines project, and involves much more than just loyalty discounts. The  BioWines Club is something we want our future longer-term customers to be a part of. You'll have assess to member-to-member forums, the ability to write published reviews and priority access to all the latest organic wines. You will also be able to opt-in to premium members features, such as a monthly, prepaid organic wine ordering service, which you can chop and change as the year progresses. As BioWines grows, we'll take the Club with us.

 While the main drive of BioWines is focused on the delivery of a convenient online destination for organic wine, we will also open a physical store, most likely in Nedlands, Western Australia. We'll stock all our premium products here for walk-in customers and will also have in-store pickups. 


First and foremost, the team we’ve assembled to build Bio Wines are wine drinkers. Based in Nedlands, Western Australia, a lot of us got into organic wine as a result of learning what is actually in the food that many of us buy. Feel free to contact us anytime!


Most commercially produced wines have had preservatives added as a protection against oxidation and bacterial spoilage. The preservative used is one of a number of forms of sulphur such as sulphur salts or sulphur dioxide.

Wines that are produced using very low levels of preservatives are known as organic and biodynamic wines.

According to the Australian Organic Standard 2013, organic production systems are guided by the following principles and outcomes: 

• Production of naturally safe, high quality, nutritionally vital foods; 

• Optimal production output, with rational and minimised use of inputs; 

• Use of recycling and biological cycles within the farming system; 

• Biodiversity protection and enhancement within the farm and surrounding areas; 

• Regeneration of lands and soils and best environmental practice of farming activities.

We love this and we want to support growers and wine makers that aspire to these principals.  Help us help them.
