story:
Short Summary

My name is Clair Thomas and I am an educator and wellness advocate. Passionate about health and wellness since an early age, I have experience in marathon and group fitness training. Nowadays, I utilize my degrees in education and information science to enhance my research and to teach my greatest passion ‒ yoga. I am excited to embark on my latest and greatest endeavor – Clairity Out Loud, so that I may share with others the opportunity to cultivate self-love and confidence, through the practice of yoga, meditation, and the use of natural food and products to remember or attain our true self.
For the next 30 days, I am looking to raise the funding for our space to practice, meet, create, and gather so that we have the location for making the business a success. We need money to put down on purchasing the space, making some minor maintenance adjustments, and purchasing supplies to get products, classes and sessions going right away - and then we will have an ideal location, starting materials, and a beautiful space - to start impacting the local community. With just a little help, we will make the move right into the heart of Downtown Las Vegas. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $5000:

$3000 will be the remaining portion of the down payment on purchasing the space as a large portion is already saved and ready to go.

$1500 will go toward repairs, maintenance, and materials needed to run a successful class, create the products, and have a comfortable environment for any visitors and/ or practitioners. 

$500 will be set aside for business licensing.

I am offering some great perks for participating - products, private sessions, consultations, and essential oils. Just for participating, you will have a first hand experience with some of the offerings to come as I move forward following my dream - and you will have a huge impact on seeing someone follow their passion! 

Should the total amount not be reached, you will get your money back completely - 100% refunded. If we work as a community and make this happen, we start Clairity Out Loud with a bang! 

The Impact

Clairity Out Loud is a company dedicated to helping people become clear about their life’s purpose through movement, meditation, nutrition, and the use of essential oils to create (or purchase) all natural healthcare and cleaning products.
I believe that  gaining clarity is the first step toward freedom. 
My life's purpose is to be a light that shines love to expose the cobwebs of fear; remind us that love makes us vulnerable but strengthens, while fear provides a sense of comfort, but weakens the spirit. Please help me shine that light! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have the funds to contribute? No problem! Please share this with family and friends that you think may be interested in receiving services, want to invest in something that will make a change in community, or who just might be interested in helping a friend in need. 

You can also come and take an introductory class or try a sample product and tell your friends (and me) your honest feedback. Any little bit helps. It takes a village... 

Love and Light~C

story:
IncBuzz is the Future of "Everything Business"

It is a Unique, Ever-expanding, Mobile-compatible,
Business Platform that will allow anyone the ability to
control everything from their dashboard. 


 
 

  • Take multi-tasking to the highest level, saving you time and increasing productivity.  
  • Stay in touch, using multiple communication options and social media integration. 
  • Have access to the best business resources. 
  • Quickly and easily set up a successful, expandable, extremely affordable
    e-commerce business presence     ALL FROM ONE LOCATION.


IncBuzz will minimize the need to have numerous sites and windows open to communicate and promote your product or service.


How Will We Do That?

As business owners and having worked with businesses of all types and sizes, we at IncBuzz, understand the need for the development of cost and time-saving business solutions designed to promote and grow businesses. By utilizing the latest in cutting-edge mobile and internet technologies, we can offer a unique and ever-expanding array of new features, resources, and services that are targeted at helping you achieve your business goals. 




IncBuzz has adopted a "Mobile First" design philosophy, building the platform and its applications using dynamic, mobile compatible software, which recognizes the type of device being used (desktop, laptop, tablet, mobile phone) and adjusts accordingly, allowing for a great user experience from any device. 

This type of  software architecture gives you complete control, and the ability to edit, update, and connect "on-the-go", making your hectic life, a lot less hectic.


While IncBuzz has dozens of unique features which distinguish it from other business platforms, there are a few primary reasons that IncBuzz stands alone as the emerging leader of the business platform pack. 



First and foremost, IncBuzz is focused on building the business entity and the associated brand. Most business platforms focus on the individual and their specific resume, like (linkedin).  


IncBuzz will offer an ever-expanding list of APPs to choose from. 
Access them directly from your Dashboard.


Another Key Advantage, is that everything needed to run your business successfully, is "at your fingertips".  IncBuzz brings the business world to you. Access to the best business resources and tools are only a click away. Social integration is built in. 

You have the ability to control everything from one location. The necessity of having to sign into multiple platforms on a continual basis will become obsolete. This will be accomplished, in part, through the use of installed apps, which is the future of software design.

One of the features that definitely sets us apart from all competition is the Microsite, quite possibly one of the most innovative features to be developed.  It has the potential to completely change the way businesses create and manage their online presence. 


What is a Microsite?

A Microsite is a very unique, low cost alternative to owning a "traditional website", which will allow anyone to be the "Master" of their own site. First of all, forget the monthly hosting costs.  Forget the development costs and the forever ongoing maintenance costs.  A web developer is not something you will need (it will include easy to use Site Editor software).  You will have access to tools and analytics. It is HTML capable. You will have the ability to easily create your own site, change your site, the way you want, when you want, without involving anyone else.  You want E-Commerce, have your own online store? It's included.  NO ADDITIONAL COSTS (Everything is Included in your IncBuzz Premium or Pro Membership).

Your site is built with the latest technology.  It is mobile compatible. You won't have to pay your developer $$$$ to ensure that everyone will be able to view it on all the different mobile devices and platforms out there.  The mobility doesn't stop there.  

Access and manage your site from an app on your phone (coming soon).  Making changes to your site are easy. Edit or add content, upload pictures, videos, install apps, widgets, you name it, do whatever you want on-the-go from your mobile device or computer, it's that simple. 


Make your site unique by getting a .buzz domain.




IncBuzz, while housing many features to boost an individual’s personal accomplishments, is targeted at promoting and growing one’s business and not just their own resume. 



What about social integration? 

It's already there and ready to go.

IncBuzz users can make a post about their business within the platform while posting to and updating on other social networks at the same time with no additional effort. Comments and feedback from those external social networks also feed back into the Incbuzz platform without the need to open and manage multiple social networks.

IncBuzz Platform Features



IncBuzz Site Editor. With your help, IncBuzz plans to complete a comprehensive yet easy to use set of tools for even the novice to quickly create an attractive and informative IncBuzz site.


Indepth Search

 IncBuzz Platform currently provides members with a detailed search.


Apps

Our app market allows you the ability to install programs and tools into your dashboard.  Once installed these tools will always be available to you.



Previously Developed Projects

IncBuzz has already developed and launched several portals that will compliment the IncBuzz Business Platform.

IncBuzzHosting 

IncBuzz Hosting allows customers to have access to a wide range of affordable, full-service, web-hosting solutions. We offer everything from domain registration, cloud storage, and email accounts, to SEO and SSL certificates.


IncBuzzSearch 

IncBuzz Search is a powerful Meta Business Search Engine that may render your need for any other search engine obsolete.


IncBuzzMusic

The Incbuzz Music Player incorporates some of the features of very "popular" players already out there, but has several unique features, which set it apart from the rest, such as social media integration. Have more control and more fun in your music listening experience.

IncBuzz Featured At SmallGuy.com

SmallGuy is where you can find, buy, and experience new innovative products before they are sold in a retail marketplace or online stores.

Where the Money Is Going

The money raised through the Indiegogo funding campaign will be used for design and development, finishing up final details of The IncBuzz Business Platform, which is complete and already online. Nearly all of the funding will be directed to the completion of development of the main features of the Premium and Pro Membership Packages being offered in our upcoming "Official Launch".  This will complete core revenue generating models and give us products to promote.  Up to this point, our company has been self-funded.  However, we understand, that for us to realize our potential and take our company to the next level, we need additional funding.  This is where your involvement is important. Without Indiegogo, and you, the contributor, we will not be able to accomplish the things we need to now, to ensure the future success of our new company, long-term.

Our Team 

Michael Reynolds. 

IncBuzz was originally founded by Michael Reynolds who is the architect behind the platform. Reynolds as been a successful entrepreneur and technologist for over 20 years and has the technical skills to both create as well as manage significant large technical and development projects.

Reynolds career has included founding various technology, marketing, and investment companies. In 2000, Michael developed an array of Windows and Internet optimization software applications.

The founding company successfully completed a reverse merger to form a new public company, Ticker: OTCBB:SKRM that continued the development of these acceleration tools. Michael has also developed many internet marketing technologies, artificial intelligence applications and investment research portals and equities trading applications.

Currently Michael owns and operates a holding company, IncHoldings, that develops and incubates multiple subsidiary company’s for either acquisition or spin-off.

Dan Carr. 

Daniel Carr has spent over 30 years in the technology industry as an executive of various IT companies including several of his own. Carr’s executive and business development skills have been honed through the startup and development of both private and publicly traded companies in the IT field. Carr has been highly recognized as a leader of the ERP industry and has received numerous awards for his achievements in sales and corporate growth. An accomplished writer and speaker, Carr has been published internationally and has been a frequent speaker at conferences and industry related events. 

Practical Business Associates (more info)

Harry Wichmann. 

Harry Wichmann is a seasoned veteran with more than 30 years of experience in all aspects of the creative process. His conceptual and intuitive approach coupled with his extensive expertise has been an asset for both small businesses and Fortune 500 companies alike. As a successful business owner Harry has been involved in developing highly effective marketing strategies utilizing his innate ability to recognize and pin-point market trends, and deploy state-of-the-art solutions in creating, coordinating and producing materials from conception to completion for a wide variety of projects. 

Harry Ideas (more info)


Jeff Reynolds. 
Jeff Reynolds has served as Owner, Vice-President, and CFO for several technology and financial start-ups. His various skills range from marketing to managing people in a fast-paced environment. Jeff has a Bachelors Degree in Business Administration. His role in IncBuzz, Inc. is to ensure successful, strategic, marketing concepts that meet, or exceed, the projected growth of the company.


Stretch Goals

1st Stretch Goal - $50,000.00  If reached, all contributors who selected any Membership Package as a Perk will receive the IncBuzz Mobile App for FREE when it becomes available, additionally Premium Members will receive upgraded IncBuzz Chat and Pro Members will receive the IncBuzz Video Conferencing / Chat feature for FREE, as soon as they become available. 

2nd Stretch Goal - $75,000.00  If reached, all contributors who selected any Membership Package as a Perk will receive any IncBuzz Paid App of their choice, for FREE.

3rd Stretch Goal - $100,000.00  If reached, all contributors who selected any Membership Package as a Perk will get to pick the next project we develop from a list of IncBuzz planned projects.


IncBuzz Polo - It's A Perk
Make a statement - get one of our Classic White Polos with our super cool logo embroidered on the left breast and right sleeve.   



Development Timeline



Risks and Challenges

At this point, the risks surrounding IncBuzz are minimal. It is designed, built, online and ready for expansion. It is not just a concept or an idea. It is real. We have been able to self-fund all of the development costs in building and setting up the Business Platform foundation, as well as development of all features to date. That being said, we still face challenges. We have now come to the point where keeping up with the demand for more expansive features, and growing our customer base requires additional funding. Funding that will help fuel the development of our ever-expanding list of features designed to effectively promote businesses.

In addition to keeping up with this demand for new features, we also understand the importance of marketing and promotion, getting the visibility and exposure needed to effectively grow the IncBuzz brand. And the urgency of not only getting it in front of as many potential customers as possible, but as quickly as possible. To do this we need the funding necessary to expand our resources, market our site and  promote our services, ensuring that every business owner truly understands the benefits of utilizing the IncBuzz Business Platform and its applications to grow their business.

story:
Short Summary

Orangutan Project is a small, non-profit company created by Leo Biddle. Its  raison d'etre, which has developed over the years, is to make significant and sustainable revenue streams through creative business developments to spend on animal welfare and conservation. Leo and Orangutan Project are currently based on Borneo and are predominantly funding orangutan conservation work and improving the captive welfare of protected wildlife within rescue and rehabilitation centres.

One of Orangutan Project's long term goals is to promote the concept of non-profit businesses - currently the primary, and sometimes only, goal of most companies is to increase the wealth of just a few individual people. We are showing that people will work for free and we can create businesses that give all of their profit away. This particular campaign is a drive to generate cash to develop a holiday resort on Borneo that will fund conservation work.

By contributing to this you will not only be funding a long-term revenue stream for animal conservation and welfare (it'll be like signing up for one of those '$10 a month' schemes, but you only have to donate this once!); you will also be showing your support for a business model that is not about shareholders and CEOs' bank accounts but instead using profits for the good of the world. It's hard to find a reason not to kick in for this project, isn't it?

What We Need & What You Get

We have broken this large project down into smaller chunks, and the section of the resort we are going to build with your money is Monkee-Beach-Bar. This can be completed for the bargain price of RM50 000 (Malaysian ringgit), or £9000. One of the reasons for the low cost is that we have altruistic volunteers that are labouring on this project, solely for the benefit that the future revenue will be able to bring to animals. 

As you can imagine, perks for contributing to a project like this are pretty awesome, ranging from a free t-shirt to a free night's stay at a beautiful, idyllic beach-side resort on the tropical island of Borneo - you will just have to wait for it to be built first of course. 

The Impact

Once completed, the best thing about this resort will be that you won’t need to do anything special to contribute to conservation – just book a holiday in a glorious location. We think that most people, given the choice between booking a room in a normal resort and one will give some money to help wildlife, will choose the hotel that helps. People like to know that our money is going to a good cause. The great thing about this project is that staying here will give you the chance to contribute meaningfully to conservation, without having to do anything outside of your regular holiday routine. You can go to a resort and have a great time, while feeling smug and ethical about what you are doing.

We're convinced that this resort can become a significant funder of conservation work because we already have a similar business established, generating donations. Monkeebar is currently the busiest bar in the city of Kuching. It's run by Western volunteers, and after 12 months of business the bar's trade grew from £5500 turnover from Jan-March 2014 to £80000 turnover from October-December 2014. It seems the idea of drinking for conservation is a winning one, and there's no reason that relaxing in a resort in the name of saving monkeys won't also have huge appeal. 

Even if Monkeebar were to start generating profits in the hundreds of thousands, we would not use this money to develop a new project - we have made a commitment that this profit is a donation to conservation and animal welfare work, and we will hold to this no matter how much it is. A percentage will never be siphoned off for pensions, other business ventures, new cars or holidays (sorry to our volunteers!). Therefore we need to find new funds for new projects. This is where you can help! 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge in building things on Borneo is building things on Borneo. Materials and tools are generally of low quality and late to arrive to the required site, a motivated work force is rare, it's pretty hot and sunny, and the humid climate does its best to destroy anything you do manage to build. Thankfully, Orangutan Project have over 10 years of experience of construction projects in these conditions, so we are well prepared to clamber over these guaranteed hurdles. We also have a team of Western volunteers who are so motivated by slave labour for the sake of monkeys that none of these potential problems will knock their spirits or slow their work rate.

Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE do everything you can to spread the word about this awesome project and the chance for a free (ish) holiday (ish - a night at least) in a wonderful resort on Borneo. The more people we can reach with this idea, the greater the chance we can receive the necessary funding and continue our work to help wildlife. We will also be able to introduce one more business into the world of capitalism that certainly wants to make money, but wants to give its profits away to a great cause.

you learn.


Thank you,

The Snow Muscle Team

story:
Short Summary

  • We started with a dream to do as much good as possible from farm to cup, started roasting in our garage and selling in farmer's markets.  In 2016 we signed a lease and gave all we had to build out a shop and roastery for our community to experience and enjoy high quality, fresh roasted, specialty coffee. 

  • If you have been in the space you know.. it's HOT!   And we know that together we can solve this problem. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • After searching for the best price we could find we have a quote for $5000 to complete our project.  (We already have the ducting and coil installed)
  • We have some fun perks for those of you partnering with us like free coffee and apparel. 
  • Best of all you get to enjoy a cool environment with amazing coffee and friends. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Post and share on social media and help us get the word out. 
  • Are you and HVAC professional and available to help, let us know!

story:
Short Summary

  • We are G.I. Junkers LLC.  A small, local, disabled Veteran owned general contracting business. We opened in July of 2018, And now employ 15 Men and Women.
  • This campaign was created to help our business grow to its full potential.   

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are asking for a funding of $50,000 all together to provide efficient amounts of supplies for our projects. And to send our employees home with a paycheck to provide for their families.
  • By choosing to contribute, you get a choice of a customized  G.I. junkers Short-Sleeved Tee shirt, Long sleeved Tee, Snap-Back embroidered baseball cap, or a hoodie!  
  • If our campaign doesn't reach its entire goal, We will still be thrilled and utilize any donations received.

The Impact

  • Our campaign helps in the success story of two disabled veterans making a difference by building value back into our community instead of becoming just another statistic.

Risks & Challenges.

  • With any company just starting its story, there is always the risk of  being unsuccessful. What makes our company different is sufficient knowledge in money management, Discipline, Determination, And a very Strong will to thrive in our company and in life all-together. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We understand that not everyone is  able to donate financially, But you could also help by sharing our story and campaign with friends, family, and colleagues.
story_txt:
Short Summary

We are G.I. Junkers LLC.  A small, local, disabled Veteran owned general contracting business. We opened in July of 2018, And now employ 15 Men and Women.
This campaign was created to help our business grow to its full potential.   


What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for a funding of $50,000 all together to provide efficient amounts of supplies for our projects. And to send our employees home with a paycheck to provide for their families.
By choosing to contribute, you get a choice of a customized  G.I. junkers Short-Sleeved Tee shirt, Long sleeved Tee, Snap-Back embroidered baseball cap, or a hoodie!  
If our campaign doesn't reach its entire goal, We will still be thrilled and utilize any donations received.


The Impact
Our campaign helps in the success story of two disabled veterans making a difference by building value back into our community instead of becoming just another statistic.

Risks & Challenges.
With any company just starting its story, there is always the risk of  being unsuccessful. What makes our company different is sufficient knowledge in money management, Discipline, Determination, And a very Strong will to thrive in our company and in life all-together. 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone is  able to donate financially, But you could also help by sharing our story and campaign with friends, family, and colleagues.

story:
Help make it happen! Please share this campaign

We wake up in the morning and hurry up to go to work. But how much time do we lose everyday by searching our keys or our phone? And how many times do we get in the car and that’s the time we realize that our car keys are left behind?

We lose or misplace our things every day. When being at home, at work, at a coffee or an event. So, what if we should do nothing and always get notified where our stuff is hidden or forgotten?

That’s why we launched FINeDit. A personal assistant, ready to help you stop losing your stuff. FINeDit is controlled by a simple web application and a smart – Bluetooth powered – iTag and will change your daily life by simply saving your time and your valuable things.














Our very successful real-time guard tour system, Qr-Patrol


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

1) How will I use FINeDit?

FINeDit is the smartest open tracking system that will help you find your valuable belognings in case of a loss. It consists of a mobile application which tracks your assets and a web application which gets updated when an item is found or lost. The only you need in order to track your belogings is to attach an iTag (beacon technology) device on them and register them on FINeDit system. From the time you attach an iTag device on your precious items or pets, you can get notifications about their location and participate in a global network of owners and potential finders. 

FINeDit offers the unique advantage that you can either use FINeDit iTag devices in order to track your items or any other iTag device available in the market. It means that FINeDit system integrates beacon technology of any manufacturer and you can use your own iTags and FINeDit application totally for free to track your valuable pets and items. 

In order to use FINeDit, you can simply download FINeDit mobile application on your smartphone, attach FINeDit iTags on your belongings (or your own iTags) and register each item/pet on the app, From now and on, you will be able to track your keys, bags, devices, bicycle or your lovely dog and become a potential finder of another item/pet registered in the global FINeDit tracking network.

2)What is the size of FINeDit?

FINeDit device is small and handy! We designed it like this in order to be attached to anything. FINeDit dimensions are 41*33 *4,3mm.

3) How many devices can a smartphone support?

A smartphone can support an unlimited number of FINeDit iTAG devices, in order to help you attach all your precious belongings that you need to secure.

4) How many smartphones can connect with a device?

FINeDit gives you the opportunity to connect any iTAG device with other smartphones. So you can easily connect your belongings with your friends’ or your relatives’ smartphones in order to track your belongings from more than one device.

5) What is the range of FINeDit?

FINeDit range is about 30-40 meters.

6) How does FINeDit differ from competitive products?

FINeDit system is a unique and competitive combination of:

  • Wide range of iTAGS
  • iTAGS in 3 different colors
  • Unlimited items 
  • Mobile app
  • Water resistant
  • Web app
  • White label
  • Lowest cost
  • Open system

7) Is the device water resistant?

Yes, FINeDit iTAGS are waterproof devices.

8) Does FINeDit device come with warranty?

Yes, FINeDit devices come with one year warranty.

9) What funders should know about shipping?

FINeDit team provides FREE shipping during the INDIEGOGO campaign!

10) Will these FINeDit services work worldwide?

Yes, FINeDit services work in all over the world! You can easily track and locate your precious belongings at any place.

11) In case of any problem about our FINeDit campaign:

Please contact FINeDit team: info@finedit.net

In case of backing problem please contact: support@indiegogo.com

story:
Think delicious, authentic French food has to be expensive? Intimidating? Inaccessible? Think again! Diner du Monde, the brainchild of a Le Cordon Bleu-educated chef will offer tantalizingly affordable, deceptively simple French and French-fusion creations, made to order on the spot. Think creamy. Comforting. Richly-satisfying. And the best part? No waiting for a table or being ignored by a stuffy maître d’—Diner du Monde will be the first of its kind in Portland’s ever-evolving food truck culture.

Hi!, I'm Greg!, I'm a dad,

a U.S. veteran, and a graduate of Le Cordon Bleu, living in Portland, Oregon.  I've been cooking since I was a teenager, professionally for many years now.  I've worked in nearly every kitchen position possible: garde manger/pantry, saute, wok/stir fry, even pastry & desserts.  I've even been the chef of a coupla' different remote fishing lodges in the Aleutian Islands in Alaska (this is Lindholms Lodge in Lake Chignik).

 

I wanna' open Diner du Monde because of my driving desire to share the joy of French "real people" cuisine

with American people, starting with my community here in Portland.  I think French cuisine has gotten an undeserved rep in our country for being high dollar, higher attitude, and maybe too exotic for American tastes, and it doesn't hafta' be that way! While living/working in Europe for a few years, I was pleasantly surprised to find the cuisines simpler and tastier than I'd imagined with my limited/non-existent points of reference back home in the U.S.

But starting this food cart is only the beginning, because I'd love to bring my idea to as many people as possible, in a brick-and-mortar format in cities across the country!  Imagine an elegant but relaxed atmosphere where world recipes with a French influence are dictated by locally grown resources and that won't cost you an arm, a leg, and/or your first born; work from local artists exhibited/for sale on the walls; local  cafe-style musicians performing occasionally; a place you'd be proud to take a date, out-of-town guests, or just close friends/significant other for some quality time. 

To start this dream rolling, I'm seeking $17,000, the bulk of which will go towards the cart itself.

  The rest will cover the oven and refrigerator.  Should the campaign earn more than the goal, the overage would fund the wrap in which I'd like to cover the cart, under counter refrigerators for more product storage, pans in which to bake desserts, operating capital, etc.  I'm running a “fixed” as opposed to a “flexible” campaign because I believe if people are going to donate, they should see a result here.  So if I don't earn enough, you're not out anything.

But if you do donate, and I make my goal, I offer you my food/services as perks/a thank you for believing in me!!  My friend, local graphic artist Josh is kindly redrawing my "Josie the diner waitress" character for me (after the 3 strokes I suffered in October, 2014, there are just some fine motor skills that still elude me...), and for those contributing higher on the scale, you'll receive Diner du Monde t-shirts or aprons featuring Josie herself, the face of Diner du Monde, as well as the vouchers for free meals!!

But can a middle-aged guy who's recovered from a stroke really function in a professional kitchen?  It hasn't been easy, but yes, I've retaught myself cooking skills I thought could be gone.  Being a "One man show" to start might be daunting, but that won't be forever, and I've done it before during my times in the Alaskan fishing lodges, where we also had to filter our own water, produce our own electricity, and contend with hungry brown bears (they call 'em "Grizzlies" in the Lower 48) attracted by the aromas of chicken fried moose and Sriracha glazed salmon!  The risk here is by putting everything I have into this project, if it fails, I literally will have to completely start over again from square one, and at 54 years old, that's scary.  But I believe in what I'm doing, I'm still willing to take that risk in order to create my dream career.

So, if after all that, I've inspired you to contribute to my campaign, Merci beaucoup!!!  If you're not in a place where you can help fund, but like what I'm about, maybe you could help by getting the word out to friends/family who do have some ability to donate, you could use the Indiegogo share tools on your social media, or just word of mouth even helps.  In any case, thanks for your time. 

Au bientot!

story:
Everyone loves chocolate...
I love making chocolate...

Hi. I'm Andrew Miller, the creator of Kakau Chocolat. Thanks for visiting and considering a contribution to help get some great chocolate out on the market.

I actually loathe chocolate... at least, what I really loathe is what is commercially available and sold as “chocolate”... you know, that stuff made from reconstituted cocoa powder, additives and fillers that's on every store shelf...

What I totally adore is pure chocolate, and that's the stuff that is 'pure' – straight from the cocoa bean and into the bar... though I do have to admit that having made pure artisanal chocolate while developing the Kakau Chocolat  idea that that love has actually disappeared... you know, too much of a good thing, yada yada yada... but that love has turned into an absolute appreciation for Theobroma Cacao – Food of the Gods – which is Nature's way of saying 'hey, go ahead and enjoy – it really is good for you!!'

With your assistance, Kakau Chocolat  will be a reality by the end of June this year, in Savusavu, the centre of the Hidden Paradise of the wonderful Fiji Islands in the heart of the South Pacific.

Check out the Gallery for examples of all of our packaging...


From Engineer to Chocolatier

Prior to returning to Fiji in 2012 after many years abroad, I was chatting with a mate of mine in São Luís, Brazil, about what to do on my return, and in a fit of verbosity he said, “Fiji has cacao, right?' I concurred, having seen the pods and eaten their beans all over the place as a kid. 'Well, go back and start a chocolate factory,' Wladimir opined. 'Simple, now all I have to do is learn what to do...' 'That's easy,' he said, fumbling for his phone and making a call. Five minutes later, it was 'Done.' And so I spent the next eight months prior to my departure on cacao farms and on courses, processing the beans and learning how to make real chocolate... in between winding down my other work.

The idea behind Kakau Chocolat  was born.


What's on the Menu?

Working with both the farmers and the Ministry of Agriculture here in Fiji, I ensure that only the finest of Fiji's Cacao gets through the front door. As I am going for Organic and FairTrade Certification, the whole process is vital, from growing, harvesting, fermenting and drying the beans right through to being able to wrap and package a chocolate that will enable my customers to agree with one of my marketing tags: Pacific Perfection, All Chocolate, Pure Bliss...

An initial range of 41gr., (1.5oz.) Tablettes in a variety of chocolate percentages from 55% to 90%, along with 150gr. (5.3oz.) Kraft Packs of Brewing Cacao is what will be available from the start. Slowly adding a wide variety of flavours to my Tablette repertoire (fresh chilli, basil, coriander, mint, citrus, and even coconut for the short-list!), I will be expanding to include pure cocoa butter, pure cocoa powder, and even potpourri, utilising Fiji's vast wealth of flora and scents. And, hey, just wait for my coconut chocolate liqueur range – that will top everything on the market!

I hope that you will come along with me at Kakau Chocolat  and enjoy the ride...


What We Need and What You Get

It's a totally new idea in Fiji. The project total is pretty evenly divided between set-up costs and equipment requirements. A full project breakdown is in the available business plan.

As for our incentives... In association with Justin Hunter Pearls [www.fijipearls.com], I have been lucky enough to have his help in creating my perks... and, heck, what perks - who doesn't want, or know someone who wants, a pearl!! Listed below are contributing levels and the reward packages … a low $50 gets you a grade-A pearl (valued at $65)... Go for it – nothing like a pearl to go with the chocolate!! (Or is it a chocolate to go with the pearl?)

Level One :  Cacao-Pearl Prime  -  $750
1 x Fiji Pearl (Grade AAA) & 4 x 350gr. (12.4oz.) Koko ni Viti  Brewing Cocoa

   


Level Two : Cacao-Pearl Select  -  $250
4 x 350gr. (12.4oz.) Koko ni Viti  Brewing Cocoa & 1 x Fiji Pearl (Grade AA)

Level Three : Cacao-Pearl Plus  -  $150
2 x 350gr. (12.4oz.) Koko ni Viti  Brewing Cocoa & 1 x Fiji Pearl (Grade AA)

Level Four : Cacao-Pearl Standard  -  $100
2 x 150gr. (5.3oz.) Koko ni Viti  Brewing Cocoa & 1 x Fiji Pearl (Grade A)

Level Five : Cacao-Pearl Basic  -  $50
1 x 150gr. (5.3oz.) Koko ni Viti  Brewing Cocoa & 1 x Fiji Pearl (Grade A)

Level Six : Vinaka Vakalevu  -  $5
A big Vinaka Vakalevu from Fiji.

As a contributor, and you're heading to the beautiful islands of Fiji for a holiday? Then let us know and you'll have a gift pack waiting for you when you arrive!


More or Less

Any additional funding will go towards my establishing a centralised processing base in the Northern Division for local cacao farmers to use to process their beans with the appropriate bio-security controls in place for export consideration, thereby ensuring that each farmer receives the benefit of as much value-added factor as possible. If the funding target is not achieved, there will be cut-backs on what is done to get the facility up and running... it will still definitely happen, but maybe just a little less-equipped than anticipated on reaching the funding target.

Is the Facility Ready

 I currently have an option on a perfect location, which needs minimal work to have it ready and approved. Available from the middle of May, it will be fully operational within three weeks; the majority of the work being the installation of air conditioning, the construction of the bench tops and panelling of the walls.


What are the risks

As with any new venture idea, there will always be risks. However, having spent a substantial amount of time in the development of the idea and the various types of chocolate, the operational aspects are well known. Marketing the product - hey, with over 40,000 visitors annually to Savusavu, that won't be a problem!


Other ways to help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help... If you believe in chocolate, please share this on your social media. If that isn't your thing, simply tell a friend about Kakau Chocolat. The more exposure, the better!


A Big Vinaka Vakalevu

(Thank You Very Much in Fijian)

Other ways to
help

Some people just can't contribute, but that
doesn't mean you can't help... If you believe in chocolate, please
share this on your social media. If that isn't your thing, simply
tell a friend about Kakau Chocolat. The more exposure, the better!



A Big Vinaka Vakalevu

(Thank You Very Much in Fijian)

story:
As previously stated, Conroy’s Gun Shop is comprised of a husband and wife team.

 

My name is Jennifer Conroy, I am the Owner and CEO of this establishment and I work alongside my husband, Chris Conroy, whom is the General Manager and Owner of our brain child. We have been working on getting this Business off the ground for over ten years and have gone through vigorous situations that have not allowed us to take the final step (obtaining seed capital). We have attained our FFL, recently, to manufacture ammunition and deal in firearms, as well as gone through several formal training programs to get us up-to-date in North Carolina’s gun laws to ensure the proper running, and safety, of our business. In so doing, we have exhausted our resources and need your help to make this dream become a reality.

 

We are in search of $750,000 dollars to get the ball rolling. This amount will help us establish ourselves in our own building, in a metropolitan area with heavy traffic (Asheville), in our beautiful gun friendly state (North Carolina). The sum will also allow us to relocate and obtain inventory, cases, payroll, company vehicles (for gun shows), marketing, office/operation supplies, utilities, insurance, and company phones. We have dedicated so much time and money into this project and this is the closest that we have ever been to becoming our own business. If we are unable to reach our entire goal within a timely manner, we will use the funds as an anchor to apply for and receive business loans. Regardless of whether or not we reach our startup goal, the money will be put to good use to establish our company and ensure our success.

 

The impact of your contribution is straight forward: you are making our life-long dream become a reality. By assisting us with starting our own business you are helping the economy of Western North Carolina and the State, and you’re encouraging the education and of the second amendment. The eventuality of our efforts is to expand our storefront into a shooting range and concealed carry instruction area. We are adamant about sharing our knowledge of gun ownership and safety with those willing to learn about our rights as US citizens.

 

One of the main barriers that we will face in our field is competition; living in a gun friendly State gives plenty of opportunity for other like-minded individuals to start their own gun shops. We have a plan to sell our inventory of firearms 10 to 15 percent less than average market value. The only other barrier that stands in our way from success is robbery, which will easily be combated with professional security systems and armed, informed, and educated employees (including ourselves).

 

We hope that you consider us and contribute to our campaign. Please feel free to share our campaign on all social media (we will be doing the same). Thank you for your time and consideration.

story:
Summary

I am a professional property investor in London with over 12 years experience in the field. I have built a personal portfolio worth millions of pounds in London. I started as an estate agent many years ago, shortly after I opened my own estate agency which became, and still is, very successful. Through building a large network of high quality contacts, my power team is one of the main advantages I have in being able to source high return, high yielding investment properties. Knowing how difficult it is to start up in property, I decided to make it easier for people to get onto the property ladder, not requiring a large upfront capital investment, whilst still benefiting from a wealth of valuable experience and an exceptional contact network which has been built over the last 12  years. I have sourced, purchased, and refurbished numerous projects both small and large scale taking a run down property and refurbishing it to a high standard in areas set for good capital growth, thereby ensuring £100k + equity is gained with each project. 

What We Need & What You Get

You will receive your full initial investment back plus 6% pa interest (calculated at 0.5% interest per month), repaid to you at the end of the project which is estimated to run for between 12-24 months. E.g. If investing £10,000:

£10,000 x 0.5% per month x 24 months = £1200 plus £10,000 initial investment = £11,200 repaid 

We are looking for funding to purchase a residential freehold property located in an area of London with excellent capital growth and high yielding rental returns. The property will be converted using a team of highly skilled and experienced contractors from a residential 3 bed house into a high specification 6 bedroom multi let House of Multiple Occupation (HMO) which will be let to young professional tenants seeking good quality housing. Total investment required for this refurbishment project is £175,000 which will be used for finance/purchase costs and refurbishment.

Below are the figures in more detail:

Purchase price: £400,000

Finance & Refurbishment Cost: £175,000

Value after refurbishment: £675,000

Equity Gained: £100,000

Rental Income: £4500 PCM 

Gross Yield: 13.5%

The Impact

This project will create high quality accommodation to young professionals in an area where there is a shortage of good quality housing. Being in close proximity to the new Crossrail Station as well as being in an area benefitting from millions of pounds worth of regeneration means the project is low risk and offers excellent returns due to the uplift in value and high rental return. Having recently completed 3 other similar projects in the same vicinity our investors expectations have been exceeded and they are very pleased with their investment.

Risks & Challenges

Investing in property is not without risk, the value of a property can increase as well as decrease dependent on the market however your investment is secured against the property and with my experience in this immediate market the risk is minimised and this is justified by independent reports of property prices being at an all time low and future forecasts set to drastically increase over time, with this particular area set to increase in value by 2018 up to as much as 35% due to the proposed regeneration and improved transport links. Coupled with this, the HMO strategy ensures minimal void periods and high rental returns leaving a lot of room even in the unlikely event of a downturn in the market. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate not everyone can contribute an investment, however if you would like to contribute or help, I would appreciate you sharing this investment with anyone who may find it of interest or who could benefit from the high returns. Please feel free to share this investment with all your friends and family!

story:
Wish you could have organic food anywhere? We have the solution.

The Hurb is the first sustainable, organic, and GMO free vending machine company. We provide you the highest quality, most delicious, healthy snacks and beverages on the market.

We are committed to improving the health of people and the planet by making organic sustainably produced food and drinks convenient and accessible to the world.


 

Summary

When you eat well, you feel well, and when you feel well anything is possible. We recognized the unmet demand for healthy convenience food and created a platform to meet this demand. 

We source custom built vending machines, equipped with LED lighting, sensor to guarantee  delivery guarantee or money back, google pay, apple wallet, cash and credit capabilities, and interactive touch screens that display nutritional and ingredient information.

We carry companies that have delicious products, are philanthropic, and have ethical and sustainable production and packaging methods. There are many companies posing to be healthy. Our mission is to inform the consumer about eating healthily and sustainably, while giving you the accessibility. We are the choice you can count on.

All of our products are plant based, GMO Free, and most of them are organic, gluten free and low in sugar.  

A Few Favorites: 

 


 

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising money to purchase more machines and place them in current and upcoming contracts including schools, co-working spaces, malls, airports, office buildings and more.

We developed curated snack boxes to expand the experience of these amazing products to your door. Every product has been hand picked to ensure quality of taste and ingredients. Enjoy these delivery boxes for a month, three months or six months. We are here to make eating healthy, easy and enjoyable for you.

WHERE THE FUNDING GOES:

Our proceeds after costs of goods sold, go directly into machine purchases and developing delivery boxes for offices and other spaces that are currently out of our district and or have less than 100 employees. 

PERKS:

LIMITED EDITION SNAPBACK HAT
One size fits all. Adjustable snapback. Join the crew.

INDULGE RESPONSIBLY
Be the first to enjoy our own Hurb branded nut spreads! Best on the market!

Chocolate Hazelnut Butter: Sprouted, unpasturized Duchilly Hazelnuts, slowly stoneground with unroasted Ecuadorian Cacao and Maple Sugar until silky smooth. Enjoy!
Ingredients: Raw Sprouted Hazelnuts , Organic Maple Sugar, Organic Cacao Powder, Organic Cacao, Organic Sunflower Lecithin, Sea Salt.

Maple Almond Butter: Sprouted, unpasturized Almonds, slowly stoneground until silky smooth with a hint of Maple Sugar and sea salt.  
Ingredients: Raw Sprouted Organic Almonds , Organic Maple Sugar, Sea Salt.

       

FARM TO TABLE PRIVATE DINNER EVENT

Satiate your senses. Enjoy dinner for two at our private Los Angeles farm to table dinner party. Great plant based food, amazing people and jaw dropping performances.

SNACK BOXES:

Be prepared to be addicted. These top selling items have been selected by our very own food snobs. You are guaranteed to be impressed. Many items have been sourced form various small businesses, and are not yet distributed outside of local markets. We are so excited to share these amazing products with you!

HIGH VIBE BOX:
Elevate your snacking experience with some of the best products on the market. From sweet to salty there is something for everyone. This box includes:

  • Wasabi Lotus Chips- One of our favorite snacks ever! Crisp light bites with a kick.
  • Sea Salt Potato Chips- Non-GMO potatoes, cooked in organic nutrient dense coconut oil, and hint of sea salt. 
  • Chocolate Chip Animal Crackers- Whole grain, wholesome tasty cookies. 
  • Emmy's Coconut Vanilla Macaroons- This raw and decadent treat features a rich, nutty flavor rounded rounded out by the essence of vanilla extract. 
  • Barnana Peanut Butter Chewy Banana Bites- Dank AF!
  • Matt's Munchies Mango Fruit Snack- A natural trip to paradise. One ingredient- Organic mango concentrate.
  • Apricot Gluten Free Fruit Bar- Tastes like a piece of pie. Fruity filling inside a tasty, flaky crust.
  • Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups- Amazing organic peanut butter delicately placed in the highest quality organic, fair-trade chocolate. Peanut butter cup perfection!
  • 2 Good Day Chocolate Boxes- Dark chocolate bites with vitimans and green tea. 
  • Caramel Cashew Bar- Mouthgasium! Toasted cashews in vanilla caramel, covered in dark chocolate with Himalayan pink salt. 

3 or 6 MONTH SUBSCRIPTION BOXES:

Get a new High Vibe snack box every month, filed with a different selection of amazing products. Develop any favorites and let us know. Following your first box delivery, you will receive an email with our order comment sheet.  We will ensure you get stocked up with the requested items in the next box! 

FITNESS BOX:
Ready to turn it up?! These products have been selected to support your health and fitness goals without sacrificing taste or quality. Box includes:

  • Quite Cheezy Kale Chips- a good source of fiber, vitamin A, C, & K, protein and gluten free.
  • Chocolate Flavor Nutritional Shake Powder- 20 grams of plant based protein.  
  • French Vanilla Nutritional Shake Powder- 20 grams of plant based protein.
  • Complete Cookie- Chocolate chip with 16 grams of protein
  • Maca Boost- Real vanilla chai flavor: Performance enhancer. 
  • Recovery Accelerator- Reduce recovery time, restore energy, manage post-workout muscle fatigue. 
  • 2 Pre-Workout Packets- Sugar-free energize packets- Increases energy, endurance and mental focus.
  • Daily Energy Nutrient Booster- Elevate your day with beets, green tea, Bacopa & B12.
  • GoMacro Protein Bar- Peanut butter chocolate chip food bar. High Protein.
  • GoMacro Protein Bar- Almond butter and carob food bar. 
  • Dark Chocolate Almond Protein Bar- 10 grams of protein.
  • Raw Spirulina Bar- Omegas- 3&6, 2 grams of fiber and 7 grams of protein.
  • Chocolate Energy Bites- Dark chocolate with vitimans and green tea.
  • Nuun Energy Tablets- Effervescent electrolyte & caffeine supplement.
  • Red Ace- Organic beet & turmeric supplement. High in antioxidants and promote a healthy inflammatory response after exercise.
  • Runa Clean Energy Drink- Guayusa leaf, unsweetened natural energy drink. Naturally caffeinated and balanced with polyphenols you get sustained energy and focus without the crash. 
  • 2 Ginseng Extract Vials- helps athletes use oxygen more effectively, and it is believed to regulate metabolism, and increase energy levels.
  • Moringa Green Energy Shot- Moringa is highly nutritious, a powerful anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and has tissue-protective properties.

About

Hi, my name is Kelsea Rae and I am the founder of The Hurb. I am on a mission to change the convenient food world by supporting ethical companies while making healthy food accessible. It has been quite a journey and I am so grateful to have the ability to be part of something that can change so many people's lives.

Why an Indiegogo? I believe in the power of community. I am a young female entrepreneur and it has been a struggle at time to raise the necessary funding. I know people believe in my ideas and want to support my company. It would be an honor to have you join my team by contributing in any way. I want to expand my business and change the convenient food world, making healthy food accessible. 

I know what it feels like to eat clean and it has changed my life in more ways than imaginable. This shift has me dedicated to spreading this feeling with as many beings as possible. Its like taking the red pill in the matrix. Once you go in, theres no reason to go back.

Thank you to all my friends and family for all the unconditional support. It has brought tears to my eyes knowing the support The Hurb has. It has been a rollercoaster, and anyone who knows me knows, no matter what, I'm not getting off until we have reached our destination. 

So heres to you, to our friends and family and to the earth. Lets change the world together.

The Impact

By contributing to our campaign you are creating a change that starts with you and expands around the world. Our dollar is the biggest voting tool we have. Where we put our money has a ripple effect on the entire world. If people had a healthy option, they often would take it.  This is a launch pad to support health and wellness on an individual and corporate level.

Testimonials

Our community of clients say we've changed their experience at work in profound ways. 

“The Hurb machine is such a convenient way for my staff and I to grab a healthy pick me up on the go. We love the different variety of snacks and drinks it offers and it’s pretty cost effective as well.”

-Ashley N. White

Rockefeller Group Development Corp

“The Hurb is incredibly popular with our members and guests. Especially compared with most vending machines, which are filled with junk food, The Hurb offers a great selection of tasty, fresh and healthy snacking options. Much better for boosting productivity and avoiding sugar crashes.”

-Blair Golson

Project Director at Cross Campus

CURRENT LOCATIONS INCLUDE:

How Getting an Hurb Machine Works:

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that it is not always a possibility to donate but you can still help! Please share this and help get the word out to the world. Teamwork makes the dream work, and we need help spreading awareness about our campaign just as much as we need the funding.

  • Sharing is easy! Use the Indiegogo share tools located on the top of this page.

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

story:
Please share this campaign. We just can't get it out everywhere but it's success is going to be totally dependent on how many people see it. Post on your favorite Toyota groups and forums and anywhere you know where these superchargers are popular or frequently discussed.  Donations are very important but shares, likes and dropping links will be a huge asset as well. Thanks

 

For the last several years we have been trying to source bearings for the Toyota SC12 and SC14 superchargers. I probably spent hundreds of hours trying to find someone at Toyota who cared enough to try to help us find a way to source bearings. Unfortunately dozens of people blew us off. I couldn't find one person who cared or could direct me to somoene who might be able to help. Finally I gave up on getting any help from Toyota but I continued looking into this and continued trying to find information. Finally I got bearing part numbers that would allow us to get bearings made by NSK. Unfortunately to get bearings made you need to get a lot made.
We also need to get the recommended grease which is very expensive, along with some other tools and components to be able to rebuild these to OEM standards. We will also need to make some tooling and equipment to be able to replace the bearings properly.
By the time everything is said and done I figure we would be about $15,000 into tooling up to be able to make these. Not only can we not afford to do this on our own we are also not willing to invest that much in something that will take 40 years to make our money back so we need to know the demand is there before we risk moving forward. If we can raise this $8000 it will make the investment cost tolerable and will be a sign it's worth our investment in time, money and energy.

We are estimating a complete base level rebuild including all seals and bearings inside the supercharger plus a pulley rebuild will be $800. We will have options on top of that such as fine particle shot peening and or ceramic coating the housings, pulleys and other components, porting and polishing, and things like that. There may be additional charges as well if components are broken or need replacing. There are some components we may be able to get new from Ogura but there may also be components that can't be sourced. In that case we may have them here or you may need to source another supercharger to mix and match to make the best possible SC. In our experience these issues are very rare though.

Anyone who donates anything can apply that money toward a supercharger rebuild in the future.
Our base level rebuild will start at $800 so we will offer a special fundraising price of $600.
This means if you donate $600 or more during this fundraiser you will qualify for a base level rebuild. If you pay anything over $600 that will count towards upgrades or other options such as porting, ceramic coatings and things like that.
For our smaller donations we will try to do whatever we can as far as stickers or something like that. If however we break $9000 we will go a little further and send out some merch bags with some tee shirts and stickers or something like that.

If you have already had us service your supercharger we will give you $100 off if you don't want us to service the pulley bearing again.

The only catch is that we are doing this as an all or nothing campaign. We want some big donations that will go toward people getting their rebuilds and if we don't hit our mark that probably won't happen so we have to hit our goal for this to happen. If we don't, we might consider trying again in the future but don't count on it.

We got lucky and sourced a few of the gearbox side bearings which has allowed us to test our methods of pulling the old bearings out and installing the new bearings. We are now confident that we will be able to do this without any issues getting them back to factory specs.

It is also very likely this will allow us to rebuild other superchargers such as the TX12, TX15 and Tx20 such as is found on other Toyotas, Kawasaki PWC and many other machines.
story_txt:
Please share this campaign. We just can't get it out everywhere but it's success is going to be totally dependent on how many people see it. Post on your favorite Toyota groups and forums and anywhere you know where these superchargers are popular or frequently discussed.  Donations are very important but shares, likes and dropping links will be a huge asset as well. Thanks
 
For the last several years we have been trying to source bearings for the Toyota SC12 and SC14 superchargers. I probably spent hundreds of hours trying to find someone at Toyota who cared enough to try to help us find a way to source bearings. Unfortunately dozens of people blew us off. I couldn't find one person who cared or could direct me to somoene who might be able to help. Finally I gave up on getting any help from Toyota but I continued looking into this and continued trying to find information. Finally I got bearing part numbers that would allow us to get bearings made by NSK. Unfortunately to get bearings made you need to get a lot made.We also need to get the recommended grease which is very expensive, along with some other tools and components to be able to rebuild these to OEM standards. We will also need to make some tooling and equipment to be able to replace the bearings properly.By the time everything is said and done I figure we would be about $15,000 into tooling up to be able to make these. Not only can we not afford to do this on our own we are also not willing to invest that much in something that will take 40 years to make our money back so we need to know the demand is there before we risk moving forward. story:
Introducing HexZagon, the world's first combination of social media and online shopping. With HexZagon you can like the awesome new phone you just bought or tag the dress that you just know would be the perfect gift for your daughter's birthday. You can comment on the camera that has been on your wishlist for years or review the new laptop that your favorite company just announced. HexZagon even allows anyone, from big businesses to people just looking to get rid of a few used items, to sell their products on site so that you can find exactly what you're looking for, without having to leave the site. 

Just like any other form of social media, HexZagon allows users to "like" products so that you can give love to the products that matter the most to you.

Quickly sort products into categories like "Christmas 2016" or "Wishlist" so that they're there when you need them later. 

Have a discussion with other users about any product on the site. With commenting anyone can ask questions, tell other users about a product's cool features, or let people know that it's a product on their wishlist.

Reviewing makes it easier for you and other users to decide if they should buy something or not and can be vital in the decision-making process.

All products on the site are up for sale and offer safe and easy transactions with Stripe so that your hard earned money doesn't go to waste.

Anyone can sell their own products on the HexZagon website. Whether you're a big business or just looking to sell a few used items we've got you covered.

With gifting and chat, you can quickly tell anyone about awesome products you've seen on the site and send gifts right from your computer to other users. It's that easy.

 

HexZagon can help Promote your Products

Making shopping social means that people will share your products with other users, creating a virtually endless ripple effect and hundreds of customers for your business.

 

HexZagon makes Selling Anything Easier

With HexZagon you don't need to create your own website to sell products online. Just sign up for an account and add your products to the site. It's that easy. 

 

HexZagon makes Shopping more Entertaining

HexZagon helps users find more of the products that are actually interesting to them. The products that you see on your account are tailored to your interests, so you see more of the things that you actually like to buy.

 

HexZagon makes Shopping more Convenient

With HexZagon, you can buy products from all over the world without leaving the comfort of your home. Plus, HexZagon allows you to tag products making it possible to create shopping lists, wish lists, and more in just seconds. 

It all started one morning in December 2015, when I was in Grade 8. I was looking at different online marketplaces to sell some items when a thought hit me, what would happen if someone made shopping social?

I pondered over it for a long time, coming up with ideas every now and then,  but it took some time before any real development actually happened to the idea. Every once in a while I drew up some concepts, but not much actually happened until one day in February 2016.

I was helping someone out with a small computer issue when a friend of mine for several years came up to me and said 

        "Woah! You are going to be the next Mark Zuckerberg!"

To this day I don't know what made him say that at that moment, but right then I just knew that I had to tell him about my idea.

We immediately started discussing the concept and sharing ideas for the site, and in a matter of minutes, we were a team working together on developing the idea.

After some time we had a solid idea of how the website was going to work and had done quite a bit of research on other online marketplaces. We were extremely surprised to find that no one else had created anything like it. As we began sharing the idea with other people we started to get more and more support and began to see more ways that the site could be helpful in life. 

A couple months later, on a flight from Montreal to Quebec City, I started discussing HexZagon with another good friend of mine who was sitting in the seat next to me. For over an hour we talked to each other about the site. One thing led to another and within a week he had joined the project too and was officially a part of HexZagon.

Since then HexZagon has gone through many stages and has progressed so much further, but although we're no longer working together on the project, I've recently come to a point where we can't progress any further without the money required for web development, legal services, and more.

​

 

Stretch goals are extra goals we set so that if we reach our $75,000 goal, we can fund additional aspects of the project like new features for the site.

 

Spread the Word

We're always looking for ways to let people know about HexZagon. You can help by sharing our Indiegogo page (and our site once it is complete) on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, Tumblr, by email, by text, or by word of mouth.  

Follow us

We've got Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, & Pinterest so you have lots of options. 

Add your Products to our Site

If you work for a company that's looking to get more sales or have some items that you want to sell, add your products to our site! You'll get your things sold and we'll get more products on HexZagon! It's a win-win situation.

Use our Site

Just use it! Seriously! We didn't go through all this work to make a site that no one uses! Using our site shows us that you appreciate all the work that we've done, so seriously, just use it!

How do I sell things on HexZagon?

Just sign up, provide us with your preferred method of payment, enter some information about the product you're selling, and you're all set to go! If you're a business interested in selling items on HexZagon you may want to consider signing up for a business account (a special type of account for businesses selling their products on HexZagon). 

 

What are the fees for selling things on HexZagon?

We only charge 6.9% + 30¢ per sale. 

 

What is the difference between a business account and a regular account?

Both accounts allow people and businesses to sell their products on HexZagon, there are only a few minor differences between the two. Business accounts are meant for businesses who would like to sell their products on the site, whereas regular accounts are meant for people just looking to sell a few used items. 

 

Interested in asking us a question or have a comment about or crowdfunding campaign? Send us an email at thenewhexzagon@gmail.com. 

Certain Photos: Picjumbo.com

Music: Bensound.com

story:
Join us in heading the Social Gaming Movement in Portland Oregon!

www.ludologyllc.com

Why Us? We have the PASSION! With the dedication to mastering and fine-tuning the gaming experience, we believe Metarena can provide much more than an entertainment venue. We dream of a place where the online gaming community can interact face to face, creating real social connections.

We have the HEART! With the unique opportunity to help shape this fastly growing sport we believe we can make a difference in the culture, and community that supports it. With this surge of gamers, MetArena will be an amazing place for all to gather and share their commonalities.

Ludology LLC, formed in September 2017, is the result of the vision of its’ founders for an indoor venue that focuses on new technology and competitive gaming. that venue is Metarena and is currently in the funding stage.

We hope to be fully funded and built by March 2018. Offering several platforms of entertainment (virtual reality, PC's, and consoles), local food and beverage, merchandise, and high-end computers and gaming equipment, Metarena will be the premier place for gamers of all ages to gather.

This generation is longing for physical locations to bond and share their commonalities away from social media and the isolation of in-home gaming. Portland has no such place where pc and console gamers of all ages can interact by both competing and sharpening their skills.

This rapidly emerging market will soon demand these eSports facilities in every major city/college in the U.S. Many have already begun supporting this trend leaving Portland behind the curve. Social gaming in Portland is still largely bowling, putt putt, escape rooms and arcade style games.

Please note we are considering several design options. Images are for concept purposes only. Also, we appreciate your patience as our website is under construction. We are trying to set up all our dominoes on a close to nothing budget. Rewards may take a few months to receive after the campaign is over as we raise the rest of our required funding. This $100,000 is a crucial step in developing our dream.

We can't thank you enough for all your support.

story:
Are you a local in the Winter Garden/ Clermont and surrounding areas? Do you skate or bmx? If you said yes to any of the questions then you should hear us out! My name is Matt and im a local from Clermont Florida, my best friends Zach, Justin, and I are heavily into skateboarding and bmx! Our goal for this campaign is to raise enough money to open up our own local brick and mortar bmx/skate shop! We plan to host events to bring various people together in the community, and to provide an awesome chill spot and in the future a skate park!

 

  • We all currently work together running a successful Vape and E-Cig Brick and mortar shop in Clermont and to all of The Place to Vape family we love you for always supporting us and our goals!
  • We want to have a family friendly spot for the experienced Riders/Skaters and young crowd to learn about the industry/create their own style equipment/hangout and relax in a safe environment
  • As a community we need to bring everyone together especially during these crazy times!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share our campaign on social media let as many people as possible know about what we are trying to achieve, and what we hope to do to bring the community together
  • There are a bunch of Indiegogo share tools you can use to help us spread the word!

Thank you so much for listening to our story and spreading the word!

story:
Welcome to NorthBank Seafood!

NorthBank Seafood is not your typical fish market. Our facility will be a primary source of fresh sustainable seafood to the residents of Temecula Valley as well as a venue for hosting special events. From cooking and wine pairing classes, community gatherings showcasing local wineries and craft brewers, as well as a breadth of seasonal items made available throughout the year, our goal is to combine quality seafood with the unique resources Temecula Valley has to offer. I value the relationships I build with my customers and enjoy getting to know them on a first name basis, as well as extending the same hospitality to guests visiting our community. We invite everyone to come and experience seafood one step closer to the fishing boat.

With over 25 years of experience in the seafood industry, in both retail and wholesale distribution, I bring knowledge and the advantage of personal relationships with contacts throughout the seafood industry. The inclusion of wholesale accounts will allow for a quick turnover, providing a continued offering of the freshest product available for our retail customers as well.

In addition to a wide selection of sustainable seafood items, fresh fish, live lobster and crab, as well as frozen seafood options, the retail store will also offer a specialized selection of seafood paired wines crafted by Temecula Valley wineries, special blend seasonings, related cookware items and more as we grow.

With an emphasis on sustainable seafood, NorthBank Seafood will provide a unique and intelligent shopping experience, bringing you one step closer to the fishing boat.

We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you to our venue upon opening!

-Steve Isaksen and family


Fundraising Goal

Our goal is to open doors by the end of 2015. We are hoping to raise $29,000 through IndieGoGo. This will help in purchasing necessary equipment to get us up and running: walk-in coolers and showcase.
