story:
Hello. I'm Katherine.

Seven years ago, I inherited my father's DSLR camera. It's almost like I'm seeing through his eyes when I use it, and for that reason, it is very special. My father’s father was a semi-pro and, back in the day, had rucksacks full of lenses, puffy brushes, filters, and his own dark room. I’m hoping it’s a genetic thing and that one day I will be as good as they both were. 

I love photography, macro photography in particular because I’m fascinated with detail. My mind is animated when exploring the world in miniature and to be able to zoom in and capture these moments for other eyes to appreciate is very rewarding. In this fast paced world, it's often difficult to slow down and notice the smaller things. And, as we know, 'small is beautiful'.

Apart from dabbling in photography, I moonlight as an artist under my alter-ego, .katwolfe. I undertake small illustration and logo commissions, which I enjoy immensely; they give me a different kind of creative outlet outside of my professional role as a landscape architect.

Anyway, back to the photography. 

The sad part about my story is that I feel like a bit of a fraud. What I once thought was macro photography, is actually only 'macro' photography. The lens my father spent a long time researching and saving for, and that I inherited, is a multi-purpose, take it anywhere, shoot anything-type zoom lens, with a 'macro' setting. It's a great lens and I've taken some great photos with it, but it turns out my 'macro' photos, aren’t really macro at all. Technically, they’re only close-ups. 

So, just like my dad, I have now spent a good while researching the new tools I need to acquire in order to take actual macro photographs, develop my skills, and moonlight some more (which means producing more lovely things that people can enjoy and perhaps buy). 

During this process, I have learnt a lot about what has happened in the world of photography in the last seven years. It appears, dad's camera has been superseded by much bigger players, and, although I would like to go on using my dad's 'eyes' forever, if I want my macro photography to be as good as I'm imagining it can be, I need to retire his beloved camera and find my own way. 

Looking at the cost of an upgrade it seems that I need a wee bit of help. I've heard of people doing marvellous things through crowd funding sites and found myself thinking I should probably give it a go.  However, I don't believe it is right to just try and merely raise money from good people in order to purchase new, shiny tools; I want to use any help I can get to further myself and to create work people will enjoy. That's why this campaign is more important to me than just 'buying new stuff'; it's about nurturing .katwolfe.  

So, folks, here goes... no glossing over it, what I need is this:

  • a new camera body;
  • a proper macro lens;
  • a professional A3 photo printer; 
  • repro materials such as inks, photo-paper, cards, envelopes;
  • funds for larger scale / canvas printing (outsourced); and 
  • funds for postage and packing (to reward you all!).

I have considered what I am able to afford off my own back and would like to seek a further £2500 to make it all happen.  In return, and with huge thanks, I will send you limited edition perks! These will be prints or greetings cards of various sizes. There are even canvas prints up for grabs if you're feeling flash and generous. 

I have chosen to list my campaign as 'all or nothing' funding (a bit like myself), as it is important to me that any rewards I create are created as perfect as I can manage. A bit like a Michelin chef; if I cannot fulfill what's on the menu, I won't serve it.

I won't big up my project and say it's going to make a global impact or change your lives immeasurably, but it does mean the world to me.  

My biggest challenge in growing .katwolfe. is the juggling act I have to maintain between that and my professional employment i.e. time, and finding enough of it. I'm well rehearsed in burning that midnight oil (I'm an obsessive worker), but I also know when it's a good idea to zoom out. So, in light of that, I have given myself a lovely, long deadline to meet the challenge of producing beautiful work in reward for your generosity and faith.

Thank you so very much if you are able to help me, and even more so if you've managed to stay with me to the end of this! If you can't help me out with pennies please don't worry at all, but maybe you could share my plight in the hope that someone rich and famous hears it. And feels compelled to help.

Kx
story_txt:
Hello. I'm Katherine.


Seven
years ago, I inherited my father's DSLR camera. It's almost like I'm seeing
through his eyes when I use it, and for that reason, it is very special.
My father’s father was a semi-pro and, back in the day, had rucksacks full of
lenses, puffy brushes, filters, and his own dark room. I’m hoping it’s a
genetic thing and that one day I will be as good as they both were. 



I love
photography, macro photography in particular because I’m fascinated with detail.
My mind is animated when exploring the world in miniature and to be able to
zoom in and capture these moments for other eyes to appreciate is very
rewarding. In this fast paced world, it's often difficult to slow down and
notice the smaller things. And, as we know, 'small is beautiful'.



Apart from
dabbling in photography, I moonlight as an artist under my alter-ego, .katwolfe. I undertake small illustration and logo commissions, which I enjoy immensely; they give me a different kind of creative outlet outside of my professional role as a landscape architect.


Anyway, back
to the photography. 


The sad part about my story is that I feel like a bit of a fraud.
What I once thought was macro photography, is actually only 'macro'
photography. The lens my father spent a long time researching and saving for,
and that I inherited, is a multi-purpose, take it anywhere, shoot anything-type
zoom lens, with a 'macro' setting. It's a great lens and I've taken some great
photos with it, but it turns out my 'macro' photos, aren’t really macro at all. Technically, they’re only close-ups. 


So, just
like my dad, I have now spent a good while researching the new tools I need to
acquire in order to take actual macro photographs, develop my skills, and moonlight some more
(which means producing more lovely things that people can enjoy and perhaps buy). 


During this
process, I have learnt a lot about what has happened in the world of
photography in the last seven years. It appears, dad's camera has been
superseded by much bigger players, and, although I would like to go on using my dad's
'eyes' forever, if I want my macro photography to be as good as I'm imagining
it can be, I need to retire his beloved camera and find my own way. 


Looking at
the cost of an upgrade it seems that I need a wee bit of help. I've heard of
people doing marvellous things through crowd funding sites and found myself
thinking I should probably give it a go.  However, I don't believe it is right to just try and merely raise money from good people in order to purchase new, shiny tools; I want to use any help I can get to further myself and to create work people will enjoy. That's why this campaign is more important to me than just 'buying new stuff'; it's about nurturing .katwolfe.  
So, folks, here goes... no glossing over it, what I need is this:



a new camera body;

a proper macro lens;
a professional A3 photo printer; 
repro materials such as inks, photo-paper, cards, envelopes;
funds for larger scale / canvas printing (outsourced); and 
funds for postage and packing (to reward you all!).


I have considered what I am able to afford off my own back and would like to seek a further £2500 to make it all happen.  In return, and with huge thanks, I will send you limited edition perks! These will be prints or greetings cards of various sizes. There are even canvas prints up for grabs if you're feeling flash and generous. 
I have chosen to list my campaign as 'all or nothing' funding (a bit like myself), as it is important to me that any rewards I create are created as perfect as I can manage. A bit like a Michelin chef; if I cannot fulfill what's on the menu, I won't serve it.
I won't big up my project and say it's going to make a global impact or change your lives immeasurably, but it does mean the world to me.  
My biggest challenge in growing .katwolfe. is the juggling act I have to maintain between that and my professional employment i.e. time, and finding enough of it. I'm well rehearsed in burning that midnight oil (I'm an obsessive worker), but I also know when it's a good idea to zoom out. So, in light of that, I have given myself a lovely, long deadline to meet the challenge of producing beautiful work in reward for your generosity and faith.
Thank you so very much if you are able to help me, and even more so if you've managed to stay with me to the end of this! If you can't help me out with pennies please don't worry at all, but maybe you could share my plight in the hope that someone rich and famous hears it. And feels compelled to help.
Kx

story:
CONFETTI… SWEETS

Sweetaly is a young company with the mission to bring you something new from sweet Italian traditions.


CONFETTI OR "CONFETTI"?

Everyone knows confetti, of course!

But… do you know what “confetti” means for Italians?

In Italy every time there’s something special to celebrate, confetti are always the special guest and everybody eats at least one confetto as a good omen.

Eat confetti???

Yes, because Italian confetti are delicious little traditional sweets made with almonds or nuts coated with chocolate and covered with a very thin layer of sugar.

They look like very small eggs filled with sweetness.

The story of the confetto starts a long time ago: it is said that Ancient Romans used them to celebrate weddings and births; centuries later, they were thrown out from the balconies of noble palaces during Carnival time. And so this went on until these days.

Sweetaly wants to bring you these extraordinary Italian “sugarplums” and ensures that your life becomes special everyday, a true daily celebration.


FIND THE RIGHT “CONFETTO”, MADE FOR YOU!

There are so many different flavors and kinds of confetti to choose from… and to combine with one another!

                                            

FOR TRADITIONALS: you have to try the Avola confetto, the best Sicilian almond (renowned in the world) just covered by a tiny layer of sugar to enhance the delicate fruit taste.

FOR REAL FOODIES:  you have to try one of the incredible flavors, going from the less strange (such as strawberry, orange or coconut) to the most unusual ones (such as tiramisù, marron glacée, champagne or baba with cream). More than 50 flavors are waiting for you.

IF YOU DON’T FANCY ALMONDS: we do have the right confetto for you too. Instead of an almond, the heart of this small sweet can be a nut, a marshmallow, a wafer, a caramelized popcorn or a piece of dehydrated fruit!

FOR HEALTH LOVERS: we have the “Wellness line” in which you can find dairy free, vegan, organic, sugar free confetto.

Furthermore all our products are gluten free (except wafer, cereals and cookies confetto)


DO YOU CRAVE FOR MORE?

To integrate Sweetaly’s offer we also decide to offer you the highest quality Italian chocolates from Tuscany, a country that has a very old chocolate tradition even if some other places are more famous, such as Piemonte or Umbria.

Different lines and tastes to satisfy discerning palates: from chocolate creams to pralines, from chocolate cakes to little squared chocolate candies, perfect for an “Italian after coffee”.

                                                

Beautiful vintage packages wrap these delicious products, because also presentation is important.

                     


WHO WE ARE:

I’m Silvia and I used to be a wedding planner in Italy, a career that drove me to discovering confetti and their “taste evolution” through the years. There were no weddings without a big and special “confetti table”, that was assaulted every time by the guests: in a few minutes cups and bowles were found empty!

So I became a friend of one of the most important confetti factories in Italy, a company founded at the end of IX century.

They are my exclusive partners and suppliers for confetti in this project.

“Maxtris” are really the very best confetti in the world!

Day after day my project became more and more ambitious:  why don’t add Italian chocolate too?

Even when choosing my chocolate supplier I relied on my “friendships” so I contacted “La Molina”: high quality raw materials, skillful manufacturing and vintage packages are the strong points of this company.

The name comes from “molinillo”, the tool used to prepare hot chocolate by the private chocolate maker of Marie Therese, wife of the Sun King of France.

                                          


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP!

As you saw in the video New Yorkers tasted our products, and they liked them!

Often they asked us where they could find our Italian confetti in the City…but at the moment they can’t!

That’s why we are asking you a help to open the Sweetaly store in New York.

We’ve seen a cute and beautiful place in Soho that would be perfect for the shop.

We plan to recreate the typical atmosphere of an Italian small deli store: welcoming, colorful and friendly; scented of chocolate and sugar. But at the same time we want it young, smart and very “New Yorker”.

The shop will virtually be divided in two parts: confetti and chocolates.

We have a lot of ideas about the “confetti&chocolate project”: store layout, customized packages, and special services for customers, both private and business.

What about CONFETTI: while in Italy every small town has its confetti shop, in New York there’s nothing of the sort. Italian confetti must find their “house” in the City, as at the moment they can’t be found in any other store, and we want to have the possibility of creating it!

New York and New Yorkers miss not having a confetti shop.

Our supplier is very research and development oriented, so periodically the product list will be enhanced… stay tuned!

And, last but not least, our confetti have a “Siks” kosher certification!

What about CHOCOLATE: also our chocolate supplier is always searching for something new to present, and sometimes adds new and interesting ingredients to enhance the flavor of the chocolate. And the courage wins!

In our shop it will be possible for you to taste chocolate with rosemary, sage, balsamic vinegar or “salty” chocolate.

The marketing manager is a true artist and painter, so the packages will be a perfect mix of art and commercial features: as said previously also the presentation is important.

There will also be a chocolate bar corner where everyone will be able to find the perfect “chocolate cup” choosing it between some daily flavors (mint, cinnamon, etc…); in winter time you will warm yourself with a hot chocolate, in summer time refresh yourself with a cold one.

We know that in New York there are lots of sweets and chocolate shops but our store has some specific strong points:

  • You will find Italian confetti only in our store
  • We will sell handmade products, and with new interesting tastes
  • We will give you the highest service possible. For example: in summertime and when it’s too hot we will put your box of chocolates and confetti in a bag with thermal insulation to preserve the product; you will be able to customize your confetti box with your favorite flavors; etc…

We think our store will be different from every other sweet store,


SO BELIEVE IN US AND WILL MAKE YOU PROUD OF US!

Help us to serve you our sweet Italian experience!

Directly in the New York store or easily at home thanks to our e-commerce.

We bet that once you eat a confetto you’ll never stop because one confetto leads to another!


Let us make your daily life special, celebrate life with us!

Spread the word! 
SPREAD THE "SWEETNESS"!

story:
Hi folks, I am Engineer Geofrey Mukasa, CEO/Director of NETBAC AGENCY LTD and CEO of OSOMS a subsidiary of NETBAC AGENCY LTD, I am a petroleum engineer by profession and an entrepreneur by nature.

My campaign of FOOD VALUE ADDITION idea was born from the harsh fact that Uganda and most African Countries are the one of the leading producers of organic foods in the World but unfortunately 2/3rds of the total food produced in Uganda and other African countries go to waste due to lack of value addition and modern preservation methods to save all the produced foods.

This campaign is very important to me because of various reasons;

1.  This will help to increase food security in Uganda, Africa and the World at large, as it has been said that without food people are only left with three options; They can riot, They can migrate or worst they can die, and no one can whish that onto themselves, see the current situation in Malawi and other countries are facing this fatal problem and yet we can do something about it.

2. This will not only save people’s lives by providing reliable nutritious organic foods in Uganda, Africa and the World over, it will also create jobs and careers to thousands and thousands of professionals from all over the world.

3. And most importantly by promoting Food Value Addition, we can all make the World a better home for all of us, as one legend said ‘’ Stay hungry stay foolish’’, and with this campaign we can all fight hidden hunger in the World at large, please contribute to this noble cause, you never know how many people you can truly touch and make a brighter day for them and how much it can help you yourself.

WHAT YOU WILL HELP ME ACHIEVE?

Firstly and most importantly you will help me achieve my dream of making the world a better place for all of us, by at least providing food security to the most unpreveraged citizens of the world, We can only be able to achieve this together only through improving food value addition and preservation methods so that all the produced foods can have a longer shelf life and they can easily be procured to the people who might be needing it the most before it get wasted, as you know 2/3rds of African total produced foods got wasted annually due to lack of food value addition and modern preservation methods, too sad right? So please help me translate this idea into reality and we reverse this situation together, Thanks!!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $3,382,352 USD, and on this money we will buy enough land around a square mile estimated at around $588,235 USD (2 Billion Ugandan Shillings), we will also have to construct enough facilities to handle the sorting, processing, packaging and storage of foods and fruits which are estimated at around  $1,500,000 USD (5.1 Billion Ugandan Shillings), we will create a Research and Development facility (R&D) which will focus on coming up with new advanced technologies for Food Value Addition and preservation methods, with the main mission of maintain the natural composition of the preserved foods as natural as possible, this R&D facility will command an estimate of $294,117 USD (1 Billion Ugandan Shillings), we will also need procurement of production lines in the sorting, processing, packaging and storage facilities to enable easy and optimized handling of the Value Addition process these are estimated at around $1,000,000 USD (3.4 Billion Ugandan Shillings), Because we are already legally existing with Certificate of Incorporation  number 174115 & TIN. 1006855530. We are competent to make this mission come true of course with your support and contribution to this noble cause.

What you will get?

Please check my various 7 perks I have arranged for you my valued supporter and contributor and please help me to spread the word by sharing this campaign to your friends, family and the world at large, Thanks a lot.

If I do not reach my entire goal of $3,382,352 USD I will use the raised funds to start on the project and see where they can reach me and certainly I will fundraise again for the remaining sectors in order to accomplish the whole mission as planned, but I have faith in you that together we can raise this amount with ease in this one campaign.

The Impact of this Campaign

This project I truly think and believe that it is very valuable not only to Uganda where it is going to be based but also to the whole of Africa and the World at large! Trust me we all need good and nutritious foods and fruits no matter who you are or where you are located, food is a basic need and the only fuel for life and without it death will surly preside over. This project is meant to ensure food security in Uganda, Africa and the world at large, as you heard from the Ambassador, Uganda can be a food basket of the whole world, if only supported by you and me, because we are the world and we are the true children of the land, so let us start giving and make the world a better home for all of us. Please check the video above.

Risks & Challenges

Well the earth was not created in one day! It took GOD six days to create it, right!, So I expect a few challenges like procurement of equipment and the whole process of setting up the project, but those are just challenges of growth that will only make us better if not greater, and of course with your help by contributing both monetary and ideally this project will surely be a walkover. And yes together we can!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please due to the importance of this campaign, I kindly request you to please, if you can`t contribute monetary or ideally, atleast get the word out and make some noise about this campaign #FOODVALUEADDITION and it is notably to do both if it pleases you. Thank you so much for your contribution!

And please do not forget to use the Indiegogo share tools too! They can do magic!!

How can I reach out to your team?

We are developing a community portal on our website which is under construction to get to know you! In the meantime, message us on Facebook and we’ll be sure to respond as soon as possible.

I’m having trouble making a contribution. What should I do?

Email support@indiegogo.com

story:
I’m married man, I have child, and my mother is very ill, I help my brother and my mother, I don’t have house to live in it.

I don’t have work and money to help my mother and my child.

I need your help to help me to can do project, I want to buy a car to work on the car.

Please help me to can buy a car.

Thanks.

story:
Short Summary

         We are a team of young people who are extremely excited to open a decent hostel in Denver that provides an inviting  and high quality space for people who are traveling on a budget or who like the social aspect of meeting other travelers from all over the world. We love to travel ourselves and know that there is nothing more important than a comfortable and inviting place to sleep and relax when you return back from sightseeing and exploring the area. Hostels have been around for more than a century and provide an affordable way for travelers to vacation without breaking the bank. We have all of the stages of our company completed and are open to begin business starting March 2018. We are needing additional funding to make this dream a reality. In order to pay of the initial start up costs it is important that we build a solid foundation in our funding and acquiring our first customers through this site makes perfect sense. We invite you to please take a moment to review the details of our campaign and to reach out to us if you have any questions of which we will be glad to answer. 

What You Get

         Our dorm beds have everything you need to charge and recharge for long days of sightseeing and our rooms are comfy and cozy, but you won’t be able to resist hanging out in our common areas where you’ll meet fascinating travelers from around the world. Safety is a priority at Sun and Moon and the facility will include many safety features like keyless entry with your smartphone. We will also have separate all female and all male rooms. 

  • Great location near public transit and major attractions
  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Free continental breakfast or try our Deluxe Breakfast Menu for more options
  • Free pool table
  • Free Luggage storage & Lockers
  • Bike storage
  • 24-hour assistance 
  • Laundry facilities
  • Coffee and tea
  • All toiletries and bathroom essentials included 
  • Designated smoking area for guests (cigarettes or Marijuana)

Continental Breakfast:

  • Banana Nut Muffins 
  • Spiced Apple Oatmeal 
  • breakfast sausages 
  • cereal in boxes 
  • fruit  
  • waffles with syrup 
  • Biscuits and Gravy 

 

Drinks: 

  • Orange Juice 
  • Milk Individual package 
  • Apple Juice 
  • Cranberry Juice 

Deluxe Breakfast Menu Options

     If you want to switch it up and have something more unique and delectable then try our Deluxe Breakfast Menu Options. We will have a professional cook who will come in each morning to prepare the daily continental breakfast and will be on standby to prepare the made to order paid meals off our deluxe menu. These menu items will have a price range of $8 to $15 and are listed in below. 

  • Deconstructed Sweet Potato Hash with Fried Eggs
  • French Toast with Strawberries and Cream
  • Croque Madame
  • Scrambled Eggs with Smoked Salmon

 

Perk Conditions

  • All perks are subject to availability and must be used in one visit, unless you buy more than one perk package. 
  • Each perk is valid for one person and one dorm room size bed. Perks can be gifted as long as you haven't made a reservation yet.
  • You can begin a reservation starting now.
  • After choosing your perk, you will receive a personalized voucher via email within 8 hours with code to save for future use or to reserve your stay now for any available days from March, 01 2018 on wards. Days are subject to availability. There will be a link in the email to reserve your stay in our Hostel Calendar.
  • All perks are subject to bed availability at hostel and expire with in 2 years. We are open everyday of the year. 
  • A valid government id is required at check-in. Only adults 18 years of age and older can check in. International travelers welcomed. 
  • If you buy a perk please indicate if you are male or female in the notes section during checkout.  
  • We welcome groups of travelers and will try to accommodate you as needed. 

Our Guarantee

      We Guarantee to fulfill your booking with us with in the next 1 year or your money back. As long as the Perk Conditions (above) are followed you are Guaranteed a booking slot for the perk you paid for. If for some reason we aren't able to open up for business to deliver our services you will be refunded back through Indiegogo. Your funding will help us cover the furniture, city fees and any other start up costs associated with getting us into compliance to provide quality accommodations. This is a legitimate campaign so feel free to contribute with confidence. If you have any questions, concerns or suggestions please feel free to contact us at any time and we will reach back to you within 24 hours via email or even phone call if necessary. 

Our Home - Denver, Colorado

      The Mile High City — is where urban sophistication meets outdoor adventure. Denver is an outdoor city known for its world-class cultural attractions, thriving craft breweries, chef-driven dining and red-hot music scene, all within easy reach of the Rocky Mountains. Whether you’re looking to ski the world-famous Rocky Mountains, explore the many cities and towns or enjoy breathtaking natural beauty, you’ll find your perfect adventure in Colorado. The state’s four distinct seasons, 300 days of annual sunshine and great vacation values make this the perfect time to plan a trip.

      You can tell from its skyline alone that Denver is a major metropolis, with a Major League Baseball stadium at one end of downtown and the State Capitol building at the other. But look to the west to see where Denver distinguishes itself in the majestic Rocky Mountains, snow-peaked and breathtakingly huge, looming in the distance. This combination of urban sprawl and proximity to nature is what gives the city character and sets it apart as a destination.                             Throughout the 1960s and 1970s, when the city mushroomed on a huge surge of oil and energy revenues, Denver worked on the transition from Old West "cow town" to a comfortable, modern place to live. The city demolished its large downtown Skid Row area, paving the way for developments such as the Tabor Center and the Auraria multicollege campus. In the early 1990s mayors Federico Peña and Wellington Webb championed a massive new airport to replace the rickety Stapleton. Then the city lured Major League Baseball, in the form of the purple-and-black Colorado Rockies, and built Coors Field in the heart of downtown. Around the stadium, planners developed LoDo, a business-and-shop ping area including hip nightclubs, Larimer Square boutiques, and bike and walking paths.                                                                                      Since the mid-1990s Denver has caught the attention of several major national corporations looking to move their operations to a thriving city that enjoys a relatively stable economy and a healthy business climate. And win or lose, the sports teams continue to imbue the city with a sense of pride.                                                                                                                                                                       Many Denverites are unabashed nature lovers who can also enjoy the outdoors within the city limits by walking along the park-lined river paths downtown. (Perhaps as a result of their active lifestyle, Denverites are among the "thinnest" city residents in the United States, and the city is named annually as one of the healthiest in the nation.) For Denverites, preserving the environment and the city's rich mining and ranching heritage are of equally vital importance to the quality of life.                                                                                                                                                                  LoDo, a business-and-shopping area, buzzes with jazz clubs, restaurants, and art galleries housed in carefully restored century-old buildings. The culturally diverse populace avidly supports the Denver Art Museum, the Denver Museum of Nature & Science, the Museo de las Americas, and the new History Colorado Center (formerly the Colorado History Museum). The Denver Performing Arts Complex is the nation's second-largest theatrical venue, bested in capacity only by New York's Lincoln Center. An excellent public transportation system, including a popular, growing light-rail system and 850 miles of bike paths, makes getting around easy.

 

Our Team

     

    Some Airbnb Reviews

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please help us to spread the word and share this campaign with your friends, family and other like-minded budget travel lovers. THANK YOU so much supporting and backing us. It means the world to us – literally. Please share our story on social media by using the easy Indiegogo share options on this website.

story:
What if we could develop a platform that creates real opportunities for aspiring entrepreneurs in the property services sector by leveraging technology in a similar way Uber builds opportunities for drivers?

We invite you to join us in this initiative and help us;

· Build a new future for young tradespeople in South Africa

· Contribute to an innovative business platform for property installations and maintenance services

· Create real employment opportunities through the acceleration of small businesses


About OnCall

OnCall is a state-of-the-art platform accessible via web or mobile app which matches the installation and maintenance needs of property owners to suitable tradespeople. Whether its tiling, plumbing or handyman services, OnCall provides reliable, suitably qualified and pre-vetted people to do the job. Via our platform, customers receive quick responses to requests plus access to efficient, high quality service providers who charge fair and consistent prices. Rigorous vetting processes ensure that only suitably qualified people with no criminal records enter the system while customer ratings combined with internal quality assurance processes ensure only good performers continue to be listed.

We offer customers more than a curated listing service - we offer peace of mind. When requesting a service, customers will be matched with a professional service partner who has the appropriate equipment and skills to complete the job properly. Should a customer not be 100% satisfied, OnCall will manage the situation until the situation is resolved. 

OnCall aims to be more than just a listing service. We aim to create a positive impact on the people in our industry. Here is how;


The Problem

Youth unemployment is currently a major challenge in South Africa. A quarter of the population is unemployed and this rises to over 35% amongst people under 35 years of age. South African youth can no longer wait for the government to provide easy employment options in the public sector. Also, formal business is not growing fast enough to create enough jobs.

For many young South African’s, it is very difficult to gain access to sustainable business opportunities. Socio-economic inequality is prevalent with the gap between the rich and poor is one of the highest in the world even 21 years after the end of apartheid. While many people have skills and talent, they all too often they lack the capital and access to credit to purchase vehicles and equipment they need to start their own small business. Also, there are simply insufficient mechanisms to adequately support tradespeople and artisans wanting to work for themselves. While the problems are complex we have found an innovative solution making it possible for this group.


The solution

Oncall’s mission is to offer a safe, nurturing and supportive environment for budding entrepreneurs while providing a reliable service. Customers are assured of good quality not only because all artisans and tradespeople are properly qualified, trained and vetted, but also because there is an inbuilt rating system that ensures accountability. Our platform builds an extensive network of resources designed to build successful business. These resources include access to large markets, technical and soft skills training, access to preferential pricing on parts/materials and access to vehicle and equipment financing. 

Furthermore, OnCall helps partners start and manage their business by taking care of administration, invoicing, record-keeping, scheduling and payment collections at no additional cost. Service partners also benefit from productivity improvements provided by the location based, on-demand platform.


Social impact

What if you could help create opportunities for young professional tradespeople? Imagine at the same time you were also helping them create sound, sustainable businesses making a real difference in growing employment within South Africa? 

OnCall’s aims to break down business and socio-economic barriers South Africans tradespeople currently face, paving the way for their entrepreneurial dreams to be realized. OnCall leverages the scale benefits of technology and lowers barriers by providing access to lucrative markets, business finance and reliable business systems supported by a mentorship programme. Our intention is to be a socially responsible business creating an uplifting and enabling environment in our sector. We will open doors for hundreds of people who want to put their skills to work yet would not have been able to achieve this without mentorship and assistance.


Our journey

The research, conceptualisation and design phases are complete and we have tested the business case through research, surveys and interviews. Recently, we partnered with a large South African retailer in the home supplies sector and will provide services through their store network. The technology build is underway and while the founders have invested significant time, energy and funds to this point, we need assistance to complete the project. We appeal for your financial support so we can make this initiative the exciting reality it promises to be.

Target

We are confident that the $100k target will allow us to complete the technology build and provide sufficient seed capital for launch in May 2016. Our goal is to create opportunities for no fewer than 250 young South African entrepreneurs by 2017 representing 25% of our estimated 1 000 service partners.

In the event that we don't reach our target, we shall commit all contributions received to the development, and continue searching for the shortfall elsewhere. If our target is exceeded, funds will go to accelerating the roll-out plan.


Benefits

To society: Once poverty and unemployment are eradicated and people build up their own businesses they become economically self-reliant and lead purposeful lives.  OnCall contributes to making this possible. In this way society benefits not only from the development of new entrepreneurs but also from the successful piloting of an innovative approach to entrepreneurial development. By stimulating successful small businesses, we can restore dignity to a marginalised group and have a positive social impact.

To customers: Unlike listing services, OnCall takes ownership over the quality of service. When anything in a customer’s home needs installation or repair, they can now find a trustworthy, reliable, readily available and affordable service. Since customer satisfaction is central to the Oncall brand, our systems and processes seek to eliminate most of the common problems experienced in this space. OnCall ensures that partners use quality parts and charge fair and competitive prices.

To the youth: OnCall offers business support for enthusiastic young entrepreneurs with a turnkey business platform, access to credit, customers and training.  In addition Oncall gives artisans and tradespeople opportunities to hone their skills, access business opportunities and receive feedback and mentorship about how to start and successfully manage their businesses. Rather than involvement in intermittent work, young people in South Africa will receive the necessary support and tools to build up profitable and sustainable businesses.


Corporate governance

OnCall is a for-profit company registered in South Africa (registration number 2015/150051/07). We have a properly constituted board of directors which includes members with local and international board experience and who are required to act in accordance with good governance principles as set out in the incorporation documents.  


General inquiries and comments

Our website, facebook page and other social media sites are currently in development and will be up and running shortly. In the interim, you are invited to contact us at info@OnCallSA.co.za

story:
Hallo, ich bin Pasquale!
Wenn ich nicht als Trainer oder Guide auf dem Rad sitze, kümmere ich mich um meine Familie und um flitzbike. Nein im Ernst, das Fahrrad ist – nach meiner Familie und meinem Beruf – meine Lebensphilosophie! Ich verstehe mich aber nicht als Radfahrer, der sein Hobby zum Beruf gemacht hat. Das ist definitiv zu wenig. Meine Erfahrungen im Maschinenbaubereich haben gezeigt, daß fünf eben nicht gerade sind. Das habe ich verinnerlicht und mit in die Fahradbranche genommen. Und das gebe ich auch an unsere Kunden weiter.

Wir leben fahrrad

und ticken ein wenig anders als der Rest der Branche. Denn wir  verstehen uns nicht nur als Fahrradproduzent sondern auch als Dienstleister zum Thema "Radfahren" und "Umwelt". So fokussieren wir uns speziell auf das Thema "Schnelle Pedelecs" und konkurrieren hierbei weniger mit anderen Fahrradherstellern als vielmehr mit dem Auto. Nachhaltige Mobilität! – Wenn schon nicht mit dem Auto so wenigstens doch mit dem Rad!


Nun in der Wachstumsphase möchte der momentane Geschäftsführer die Firma flitzbike aus persönlichen Gründen an mich übergeben. Lange überlegen musste ich nicht, da keiner das Unternehmen so gut kennt wie ich selbst und ich von einem gesunden Wachstum in der Zukunft überzeugt bin. Angesichts unser erfolgreichen Entwicklung in den letzten Jahren  bin ich überzeugt: flitzbike wird rocken! Hierfür benötige ich eure Hilfe als Investoren.

Hand in Hand

Um überhaupt die Möglichkeit bekommen zu haben, Euch anzusprechen, habe ich bereits selbst mein Erspartes für eine detailierte Unternehmensberatung inkl. Medien eingesetzt. Leider reicht das nicht aus und ich benötige mindestens 35.000 Euro zur Weiterführung bzw. Neugründung des Unternehmens. Ein bedeutender Teil des Umsatzes für 2016 ist schon in trockenen Tüchern, muss aber – zusätzlich zu den Gründungskosten – vorfinanziert werden.


Unsere Benefits liegen im Thema Fahrrad und Pedelecs/E-Bikes. Vom Schrauberkurs bis zum hochwertigen eBike. Mehr findet Ihr bei den Perks.

Da wir die Kapitalbeschaffung nicht eingleisig fahren, wird das gesammelte Geld auf jeden Fall zum Weiterführen der Firma verwendet. Kann dies nicht umgesetzt werden, bekommt jeder sein Geld zurück!

Sinnvolles Tun


Alle reden von Umwelt und Klimaschutz. Wir hatten uns gedacht, wir MACHEN mal! Zumal wir unseren direkten Mitbewerber mehr im Auto als im Fahrrad sehen. Wusstet ihr, daß der deutsche Autofahrer bei einer täglichen 30-Minuten-Anfahrt  ins Großstadtbüro durchschnittlich circa 80 Stunden im Jahr im Pendlerstau steht? Viele unserer Bestandskunden tun dies mit einem unserer schnellen Pedelecs nicht mehr – sie kommen pünktlich an. Vielleicht schaffen wir auch in deutschen Klein- wie Großstädten ein zweites, drittes ... "Kopenhagen" zu schaffen. Bewegung schafft ein eBike allemal, ganz zu schweigen von der nachhaltigen mobilen Freiheit.
Da wir nun schon seit drei Jahren gewissermaßen als Baby unter Menschenfressern überlebt und aus begangenen Fehlern auch gelernt haben, sehen wir der Zukunft sehr positiv und überzeugt entgegen. Um diese Überzeugung zu festigen, hatten wir uns in den letzten Wochen vor der Entscheidung professionelle bzw. neutrale Unterstützung durch eine Unternehmensberatung ins Haus geholt.

Die kommenden Herausforderungen für flitzbike


Wir denken unkonventionell, sind dennoch bodenständig und versuchen immer den Horizont im Auge zu behalten. Wachstum heißt für uns nicht, die Masse zu bedienen. Im Haifschbecken Fahrrad kann nur überleben, wer sich spezialisiert. Gleichwohl streben wir ein gesundes Wachstum an. Lange haben wir uns die Köpfe darüber zerbrochen, ob wir uns weiterhin dieser Herausforderung stellen wollen. Unsere Antwort ist – aufgrund unserer Erfahrungen und positiven Entwicklung der letzten drei Jahre – ein ganz klares: Ja!


Im Zuge unserer Überlegungen haben wir beschlossen, den Schwerpunkt bei der eBike-/Pedelec-Entwicklung auf den Bau von Getriebefahrrädern weiter zu intensivieren. Getreu unserer Vorstellung von einem höchstmöglich wartungsarmen, frei zu konfigurierendem eBike werden wir unsere Modellpalette daher konsolidieren. Das heisst konkret: Wir richten die flitzbike-Modellpalette allein auf Getriebefahrräder aus, Mittelmotormodelle werden reduziert bzw. eingestellt.  Mittelmotor-eBikes fallen unter den Punkt "Masse". Diese können und wollen wir nicht mehr bedienen. 

Ergänzend zu unseren Produkten führen wir momentan einen Kundenservice auf einem derart qualitativ hohem Niveau ein, wie es in der Automobilbranche üblich ist. Der Dienst am Kunden scheint unserer Ansicht nach im Bereich Fahrrad nicht vorhanden. Dem einen oder anderen Kunden haben wir manche Service-Stichworte bereits angedeutet und sie kommen an: "Mobiler Radservice", "Testradservice", "Workshops", "Fahrtechnik-Kurse" usw. – All dies gehört zum Fahrrad- bzw. eBikekauf dazu. Bedienen tuts keiner, vermisst wirds von vielen!


Vielen Dank fürs Weitersagen!

Es heißt so schön: Das wahre Kapital einer Unternehmung sind Kontakte. Wir danken allen, die bereit sind, unser Vorhaben weiterzugeben. Nur so können wir unseren Traum in die Tat umsetzen und unserer Verantwortung gegenüber unseren Kunden wie Interessenten gerecht werden.
Eine große Bitte: Nutzt INDIEGOGO für´s Weitersagen!

Ich danke für Eure Zeit und Eure Unterstützung und stehe natürlich jederzeit Rede und Antwort!

Pasquale
story_txt:
Hallo, ich bin Pasquale! Wenn ich nicht als Trainer oder Guide auf dem Rad sitze, kümmere ich mich um meine Familie und um flitzbike. Nein im Ernst, das Fahrrad ist – nach meiner Familie und meinem Beruf – meine Lebensphilosophie! Ich verstehe mich aber nicht als Radfahrer, der sein Hobby zum Beruf gemacht hat. Das ist definitiv zu wenig. Meine Erfahrungen im Maschinenbaubereich haben gezeigt, daß fünf eben nicht gerade sind. Das habe ich verinnerlicht und mit in die Fahradbranche genommen. Und das gebe ich auch an unsere Kunden weiter. 


Wir leben fahrrad
und ticken ein wenig anders als der Rest der Branche. Denn wir  verstehen uns nicht nur als Fahrradproduzent sondern auch als 
Dienstleister zum Thema "Radfahren" und "Umwelt". So fokussieren wir uns
 speziell auf das Thema "Schnelle Pedelecs" und konkurrieren hierbei 
weniger mit anderen Fahrradherstellern als vielmehr mit dem Auto. 
Nachhaltige Mobilität! – Wenn schon nicht mit dem Auto so wenigstens doch
 mit dem Rad!
 Nun in der Wachstumsphase möchte der momentane Geschäftsführer die Firma flitzbike aus persönlichen Gründen an mich übergeben. Lange überlegen musste ich nicht, da keiner das Unternehmen so gut kennt wie ich selbst und ich von einem gesunden Wachstum in der Zukunft überzeugt bin. Angesichts unser erfolgreichen Entwicklung in den letzten Jahren  bin ich überzeugt: flitzbike wird rocken! Hierfür benötige ich eure Hilfe als Investoren. 
    Hand in Hand

story:
Short Summary

Hello Vapers, we are Underground Vape, a Startup Company From London UK. We need your help to launch this brand on early 2016, we have made some Beta-testing and we are confident to say that we have created some new exciting flavors.

70%VG 30%PG

Our E-Liquids are Produced only with the finest UK sourced materials 

We only use Pharmaceutical grade Nicotine

Our Range will be available in  0% 0. 6%  & 1.2% Nicotine Levels,  70%VG 30%PG


What We Need & What You Get

You will be the among the first people to try our E-liquids

All the  reviewers that tested our Beta-version E-liquids                                                gave us their absolute vouch of approval 

We Need

- To know that People are supporting us, so we invest all our effort into bringing this    Line of E-Liquids  to the market.

- Money for our first batch, produced in a commercial kitchen environment with all sterilized equipment.

- Buy the domain  for our website. 

- Marketing and P.R.

(All additional funding will be provided by us, but through this campaign we aim to know if we are going to have the support from the public to take this risk)


The Impact

New exciting flavors that will be breaching a gap on the Vaping market

=Bacon Street=     Delicious Explosive Crispy Bacon

=Mayfair Milk=       Goodness Heaven Hell Milky Flavor 

=Camden Nutts=  That Nutty taste that you get from the best selling spreadable on                                      the world ( You know what we are talking about ;p)

=Bethnal Candy=  For the ones with the sweet tooth


Risks & Challenges

Absolutely no Risks!!!

 Just Fun and Excellent Tasting E-liquids is what you are going to get from us!


Other Ways You Can Help

We know that you didn't had the opportunity to try our flavors (YET) But if you are a Supporter or just like the idea of this new exciting flavors coming to market , please consider sharing this project on social media, 

THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!!

story:
Meet

We started developing 3DimMaker almost 2 years ago. The main goal was to develop a reliable 3D printing instrument for FDM (Fused Deposition Modeling) printing of large and complex models with thin parts and errors in the surface definition. Because there were no "slicers"  that were robust enough to slice the model into horizontal layers correctly and to generate G-code for the printer, 3DimMaker uses its own robust slicer.



What Makes 3DimMaker Different?

3DimMaker allows you to generate G-code (instructions for 3D printers) from imported 3D models using one of the predefined, or a customized, printing profiles. These are the key 3DimMaker features you will benefit from:

  • Robust slicer to generate G-code - own parallelized slicer, written in C++, for a comprehensive solution to thin parts and supports. The slicer can process models which other slicers are unable to handle properly!

  • Supports and printing speed optimization - our slicer introduces a new type of tree-like supports to reduce the printing time and save material. It further optimizes the generated G-code for higher printing speed - moves, retracts, etc.

  • Stable G-code generation - slicer speed is comparable to Slic3r. Compared to Cura or KISSlicer, our slicer is significantly slower, but it is more accurate when dealing with more complicated models and situations.

  • Built-in printing profiles - easily editable profiles for various 3D printers, printing quality, materials, etc.

  • Automatic collision detection - 3DimMaker verifies relative positions of objects and their position within the print area.

  • High quality 3D rendering - detailed 3D visualization of the model and the generated G-code.

  • Easy object manipulation and placement - easy to control the 3D view and manipulate the object directly in the scene.

  • Straightforward and intuitive usage - five simple steps to print your first 3D model with our 3D printing wizard.


Why Open Source?

Development of 3DimMaker was motivated by needs of 3D printer producers, mainly our cooperation with 3Dfactories - the producer of Easy3DMaker and Profi3DMaker printers - and the need for a reliable SW for large 3D printers.

Unfortunately, this cooperation came to an end so we decided to distribute 3DimMaker on our own for a small fee. However, revenue from individual sales is not high enough to further develop 3DimMaker and provide well-tested printing profiles for so many existing electronics and firmware.

By going open source, we are trying to keep this project alive. We want to push ahead with 3DimMaker development and bring new exciting ideas through the open source community. Another reason is the positive experience we enjoyed with 3DimViewer, our other OSS project. Finally, we also believe that the industry can benefit from OSS and should also be returning something to you - the OSS community.

At present, the standard 3DimMaker edition is available for free while the professional edition, including more expert functions, is paid for.

You can download and try out both versions from 3DimMaker web site.


Who We Are

The team behind 3DimMaker comes from 3Dim Laboratory, a company specializing in applications for modern computer graphics and 3D geometry processing in medicine. Founded in 2008, 3DimLaboratory has been exploring the potential medical applications of 3D printing. We also have a 3D printer and are currently building our own 3D printer in order to meet our need for a large and more durable 3D printer.


What We Need & What You Get

If we reach our first goal (€24,000), 3DimMaker and its slicer will both become open source available for everyone:
  • 3DimMaker source codes will be release under Apache 2.0 license, which allows academic, non-commercial and commercial usage of the code;
  • binaries of the full version and installation files for Windows 64 bit and Mac OS X will be available free of charge immediately after the goal is reached;
  • scripts to prepare your custom installation files (custom logos, your own printing profiles, etc.) for both the platforms will be prepared.
Corporate sponsors will get online support while adopting 3DimMaker for their FFF printers, including customized versions of the software with their logos and installers.

How the Proceeds will be Spent

Almost all the parts of 3DimMaker are ready to become open source - UI is based on the open source Qt library, 3D visualization uses OpenSceneGraph, etc. However, there is a library called STALGO which needs replacing. STALGO is a very cute software package made by Stefan Huber for computing straight skeleton and offset curves, but its license does not allow it to be incorporated in open source projects...

  • The major portion of the funds will be spent moving 3DimMaker away from STALGO while looking for a suitable alternative.
  • The rest of the funds will be used to refactor the code, establish a new web site for 3DimMaker hosted on GitHub or Bitbucket and prepare the scripts for creating installation files.


Stretch Goals

If we reach our basic goal, we'll be able to complete the first milestone. Each subsequent tier helps us reach additional milestones.

If we reach this milestone, we'll have enough funds to make 3DimMaker open source and replace STALGO within approx. 4-6 months.
Immediately after M1 is reached, we'll make all binary versions of 3DimMaker available free of charge. Within 1 month after M1, we'll make 3DimMaker code open source by removing STALGO and having the thin parts solver disabled temporarily.

This milestone gives 3DimMaker 9 months of additional development and support. This will be mainly dedicated to bug fixes, technical support for the community, e.g. when compiling 3DimMaker from source on different platforms and/or compilers, and basic support for DLP (Digital Light Processing) printers using photopolymers.

The more we raise, the more impetus we receive to push 3DimMaker forward. So any spare funds will be used in the ongoing development of new features, which will be determined by the requirements and suggestions from the community.With the collected funds we will invest in 3DimMaker and at the same time create jobs within the community.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would like to get your feedback right from the very beginning! Please help put us on the course for our ongoing development of 3DimMaker and use THIS FORM to promote key features and submit your ideas.

Alternative Payment

We understand that paypal isn't for everyone. If you cannot or do not want to pay by PayPal, contact info@3dimmaker.com to make alternate arrangements.

Press & Media

Here is our press release and other materials for journalists.

Make It Happen

Hey, have you really kept on reading down to here! You're probably already a fan. So, if you like 3DimMaker and want to have it open source:

  • please CONTRIBUTE,
  • FORWARD link to this campaign (http://igg.me/at/3dimmaker/x/12489930) to your friends and colleagues and help us reach our goals,
  • and DEFINE THE FUTURE directions in which 3DimMaker will develop.
Thank you!

FAQs

Q: In the perks it seems like you won't get access to the source unless you pay at least 90 euros. This part is a bit misleading...

Of course, 3DimMaker will become OSS being available for everyone!

Q: There's no mention of a linux version. Given that it uses libraries that are available on linux already. Is there anything else that would make a linux port hard to do? I just want to know how feasible this would be.

To our knowledge, there is no part being a barrier when porting 3DimMaker to linux. For sure there will be some minor fixes required - linking of libraries, small code fixes arising from a different compiler, etc. But we alredy have the Mac port so we belive the linux one won't be difficult to prepare...

Q: The graphs are extremely confusing. I can't figure out if you're saying that 3DimMaker is taking more or less time to slice than the other slicers on the Stretchlet test.

When slicing the Stretchlet model, all the slicers were equally very very fast but there were many issues with the generated g-code. Please see the above figures illustrating the difference between g-codes from 3DimMaker, Cura and KiSSlicer.

Q: Actually, this stuff is not "open source in near future" but "maybe open source IF got enough monies". Going open source is a stretch goal.

3DimMaker will become open source immediately after M1, but without the thin parts which are dependend on STALGO. Once STALGO is replaced, the functionality of thin parts will be available as well. All the stretch goals are just an offer from our side. They mean we can further provide improved support to the community and ongoing development...

This part is a bit misleading...Of course, 3DimMaker will become OSS being available for everyone!Q: There's no mention of a linux version. Given that it uses libraries that are available on linux already. Is there anything else that would make a linux port hard to do? I just want to know how feasible this would be.To our knowledge, there is no part being a barrier when porting 3DimMaker to linux. For sure there will be some minor fixes required - linking of libraries, small code fixes arising from a different compiler, etc. But we alredy have the Mac port so we belive the linux one won't be difficult to prepare...Q: The graphs are extremely confusing. I can't figure out if you're saying that 3DimMaker is taking more or less time to slice than the other slicers on the Stretchlet test.When slicing the Stretchlet model, all the slicers were equally very very fast but there were many issues with the generated g-code. Please see the above figures illustrating the difference between g-codes from 3DimMaker, Cura and KiSSlicer.   Q: Actually, this stuff is not "open source in near future" but "maybe open source IF got enough monies". Going open source is a stretch goal.3DimMaker will become open source immediately after M1, but without the thin parts which are dependend on STALGO. Once STALGO is replaced, the functionality of thin parts will be available as well. All the stretch goals are just an offer from our side. They mean we can further provide improved support to the community and ongoing development...

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
WELCOME! WILLKOMMEN! WELKOM! VELKOMMEN! BIENVENU! VELKOMINN!

 

Thank You for stopping by! Happy to see you here!

  We are reaching out worldwide!

 

New Year - New resolutions! Join us for a fresh start TOGETHER!

 

Briefly about myself and the project!

Horse Riding Harmony Academy is a family-owned and operated riding school established  5 years ago. My name is Ula Dichaviciute and I'm the creator of this exciting project! I've ridden horses for nearly a decade. I specialise in endurance horse riding. I like to organise events across my native country of Lithuania and even with more advanced riders go on trips abroad, travelling together with our best friends - horses!  Although this European country is relatively small (3million only!), people here have a big appetite for adventure and outdoor activities.

Our Mission

Several years ago, I had a conversation with my father about my ambition to set-up my own horse riding school and to share my passion with other like-minded people. After several cups of tea and lengthy walks in the forest; formulating my idea in more details, I came up with a vision and a mission for Horse Riding Harmony Academy.

1)                   To start with, we provide a top-notch education of good horsemanship in Lithuania. We include professional horse riding lessons, we invest our time in students to provide great knowledge about the psychology of horses and good understanding of worldwide equine equipment and gear used. For instance, we teach our students about different types of saddles there are, such as Spanish, Australian, western endurance, jumping, dressage and etc.

2)                  Secondly, we offer equine therapy and meditation classes for people with different types of disabilities. We accept a large number of kids from health centres too, because we believe surrounding yourself with horses has got huge healing power. Therefore, we highly focus on students’ mental health and their wellbeing. Many people are not aware of the benefits of good horsemanship for the human body; over the last 10-years, we have learnt that through riding horses, people can cope better with their thoughts and It incites them to heal and flourish from the inside out. This can help to reduce post-traumatic stress and people with autism have also reported positive results. This is what drives us to become better at our craft!

3)                    We are also receiving a big amount of people who are having back pain and posture problems! Therefore, we design professional and individual programs for each person with various types of exercises that help them with their struggles.

4)                    Moreover, our academy organises some recreational activities! We do horse riding trips across the country and with more advanced riders we have an opportunity to go abroad too, such as Germany, Holland, Switzerland, Poland and etc. Not to mention our free archery club and educative courses about the art of archery and bows that is getting more popular every year!

 

Academy’s main goal is to help people to find harmony in their life together with horses and nature.

 

 

 YOUR SUPPORT will enable us to get up running and to grow the academy; sharing our love for horses, nature and the outdoors.

 

Project ideas in depth

 

At the moment, we only have three compact stables for our horses. We decided to take it up a notch and open up a new location. Here we will fit 11 horses !!! It's a big change for us!

Architectural plan for new stables

 

We’re Almost There! 

 

We are 20000€ away from our annual fundraising goal, so we are inviting you to join us in achieving it! Help us to accomplish our dreams and put more smiles to this world! Your gift of any amount will help us reach our goal and help Horse Riding Harmony Academy to fulfil its mission! ANY donation matters!

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

(CHECK OUT SOME AWESOME PERKS WE ARE OFFERING YOU BELLOW!)

 

S T I C K E R 

 

 

Exclusive   B A D G E      P I N

 

 

 

Early-bird  K E Y    R I N G -  H O R S E S H O E

 

Limited edition  T - S H I R T

 

 

Soft and comfy  P I L L O W

 

 

Baltic A M B E R &Golden  H O R S E S H O E

 

 

CONTACT US:

E:    horseridingharmonyacademy@gmail.com

FB:    https://www.facebook.com/horseridingharmonyacad...

story:
About us

We're two young men with the same last name, born in Appalachia and have a passion for our planet!  We've spent our twenties working retail jobs, farming, starting businesses, traveling, making music, making babies, and of course exploring the outdoors!  All of those things have led us to wanting to work together to bring fill a gap in our community and now we need your help!

What we’re doing

We are asking for funds to open up a location that provides gently used outdoor gear and facilitates community events, workshops, and programs all focused on empowering yourself to get the most out of your time outdoors!  The outdoor gear consignment model is something that has been successful and continues to be in several cities.  We want to offer that as well as enriching outdoor workshops and opportunities to make your community a better place through involvement and service!  We're not reinventing the wheel here! We just want to add this wheel to our Appalachian Community!

Why it’s important 

The opening of this marketplace will allow the community to support a circular economy keeps resources in use for as long as possible and extracts maximum value from the item. Also nurturing the love for the outdoors in our youth is extremely important to us.  We're both fathers and want to pass down skills and principles to kids as well as adults that will help to preserve and utilize our planet.  We believe that every community with outdoor enthusiasts should have local access to that! Especially Berea, Kentucky!

What We Need & What You Get

Let’s talk business..

To fund our startup, we need $6,500.

Where does the money go.

Point of sale(ConsignPro)/Computer - $1250
Store Signage  x $750
Storage Bins x $250
Racks “clothes”  - $250
Display cases - $1000
Utility Deposits  - $200
Wall art - $350
Book shelves $300
Education sitting area, “12 chairs, 3 tables” $400

Squarespace Website startup $100

Local/Social Advertising $500

Lighting indoor/outdoor $300

Office essentials $200
Supplies for Education  $500

 

$10 - Shout out on Social media with a Kentucky Magnet.
$25 - Kentucky Magnet and MPower Bumper Sticker.
$100 - Kentucky magnet, bumper sticker and MPower T-Shirt.
$300 - Exclusive discounts 5 - 20% off of in store products. Discounts on your personal consignment. Kentucky magnet, bumper sticker and MPower T-Shirt.

 

Our goal no matter what is to create an environment of community that wants to educate and create an affordable way for people to get outdoors. We will be getting this store off the ground this just determines to what capacity we can do business at in the beginning stages. The cosmetic side of our campaign is last priority. Any money we raise will firstly buy education supplies, advertising, and point of sale system.
 


We are looking for partners who want to invest into a culture that enables and educates people to be empowered exploring the great outdoors.
 

 

 

The Impact

 

The MPower project can be condensed to 3 reason why there is value.

- First and foremost we are promoting health and education to our youth and community .
- MPower is an avenue for people to buy and sale outdoor gear. This keeps prices affordable and puts money back into the community.
- We are growing community and the economy. From instructors, other businesses and families, we hope to create jobs around passion and partnerships. That includes you!
 

We are striving to be more independent and responsible for our environment. We believe everyone is responsible for our environment and to help relay the importance of basic life skills to our youth. To teach what we know and be a wealth of knowledge for those around us.

 

From retail, to farming we have lots of experience in the trend we see the marketplace arriving to. All roads have led to this place to help others around us to get more involved in community and outdoors.
 

 

Risks & Challenges

The risks to opening any brick and mortar location are plentiful.  In the beginning we will be taking risks on acquiring the initial inventory as we will be relying largely on a working partnership with the community.  Advertising is crucial in the first months and if we are not able to fund it properly we will have to have word of mouth support.  Big box retailers and online giants want to cut out the little guy, so we will struggle to compete with their prices and exposure as these are common items. But this stuff is supposed to be challenging right? We want to take on that challenge!

- We both together have over 20 years of experience in retail and sales.
- Over the years we have made many wonderful relationships that bridge the gap to help with low overhead advertising.
- We pride ourselves in our creativity and ability to make something out of nothing.
- Our location is next to a high traffic fitness center and en route to many outdoor areas (Lake Cumberland, The Pinnacles, Anglin Falls, Holly Bay, RRG, and many more) which we believe will help with word of mouth advertising in the community.  Which is essential to a thriving brick and mortar business in Kentucky.
- As small business owners we know that capital cash flow is the key to getting any business off the ground. We already have several partnerships that will allow us to have stock on consignment while building a local consignment inventory, allowing us to open immediately. With low overhead and effective product selection this will be an outdoorsmans dream.
- Taking advantage of our high traffic retail location 
- Using online marketplace/social media relations to find and sale new products and customers.
 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We would love to have a monetary contribution but if you can’t help on that end, we would love for you to still partner with us and share our vision with those around you. And be ready to bring us some product to peddle!

story:
Who is Foodology, Mobile Kitchen?

  • Kyle, Owner/head Chef, has been in the culinary arts industry coming up on eight years. Kyle, has worked in every aspect of the food industry; from dishwasher to executive chef to kitchen manager. Working in various food styles such as; Fine dining, American BBQ, Cafe, Pub, and event catering.
  • Our goal is to share the best of the northwest eats from a successful debt free business supported from a broad base of investing friends and foodies.
  • By contributing to our campaign; this will allow us to purchase and outfit a step van into a mobile kitchen, and assure initial 6 months start up costs: labor, food, cookware and compostable plate wear.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Funding would cover purchase and outfitting of mobile kitchen, monthly costs including labor, food, fuel, insurance, and maintenance for 6 months. All of this comes to the grand total of $88,500. All of this is possible because of you!
  • With each contribution tier there are perks ranging from group catering, free food, sweatshirts, hats and custom themed t-shirts.
  • Our goal is to be 100% debt free. If the goal is not reached within the fixed end date; all funds will be returned to contributors.

The Impact

  • Our mission is to bring a fresh flare and perspective to the mobile kitchen scene.
  • We have put in hours of market research, interviewed individual mobile kitchen owners, and learned the pros and cons of the business to make it a positive experience for each customer. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We understand if contributing is not an option at this time. But, you can help us spread the word by using the indiegogo share tools, and Facebook
  • Thank you for taking the time to read our story. We look forward to serving you soon!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
This is Lost in Thought Art Studio, or LIT Studio for short. A place for cultivating talent and launching careers. Columbia, Missouri local Danielle Komo is attempting to bring an entirely new service to the city; and with it entirely new opportunities. Lost In Thought Studio is a start-up working to be a co-working space focused on providing professional equipment and education to aspiring digital and audiovisual artists. Help create a community centered around helping and learning from other artists. We should never stop creating and money shouldn’t be a reason why we have to stop.

 

With $4500 we will set up the very first workstation so that artists can have the tools and community they need to develop into their potential. $4500 will pay for the computer, Wacom drawing tablet, Autodesk media & entertainment collection, and an Adobe Creative Cloud subscription. This workstation and studio cannot happen without your help. If our goal is not met we will go back to the drawing board and it will take longer to get to the artists as we will need to find alternate sources of funding. 

 

With this $4500 we’ll set up our first workstation that will enable multiple artists to create what they want when they want without worrying about subscription costs. Additionally, this workstation will be the first of many and will be the stepping stone for many artists. LIT Studio will be the first home in Columbia’s downtown for digital and audiovisual creatives. 

 

We have the community, we have the need, now it’s time to implement the solution.

 

 

    Rewards (all come with a Thank You card):

    • $1: sticker
    • $25: Swag Bag (includes t-shirt, sticker, coffee mug, and coaster)
    • $50: Swag Bag with sketchbook, 8 GB flash drive, pencils, and pencil case
    • $80: Above with backpack and two class vouchers
    • $100: Above with three class vouchers and a one-month Patron membership
    • $150: Above, except with one month Apprentice membership (rather than a Patron membership) and Founder's Plaque
    • $200: Above with one month Freelance membership and Founder’s Plaque
    • $250: Above with three service vouchers and Founder's Plaque. Vouchers are valid for classes, one month Freelancer membership, or business service.

story:
Overview 

We would like to take this opportunity to introduce us. We are SOFTNXT TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD, a software development company. we are providing integrated platforms to small and large scale retail business through they can receive online orders. 

Over the past 1 year, a team of engineers, sales, marketing  and I have worked to develop the e-commerce product (“LAPANZO”) which is very useful for a common person and 100% required for the local retail market and it has very huge scope. we have run a pilot process version 1.0 in the market we got 98% positive response. 

At this time, we have working on our 1.2 version and we want to start marketing and setting up the operations. We are confident that the competitive cost of our system and the superior operating capacities that it provides will quickly make it a leading product in the market.

 

Lapanzo Solution

Looking for anything from pin to plane is made easy with the latest application that helps you locate the store for all your staple or specific needs. Lapanzo is your single point solution to find the stores for A to Z needs. This application will save your “time”, you can even get your selected business or services vendors in Lapanzo. All you need to do is select the business type and pic the vendor/store and you are there with the solution.

Lapanzo is a mobile-app that you can use to order or find your local needs at your current location or selected.

No Need of Downloading different apps for different services all solutions at single point like (Grocery, Confectioneries/Sweets, Water, Flowers, Pet Care, Meat (Chicken, Mutton, Pork and all kind of Sea food... Etc), Stationery , Dairy Products, Home Services ( Carpenter, Electrician, Plumber, Laundry, House keeping, Cook, Catering for house parties Etc....), Car Wash. Road Assistance(towing services and auto servicing)

All requests at single order , select the vendor place order. Direct Communication 

What we Need 

We’re looking to make $50,000 here, to market our application for the level once if we get this funding and will start our app in the market den we will enter to the send level that will be global market

This money will be used to development and marketing as well as promotion of the product at Hyderabad then pan India and once we are in place of market we will enter in global market the United States, UAE,UK,Europe and other.  Market research showing that it has a scope even in other countries too. This increasing our interest and energy to grow this business big.

this concept may sounds little common but when we think of other existing services and our application terms its so much different we are not a services bases product  its a network based application. we are not like others. We can see how potential and how much different its compare to others in facts its new in the market and its address many problems. 

About Team

I am Sampath Kumar Rao Founder and CEO of SOFTNXT TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD, have 10 + years of experience in Software Development, 

worked with all the startups from the ground level.

Mr. T Pradeep Singh a Founder and Business Operations Head, have 11 Years of experience in product operations.

Mr. Rajiv Nikhil  Business Development Manager have 10 Year of experience in Branding and Sales  and he is a Training manager.

Mr. Andrew Judson Business Development Manager got 12 years of experience in Sales & Marketing six sigma certified. 

Mr. Manish Kumar IIM  (indian institute of management) Business Adviser. 

A Challenging Technical Team .
