story:
Dear Friends,

My name is Mr. Lim and from Singapore, Asia. Two years ago, the company I worked for went into closure. And for the past two years, it has been a continuous struggle to find job as the employment market has been badly affected by the bad economy. At the same time I have to take care of two young children. I am blessed that I have a close family and friends who help to lift my spirit up.

However, I have to be realistic as well as bills are piling up and basic necessities need to be fulfilled. I tried to find out a business that allows me to have flexibility in taking care of my young children who needs my constant attention. And for that reason, I am trying my chance to setup a website that focuses on Asian travel, culinary and lifestyle.

The purpose of this website is to allow financial flexibility at the same time to help out other struggling writers, designers and other people who would like to earn something by helping our website grow.

I am currently setting up the system so that every interested young writer can get an incentive to post their writing online, economic sharing for designer who provide their design for our to-be-online shop, as well as other normal people who would like to post an interesting article/art/others in our site.

I really wish that the site will be a place where everyone can share thoughts and kindness. A site where our American & European friend to get to know more about Asia and its people. A site where there is no hate/crime/racism/violence/pornography - I will ban this kind of content and the site is also not meant for gossips.

The website will be done in 2 basic languages, Asian and English. At the same time its installed with language software so our readers can read in their own language.

The funds will be used for company setup, IT personnel, writers, designers, and more. And we aim as we grow, we can utilise the site more to do more good things.

I hope you can be part of this and help. Thank you so much in advance.

Should you be interested to join the business or help to make it grow or simply to know more about the business, can contact me at my business email - travelia.asia@gmail.com

In-kind donations are also welcome.

Please help to spread the word!

story:
IN A NUTSHELL

London is in the midst of a CYCLING REVOLUTION, with a huge amount of enthusiasm for, and investment in, this cheap, healthy and environmentally friendly way to get around.

There is also a huge trend towards people seeking out intriguing new ways to have fun that creates great MEMORIES & STORIES, such as interactive cinema experiences, eating in the dark & spending the night in a museum.

We at Tandem Town want to help people to have MORE FUN and we passionately believe that getting on a tandem bicycle is a brilliant way to do that! It's great for a date, hilarious with a group of friends and fantastic as a team building exercise. 

   


TANDEM TOWN is the place to come for fun-filled tandem bicycle experiences in London. We HIRE out tandem bicycles and run tandem bicycle TOURS from our west London base, and in June we're launching TANDEM TEAM BUILDING events.  

Dan & Jo run Tandem Town. Their experience spans several years managing commercial, marketing & operational teams in big and small companies in the Travel, Tourism, Leisure and Transport industries - British Airways, Transport for London, Hotels in Nicaragua (!) etc. They have successfully funded two previous projects through crowdfunding.


SO WHAT NEXT?

We are looking to expand our Hire & Tour offerings so that more people can have fun on a tandem. With your help we'll expand our fleet of tandem bicycles, and add scheduled pick-up / drop-off points in CENTRAL and EAST London.

Initially our expansion plans are focusing in and around London (where we live and know inside out), but we're already working through ideas for further expansion.  These include holidays, retailing, franchising, partnerships, events and the creation of a peer-to-peer rental network.

So now it's time for you to have some FUN with your friends, colleagues or partner.  CLIMB ABOARD your own TANDEM experience today with one of our great value PERKS.


SUPPORT & PERKS

If you believe in what we're doing and want to get involved, we'd love you to BUY one of our GREAT VALUE PERKS - for yourself, your friends or your company. 

Tandem Town is looking for £3000 to expand our fleet of TANDEM BICYCLES. Other operational costs - transport, storage, marketing, and staffing costs are already covered. If we raise more than our target, we'll buy more bikes to further accelerate our expansion!

We have some great PERKS at amazing prices:

TANDEM HIRE - rent a tandem bicycle for the day for only £20 (normally £50) - that's only £10 per person. Collect it from our London base or from one of our scheduled mobile pick-up / drop off points around London. A really fun day out for you and a friend. Great for a date or with a group of friends!

TANDEM TOUR - join one of our half-day Tandem Tours, taking in the sights of London on a tandem. Or book a private tour (minimum 10 people) for a birthday, hen or stag party. £20 per bike (normally £60) - that's only £10 per person.

TANDEM TEAM BUILDING - create a unique team building event for your business, incorporating fun team games on tandems outdoors or indoors (e.g. treasure hunt, slow race). Events are designed especially for your organisation and include bikes, guides, transport and equipment (minimum 10 people / within 60 miles of London). £30 per delegate (normally £60+).

You can of course contact us immediately to start creating your own tailored Tandem experience.


SPREAD THE WORD. If you like our project, please help us promote our Tandem Town adventure by telling your mates, journalist & blogger friends and by sharing our project through social media.

FEEDBACK & IDEAS. We have lots of great ideas but we would love your thoughts about the services we're offering, the markets we could target, potential pick-up / drop-off points and any promotional ideas you may have. All suggestions are wildly encouraged!


   


THE SERIOUS STUFF

Tandem Town is expanding rapidly but its not all going to be fun, fun, fun. A huge amount of hard work is underway to ensure the fundamentals of this business expansion are being managed effectively.

Timeframes - Our Tour & Hire expansion will commence in May 2015, just in time for the busy summer season. Our expansion into Team Building events will commence in June.

Sales & Marketing - A comprehensive plan is in place to refine our proposition and further promote and sell our services.

Operations - A detailed timeline for procuring more equipment and refining an expanded operation are being worked through.

Safety - Exacting safety standards, maintenance procedures and insurance are fundamental to our business model.
Staff - As we expand, hiring more incredible guides for our Tandem Tours and Tandem Team Building events is vital.  A comprehensive recruitment plan is in place. Do feel free to contact us if you're interested in joining the Tandem Town team.

story:
Have you been smart this year?

Popular Christmas tradition of advent calendar arose in the late 1800's Germany and soon spread  throughout Europe and North America. 

The most traditional  advent calendar is a card or poster with twenty-four small doors, one to be opened each day from December 1 until Christmas Eve. Each door conceals a picture.

Considered a fun way of counting down the days until Christmas, many advent calendars today have no religious content like they use to have. Alongside traditional Advent calendars depicting angels and biblical figures are those whose doors open to display pictures of teddy bears, pieces of chocolate, or photos of pop stars. 


Renovating the tradition with fresh new ideas

I'm Antti, a 35-year-old average Joe from Finland with a Bachelor of Business Administration degree. Realizing that I can't multitask and execute all the ideas twirling in my head at once, I decided to pick just one of them and focus on it. 

In 2013 I got the idea of improved version of kids' advent calendar. Backbone for the whole concept was decided right from the start: calendar doors have to be actualized in a way that one has no chance of opening them beforehand. 

In contrast to today's more and more digitalized world we live in, I was determined to include a physical real life component into it.

Lastly i wanted to add a big smart factor to my product.

For Christmas 2014 I handmade ten  prototypes for physical calendar for pilot families to use alongside a digital calendar I designed. In the first prototype of a physical calendar were 24 plastic boxes that were sealed with a number combination locks. When a door's question was answered correctly in the digital calendar, one got the unlock number combination that the lock could be opened with.

After getting positive and supporting feedback about the pilot I decided to carry on developing the idea further.


Concept in a nutshell

  • Digital advent calendar with 24 doors that one can't open before a day related to the door dawns.
  • Doors hold questions
  • After answering the question correctly a hideaway of a daily reward is revealed 
  • Rewards are hidden somewhere in your apartment or house.
  • You can use the calendar together with a physical chest that can be opened with 24 keys that one has to find in order to get the chest opened and a daily reward collected.




Tease those brains

We got numerous of studies with indisputable results telling that stimulating your mind with brain training riddles and interactive games help brain cells to develop more connections to each others and this way amplifies your thinking in general. There is also strong scientific evidence about the fact that training your brain can protect you from degeneration of brain caused by aging.

Earlier the brain start to resolve challenging dilemmas, more neurons and connections between them are developed and stored in to the brain as a reserve for years to come.

Give your kid(s) a super fun and educational chore to ponder while waiting for Christmas this year. 


Help!

I'm seeking contributions to collect 5500$ to be able to produce 100 units of the Chest+24 keys sets to you guys. Worldwide shipping included.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but still like my concept, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help me to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign on social media. Click "Share" or "Tweet" and make me one happy campaign owner. 
You can test the digital calendar right away if you like. 
Go to www.xmasquest24.com and log in with code: testing . Doors one and two can be opened for testing.
Thank you for reading all the way down here! :)

story:
Wee Summary

This campaign is meant to aid the start-up of a miniature surfboard company that we are starting (Matthew & Nicole) called WeeBoards.com that hopes to bring back the meaning of fun to the sport of surfing. Today with crowded beaches and the ultra-competitive nature of the sport, surfers everywhere are forgetting how to just have fun. At WeeBoards, with our less serious attitude and thru our fun, snack-sized, highly customizable surfboards, we hope to change this.

Hello from Matthew and Nicole, the founders of WeeBOARDS.com, a surfboard manufacturer and online retailer based out of Seattle, WA. At WeeBoards.com customers can customize and purchase mini surfboards online while helping us to donate used surfboards to Nicaraguan kids (Groms) living in poverty.

Matthew is a Web and Graphic Designer with Online Marketing Experience of over 18 Years. He grew up surfing the Santa Barbara, Ventura County area in Southern California and has been in and out of the Action sports industry a good portion of his life.

Nicole is the primary owner and operator of WeeBoards.com as well as a stay at home mother of a 2 year old toddler. Like Matthew, Nicole grew up surfing the Santa Barbara, Ventura County area in Southern California and has always had love and respect for the ocean.

WAVES FOR NICAS, A Greater Purpose: WeeBoards.com is not just about making money selling highly customizable mini surfboards, as much fun as that is. :) We have a bigger mission in sight and that's simply to share the feeling of STOKED that only surfing provides with the less fortunate, world-wide. WeeBoards.com helps do this through our side project called "WAVES FOR NICAS", which takes money from every sale and purchases used-surfboards and donates the boards to Nicaraguan kids living in poverty. It's a simple project without all of the red-tape that other organizations have as we strictly stick to the K.I.S.S. methodology, Keep It Simply SURFING. We use money donated and a percentage from every sale we make online and off, to buy used surfboards from local travelers that are looking to ditch the excess baggage on the flight home, and give the boards directly to local groms (kids) who couldn't otherwise afford to own a surfboard. We are going to document each and every giveaway on our website on a consistent monthly basis so that everyone will be able to share in the rewards of giving. And while the sport of surfing is growing by leaps and bounds in Nicaragua, through the "Waves for Nicas" project there will be more opportunities for these kids to get sponsored and compete in competitions internationally. We also want to utilize our connection with Nicaragua's premier surfing association ASSUR, who will be beneficial with connecting our donated boards with the kids that need them the most.

What Wee Need & What You Get

This is how much funding we need to start and where it's exactly going…

  1. $1,000 - Misc. Legal, Licenses, Copyrights, Agreements, etc.

  2. $1,900 – Large Format Printer, Eco-Inks, and Vinyl Media

  3. $500 - Shipping & Packaging Supplies

  4. $2600 – Product Inventory (1x Deep of all 13 Models on hand)

  5. $1,500 - $250 Monthly Advertising Budget

Support Us for Wee Perks!!! We'd like to offer each investor a special thanks for helping the start-up of this business venture by shipping them 1X FREE Mini Surfboard every year for life! Each investor will be able to customize their board however they'd like. Surf it or use it as a wall decoration, coffee table, whatever as WeeBoards have many alternate/creative uses. That's right, you'll receive 1X Free WeeBoard of your choice every year in January. (Retail Value: $450)

Our Wee Plan, if the large plan comes up short... We plan on saving the largest purchase of the large format printer and associated media, for last. There's currently a 3RD party providing us with similar printing services at a reasonable rate. If we don't reach our entire goal, you'll get 100% of your contribution returned. We plan on relisting this campaign and giving this another shot in case you're interested.

The Wee Impact

"WeeBoards along with The Waves for Nicas Project, will be a valuable contributor to the world by making the sport of surfing more accessible, affordable and fun for everyone."

We've started successful businesses in the past that were not necessarily our forte. One success story was being a part of BizChair.com, an online office furniture retailer that went on to gross more than 50-Million a year in sales and was showcased on CNN & Fox News. FiestaPinatas.com was also one of our ventures that is still operating as one of the largest piñata manufactures in the USA. We feel success is close with WeeBoards.com. We get an enthusiastic reaction from every individual we meet and they're almost as excited as we are about WeeBOARDS.com and the W4N Project. We currently have 10+ orders in que just through word of mouth, and others who have expressed excitement over their future purchase. We also have a Surf Team consisting of 2 professional surfers that have already given us their stamp of approval and are going to be team riders once we get established.

What we love the most about this business venture is that for once we are doing what we're passionate and most knowledgeable about. We've always had a love for the ocean and its people, and now we get to enjoy both while providing a living for our family. And someday we will get to share this with our 2 year old daughter.

Wee Risks & Challenges

There will be challenges like all ventures. The difference is that we've technically been in this industry all of of our lives and have been involved with the retail sector on and off just as long. We know who our customers are, we know their families, their appreciation for art, design and their own Creativity. For the past 20 years we've held positions and gained experience necessary to effectively launch a successful venture such as this. We have experience in the following: design and manufacturing, engineering, marketing, online retail, ecommerce, brick and mortar, customer service, technical support, project manager, surfing instruction, travel, and much more.

Wee Ways You Can Help Nica Groms...

If you're not able to help us directly, maybe you could help us get the word out about our Waves for Nicas Project. Wee could always use more support with carrying out our mission of spreading the joys of surfing to the less fortunate.

If you have any further questions please email:
info@weeboards.com
story_txt:
Wee Summary
This campaign is meant to aid the start-up of a miniature surfboard company that we are starting (Matthew & Nicole) called WeeBoards.com that
  hopes to bring back the meaning of fun to the sport of surfing. Today with crowded beaches and the ultra-competitive nature of the sport, surfers
  everywhere are forgetting how to just have fun. At WeeBoards, with our less serious attitude and thru our fun, snack-sized, highly customizable surfboards, we hope to change this.
Hello from Matthew and Nicole, the founders of WeeBOARDS.com, a surfboard manufacturer and online retailer based out of Seattle, WA. At WeeBoards.com customers can customize and purchase mini surfboards online while helping us to donate used surfboards to Nicaraguan kids (Groms) living in poverty.
 Matthew is a Web and Graphic Designer with Online Marketing Experience of
  over 18 Years. He grew up surfing the Santa Barbara, Ventura County area in
  Southern California and has been in and out of the Action sports industry a
  good portion of his life.
 Nicole is the primary owner and operator of WeeBoards.com as well as a stay at home mother of a 2 year old toddler. Like Matthew, Nicole grew up surfing the Santa Barbara, Ventura County area in Southern California and has always had love and respect for the ocean.
WAVES FOR NICAS, A Greater Purpose: WeeBoards.com is not just about making money selling highly customizable mini surfboards, as much fun as that is. :) 
  We have a bigger mission in sight and that's simply to share the feeling of STOKED
  that only surfing provides with the less fortunate, world-wide. WeeBoards.com
  helps do this through our side project called "WAVES FOR NICAS", which takes
  money from every sale and purchases used-surfboards and donates the boards to Nicaraguan kids living in poverty. It's a simple project without all of
  the red-tape that other organizations have as we strictly stick to the K.I.S.S. methodology, Keep It Simply SURFING. We use money donated and
  a percentage from every sale we make online and off, to buy used surfboards from local travelers that are looking to ditch the excess baggage on the flight home, and give the boards directly to local groms (kids) who couldn't otherwise afford to own a surfboard. We are going to document each and every giveaway on our website on a consistent monthly basis so that everyone will be able to share in the rewards of giving. And while the sport of surfing is growing by leaps
  and bounds in Nicaragua, through the "Waves for Nicas" project there will be more
  opportunities for these kids to get sponsored and compete in competitions internationally. We
  also want to utilize our connection with Nicaragua's premier surfing
  association ASSUR, who will be beneficial with connecting our donated boards
  with the kids that need them the most.
What Wee Need & What You Get
This is how much funding we need to start and where it's exactly going…


$1,000 - Misc. Legal, Licenses,
      Copyrights, Agreements, etc. 


$1,900 – Large Format Printer,
      Eco-Inks, and Vinyl Media


$500 - Shipping & Packaging
      Supplies


$2600 – Product Inventory (1x Deep
      of all 13 Models on hand)


$1,500 - $250 Monthly Advertising
      Budget


Support Us for Wee Perks!!! We'd like to offer each investor a special thanks for helping the start-up of
  this business venture by shipping them 1X FREE Mini Surfboard every year for
  life! Each investor will be able to customize their board however they'd like.
  Surf it or use it as a wall decoration, coffee table, whatever as WeeBoards have many alternate/creative uses.
  That's right, you'll receive 1X Free WeeBoard of your choice every year in January. (Retail Value: $450)
Our Wee Plan, if the large plan comes up short... We plan on saving the largest purchase of the large format
  printer and associated media, for last. There's currently a 3RD party providing us with similar printing services at a reasonable rate. If we don't
  reach our entire goal, you'll get 100% of your contribution returned. We plan on relisting this campaign and giving this another shot in case you're interested.
The Wee Impact
"WeeBoards along with The Waves for Nicas Project, will be a valuable contributor to the world
  by making the sport of surfing more accessible, affordable and fun for everyone."
We've started successful businesses in the past that were not necessarily our forte. One
  success story was being a part of BizChair.com, an online office furniture retailer that went on to gross more than 50-Million a year in
  sales and was showcased on CNN & Fox News. FiestaPinatas.com was also one of our ventures that is still operating as one of the largest piñata manufactures in the USA. We feel success is close with WeeBoards.com. We get an
  enthusiastic reaction from every individual we meet and they're almost as excited as we are
  about WeeBOARDS.com and the W4N Project. We currently have 10+ orders in que
  just through word of mouth, and others who have expressed excitement over their
  future purchase. We also have a Surf Team consisting of 2 professional surfers that have already given us
  their stamp of approval and are going to be team riders once we get established.
What we love the most about this business venture is that for once we are
  doing what we're passionate and most knowledgeable about. We've always had a love for
  the ocean and its people, and now we get to enjoy both while providing a living for our
  family. And someday we will get to share this with our 2 year old daughter. 
Wee Risks & Challenges
There will be challenges like all ventures. The difference is that we've technically been in this industry all of
  of our lives and have been involved with the retail sector on and off just as long.
  We know who our customers are, we know their families, their appreciation for art,
  design and their own Creativity. For the past 20 years we've held positions and gained experience necessary to effectively launch a successful venture such as this. We have experience in
  the following: design and manufacturing, engineering, marketing, online retail, ecommerce, brick and mortar, customer
  service, technical support, project manager, surfing instruction, travel, and much more.
Wee Ways You Can Help Nica Groms...
If you're not able to help us directly, maybe you could help us get the word out about our Waves for Nicas Project. Wee could always use more support with carrying out our mission of spreading the joys of surfing to the less fortunate.

If you have any further questions please email:
info@weeboards.com

story:
Introducing The Druid Box!

We wanted more people to arouse their senses and discover the amazing world of exotic dried herbs. There are so many herbs out there, but so little time! We’ve come up with The Druid Box, an exclusive subscription service which allows you to receive a luxurious box of specially hand-picked premium herbs right to your doorstep every month.

We need your help to produce the first run of The Druid Box!


Baking, lotion making, gourmet cooking, tea making, tinctures and much more...

Dried herbs are not only aromatic and beautiful, but they have hundreds of uses.  

From the piney aroma of rosemary to the Mediterranean flair of basil, their versatility is unsurpassed. Herbs have been sought throughout history and traded the world over to become an essential ingredient for cooking and healing everywhere. Archaeological evidence indicates that the use of medicinal plants dates approximately 60,000 years ago!

Don't go too far, when our grandmothers needed to attend to the bumps, bruises or fevers, they didn't have a corner drugstore. Instead they used to rely on simple herbal remedies that were made from plants and herbs that grew in their garden.

Nowadays, there is a growing awareness of the importance of returning to the use of whole foods and healthy herbs into our modern lives.


Hear the good news... We are here to help you explore this amazing world!

We are a team of passionate people about herbs and their usage. Living in the beautiful city of Thessaloniki in North Greece, a true crossroad between the West and the East, we have access to a broad network of premium herbs producers and cultivators. Panagiotis, following a family tradition of more than 100 years, he is the owner of a small  but well-established traditional herb and spices shop in the East side of Thessaloniki, Popi being an architect, she loves design and Alexandros who made our website, he is looking forward to focus on the customer support. After extensive research and development, we are now ready to ship the first limited run of the Druid Box all over the world. 


We need your support!

We can’t do it alone. This Indiegogo campaign is a big test for us, in order to start a subscription service to ensure you receive a luxurious box of herbs, always fresh and flavorful, right to your doorstep every single month. To make this happen we’re going to need your help. How? By contributing to this project and getting some brilliant stuff in return. If we reach the 1,000€ goal we will be able to proceed with the production, ship your perks (estimated delivery May 2015) and make our website TheDruidBox.com available for subscriptions!

So lets do it together! Be part of our journey and help us make this happen!

Awesome perks wait for you!

No matter how large or small you can be assured that all contributions are gratefully received and will help towards the making of The Druid Box mission. However, if you contribute 20€ or more, you will receive one of our limited drudilicious boxes!

The Druid Box

A Limited Edition first run of The Druid Box including:

  • A selection of 5 hand-picked premium herbs (10 portions min. each).
  • A bottle of high quality herbal tincture. 
  • A dozen of empty teabags to brew your herbal tea in a linen pouch.
  • A papyrus with remedies and alternative ways of how you can use each herb.
  • Free shipping anywhere in the world.

The Druid Box Deluxe

A Limited Edition first run of The Druid Box Deluxe including:

  • A handmade wooden chest for herb display and storage.
  • A selection of 5 hand-picked premium herbs (10 portions min. each).
  • A bottle of high quality herbal tincture. 
  • A wooden herb grinder engraved.
  • A dozen of empty teabags to brew your herbal tea in a linen pouch.
  • A papyrus with remedies and alternative ways of how you can use each herb.
  • Free shipping anywhere in the world.

The Druid Box Tailored

A Limited Edition first run of The Druid Box Tailored including:

  • A handmade wooden chest for display and storage with YOUR INITIALS on it.
  • A selection of 5 hand-picked premium herbs (10 portions min. each).
  • A bottle of high quality herbal tincture. 
  • A wooden herb grinder engraved.
  • A dozen of empty teabags to brew your herbal tea in a linen pouch. 
  • A natural herbal bar soap.
  • A papyrus with remedies and alternative ways of how you can use each herb.
  • Free shipping anywhere in the world.

The Druid Box Wholness

A Limited Edition first run of The Druid Box Wholness including:

  • A handmade wooden chest for display and storage with YOUR INITIALS on it.
  • A selection of 5 hand-picked premium herbs (10 portions min. each).
  • A bottle of high quality herbal tincture. 
  • The limited "So many herbs... so little time" organic cotton t-shirt.
  • A wooden herb grinder engraved.
  • A dozen of empty teabags to brew your herbal tea in a linen pouch. 
  • A natural herbal bar soap.
  • A papyrus with remedies and alternative ways of how you can use each herb.
  • Free shipping anywhere in the world.

Assured high quality

All of our herbs are sourced directly from the growers, in order to provide you with premium products at competitive prices. The containers are airtight and eco-friendly so you can rest assured that they arrive full of flavor and preserve their taste and aroma.


Risks & Challenges

Shipping dried herbs internationally is not an issue for most countries. However If your order is returned to us due to a banned/restricted products policy we will refund you the total amount of the order, minus the shipping charge and Indiegogo fees.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get your social network fired up; share this with your family, friends, facebook, twitter & instagram followers, literally everyone that may be interested in taking a culinary journey with us!  

http://www.thedruidbox.com
http://www.facebook.com/thedruidbox 
https://twitter.com/thedruidbox 


So many herbs... so little time.

THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US! IT'S DRUIDILICIOUS!

story:
Neuro Mind Is The World's First

Men's and Women's Specific

Nootropic - With No Stimulants.

 

 

Neuro Mind is earth grown, straightforward, and just plain effective.

It was designed to hold up to the scrutiny of nootropic nerds, college students, and peak performers, yet be accessible and robust to anyone who cares about optimizing their day and performance.

 

BE IN THAT PEAK MENTAL STATE

 

Maybe you're like me, and you’ve done years of research to know what nootropics are. Or maybe you’re like many of my friends who want to achieve that peak performance, but have no idea how to get there.

Either way, you have realized that you need a change and that is where Neuro Mind comes in.

 

We created a nootropic that is:

  • Men's and Women's specific
  • Made with earth grown nutrients and botanicals from the best sources
  • Free of junk fillers and stimulants
  • Contains no controlled substances

 

But what are nootropics?

Nootropics are substances that enhance learning and memory, while being extremely safe and protective of the brain.

 

We’ve researched the science to put the best ingredients nature has to offer all in 2 simple veggie capsules. We’ve done our best to make peak performance simple for you.

 

Men's Neuro Mind

 

Women's Neuro Mind

 

What Our Early Users Said

"I work in a supplement store, and Neuro Mind is something I have never heard of. I felt that I could remember things faster and clearer, and I forgot things a lot less. I think it is awesome!" -Kendall Ellis

 

"Im a college student, while on Neuro Mind I was able to study a lot more, had laser focus, and had an enhanced recall. I also made higher than normal test scores, I was surprised!" -Kong Lor

 

"Being a business owner, I was constantly working. Actually being able to perform at my best was just not in my cards until I was able to try Neuro Mind. Now I feel that I have the ability to perform optimally throughout my day and get things done!" -James C

 

Where we came from.

  • February 2014

After a long days work capping our first formula, an initial beta product (Super Mind) is released. It does not work well. The trials conducted on my friends confirm this.

 

  • March 2015

We unveiled our 6th formula with our new "house hold" name Neuro Mind. Huge breakthrough when we started getting a lot of positive feedback and made our initial product design. This was out last iteration with gelatin capsules, all further formulas utilized vegetarian capsules.

 

  • November 2015

Tulsa takeover! After a slick new redesign on our final formulations, we start out small and created a demand in the Tulsa area.

 

 

  • July 2016

Aaand... we're live! This is where you amazing Indiegogoers come in.

 

 

WHERE WE ARE NOW

  • We have finalized, and tested our final formulations.
  • We have partnered with a US-based manufacturer to develop and package Neuro Mind.
  • We are currently selling locally, and are ready to serve the demand across the US.

 

NEXT STEPS TO FULFILLMENT 

  • We need to place our first major order of raw materials and components.
  • We need to work with our manufacturer to fill and package the orders.

* We expect to fulfill our crowdfunding orders by October 2016. Delays are unlikely, but possible and we promise to keep our backers aware of every step in the manufacturing and fulfillment process.

 

FAQ'S

We know you must have a few questions, and did our best to answer the most popular ones here. Take a look at this section, and if you still have anything you’d like to know about our product or campaign, feel free to email us at Info@krispnutrition.com

story:
Coffee on a great mission

Short description of our project

We are opening a boutique coffee house in Istanbul providing natural food options. 

Our Coffee Background

 We are SCAE members and joined several SCAE (Speciality Coffeee Association of Europe) courses. So, we know what we’re doing!

Passion

We are passionate about coffee and we want to use this passion for a good purpose.

What do we want to achieve, and why it is important to us?

We shall offer the best of everything in our shop both in terms of food and coffee. Specialty/fair-trade coffee will be served which is the kind of coffee made from coffee beans grown in special climates, with little or no defects.  We’ll use third wave methods to brew freshly grinded specialty coffee.

Why we need your support

Once our shop is up and running, everyone will be enjoying our awesome 3rd wave coffee.

With the money we have in our pocket -earned from our previous jobs-, we have purchased the espresso machine, grinders and other brewing equipment and covered the partial construction costs.

Now, we are transforming an old drapery shop into a lovely coffee house with a great design where everyone can enjoy the fair trade/organic coffee & food with friends. We also need to get the shop sign designed and build a website. That’s where we need your support.

Your super- appreciated contribution will help us as follows:

•$52,000: for decoration and construction of our lovely shop ‘BluM.’

•$3,500: to build an outstanding sign and website

•$4.400 Indegogo, Paypal service fees and other legal fees

Our goal is to open our Coffee Shop in June/July 2016. Help us turn this dream into reality! Any contribution will be greatly appreciated and used to help us get more books to the children of the world.

SPREAD THE WORD:

Please support us. Just for a minute a day,  help us spread the word, share our passion if you’re a fan of specialty coffee & support our social project.

You can share this campaign on Facebook, twitter, instagram or in your blog to support us. Whatever you can do will be highly appreciated.  Please also ask your friends to support us as well.

Note that even if we can't reach our goal in full, you will still receive your selected perk!

Every effort counts!

All supporters are invited to our opening party ! See you there.

story:
RocketOut is a unique project that allows Citizens of Earth to personally participate in the ongoing search for interstellar life. NASA sent two Voyager flights into outer space in 1977, each containing a “Golden Record.” No other attempt at communication of this kind has been made in nearly 40 years.

*The Voyager Golden Records are phonograph records containing 115 images plus a calibration image and a variety of natural sounds, such as those made by surf, wind, and thunder, and animal sounds, including the songs of birds and whales that were included aboard both Voyager spacecraft launched in 1977. They contain sounds and images selected to portray the diversity of life and culture on Earth, and are intended for any intelligent extraterrestrial life form, or for future humans, who may find them.  

Exactly 40 years later, RocketOut will launch thousands of individual, personalized messages into Outer Space.  Each launch will contain a separate and unique identification number that can be transmitted back to Earth by our intelligent neighbors in the cosmos proving contact has been made.

It is the goal of Team RocketOut to launch a payload of thousands of new messages every five months or so.  Each launch will have a different trajectory to explore new frontiers in outer space.

Your participation today will be the applied to the first launch.  Your 100-megabyte message, the size of an average music video, will be loaded in the first rocket on its way to Outer Space.

*Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Contents_of_the_V...
story_txt:
RocketOut is a unique project that allows Citizens of Earth to personally participate in the ongoing search for interstellar life. NASA sent two Voyager flights into outer space in 1977, each containing a “Golden Record.” No other attempt at communication of this kind has been made in nearly 40 years.

*The Voyager Golden Records are phonograph records containing 115 images plus a calibration image and a variety of natural sounds, such as those made by surf, wind, and thunder, and animal sounds, including the songs of birds and whales that were included aboard both Voyager spacecraft launched in 1977. They contain sounds and images selected to portray the diversity of life and culture on Earth, and are intended for any intelligent extraterrestrial life form, or for future humans, who may find them.  
Exactly 40 years later, RocketOut will launch thousands of individual, personalized messages into Outer Space.  Each launch will contain a separate and unique identification number that can be transmitted back to Earth by our intelligent neighbors in the cosmos proving contact has been made.
It is the goal of Team RocketOut to launch a payload of thousands of new messages every five months or so.  Each launch will have a different trajectory to explore new frontiers in outer space.
Your participation today will be the applied to the first launch.  Your 100-megabyte message, the size of an average music video, will be loaded in the first rocket on its way to Outer Space.
*Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Contents_of_the_V...

story:
Our Story

We are Mark and Kristin, the founders of Piper's Soap Company. Way back in 2006 I (Mark) was with my family wandering around a flea market. We came upon a table with a box of puppies on it. After playing with a few, one stood out, and twenty dollars later Piper was on her way home. Thus ushering in the makings of a long and crazy companionship.

Not long into Piper's life she got very sick. When the veterinarians tested her, I was told it would take twenty minutes for a result. Within ten they said without any doubt it was Parvo. I was informed treatment was very expensive and had a fifty percent chance of success. Without hesitation I said "start the treatment." What was I gonna do without my friend? Three long days into treatment and a hefty bill to match, Piper improved and was expected to make a full recovery, I am happy to announce that she did.

Fast forward to October 2013. Piper (7) becomes sick again, very sick. She had a mucus seal in her gallbladder, and her gallbladder needs to be removed. The surgery is very risky and the best doctor for the job is on vacation. Set to return in four days, during which her gallbladder could burst which would result in her death. Like a champion she hangs on until the doctor returns and performs the surgery. For the second time in her life she beat the odds and came home.

After living through 2 near death experiences, 3 girlfriends, 4 moves and in 2 different states Piper (9) lives with Kristin, myself and our two girls. She spends most of her time begging house guests for some of their food, desperately searching out pets & butt scratches, when she isn't doing those things- she's snoring, very loudly. I am obviously a little biased, but Piper is pretty lucky to have come home with someone who loved her as unconditionally as me, and it’s nice to know she loves me just as much. No matter the cost or risk I did what it took to keep my best friend healthy and happy.

Unfortunately not all are so lucky, that's where Piper's Soap Company comes in!

Your support of Piper's Soap Company will provide the opportunity to produce our high quality, healthy, handcrafted products. This empowers us to help animals find loving forever homes. Piper's Soap Company will always donate 10% of our proceeds to an ethical animal rescue. This provides cats, dogs, cows, & pigs the same opportunity at life Piper got.

Our Soaps

Our soaps are made from a simple and clean recipe that contain a mixture of oils and butters that provide superb moisturizing, with exceptional healing properties for the skin, with no colors or preservatives. Available in six luscious scents Limónhead, Extend an Olive Branch, Chillin' Like A Vanillé, Coconut Milkamania, Ah Jammit, OJ Blossoms.


Rescue Criteria and Selection

Rescues are evaluated on criteria including: ethics, need, and community engagement. Idea rescues will demonstrate values that align with the mission to help animals in need, putting an end to suffering, regardless of species or breed. Striving to reduce the need for euthanizations, and to educate the public on proper animal treatment and care.


Your Support Provides

  • Cost saving bulk ingredients used in making our soaps

  • Wholesale packaging and supplies

  • Stainless Steel equipment

  • Soap molds/baskets, racks, and a much needed work bench

  • Food, supplies, and healthcare for animals in need at our first chosen rescue organization. (Yes, we will donating a potential $700 portion of this funding campaign)


Thank you!

Our thanks goes to you for taking the time to review our campaign and to understand our story and passion for animals. A special thanks to everyone who makes a financial contribution to our campaign. We'd like to welcome you to our family of customers. Your patronage and financial support for animals is greatly appreciated. However there are other ways to help.

Be sure to follow our official accounts on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram. Ask your friends to follow them too! If you share our interest in ethical treatment of animals and furthering education please share links to our campaign on your social media accounts. Join us as Piper's Soap Company grows and makes a difference!

Thanks!

Mark, Kristin & Piper

story:
You deserve a safe hoverboard 

Hoverboard or a.k.a self-balancing scooter, the biggest tech fails of 2015? Or the Christmas gifts of the Year in 2016 and gadget of the decade?

Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) is investigating more than 54 cases fire over 24 states in the United States. It  concludes all the hoverboard now in the market are unsafe and without a proper UL2272 certification. 

"Hoverboards are now deemed to be officially unsafe and a risk for spontaneous combustion. None of the products which have been tested for safety concerns have passed the standards as of yet and sellers are removing them." said CPSC

The safety issues marred a perfectly  good and extremely fun board. There are thousand of Youtube video reviews confirming that the hoverboards are indeed extremely awesome.  It does not hover but rather it rolls.

We can fix it and make it even better.

We like to design and build a safe and high-quality "legit" hoverboard. We call it hoverboard 2.0.  A  new generation that meets or exceed the safety standard UL2272.  To make one of most affordable hoverboard in the market that we can all share and enjoy.  So, all kids can have one for their  birthday and Christmas.  We guarantee it.


The journey of building  hoverboard 2.0 is very exciting and yet challenging. It is can also immensely expensive, complex. The process can be long and lengthy. But It can be equally rewarding.  We make it safe by using the best possible design, components and manufacturing processes. We at hoverboard Nation has the right team for the challenges ahead.

We can make in affordable too! Instead of charging an exorbitant USD1799.99 or  USD1500.00 each which will be well beyond the average family. We hope to start at USD449.00 plus shipping directly from the factory to your home. Together, we can make this project a smashing success.


How we stop hoverboards from bursting into flame?

Tha battery Pack (UL2271) and the chargers 


Samsung INR battery under test -passed.

When the Li-ion cells failed or have a thermal runaway. The results are usually catastrophic.  Some may even lead to  explosion and flame. But for the cell to fail, usually, it needs a chain of events to take place. Eg, failure of multilevel protection circuits. That is usually a rare event in a well-designed system.


To prevent thermal runaway, the battery pack must be protected. We typically use multi-pronged strategies in the design. 

Firstly, using protected Li-ion 18650 Cells with built in protection circuit.   These nanocircuit board attached to the end of the cell.  read more on protected cell here.  We also considering the use cells that build with safer chemistry which vent instead of explosion and fire.


Secondly, a robust Battery Management System (BMS) to manage and protect a group of cells.  It ensures the individual cells are charged in a balanced manner. It has a wide array of functions to protect the cells during operations.  .  The BMS can be managed via Bluetooth.


UL Certified battery Charger


In the rare events that none of the protections works, our battery pack can be designed with a metal casing with release valves. We use extensively fire retardant material for shells and parts. Consideration also for hoverboard usage in an extreme condition where there may be excessive vibration. 

Thus, you are be assured there will be no spectacular explosion or fire in our products even it fails.

The hidden danger  of hoverboard


UL 2272 certification requirements

UL2272 now emphasizes on overall electrical integration. Meaning, the external circuits like the chargers, motors (wheels) and mainboard must work in harmony with the battery packs. To prevent overcharging and overcurrent which may lead to failure! Our product will be UL certified. 



Mojowheels, the "Lexus" of hoverboard, featuring a stunning new and sporty fluid "Kodo" design styling. It is  designed to please and  ultimate to ride.

Some of the key feature.
  • Travel at speeds of up to 12 Miles per hour 
  • Duo-gyroscope with powered by ARM processor, micro-controllers.
  • Self-balancing platform with minimal learning curve 
  • Gives the feeling of gliding on a nimbus cloud. Better than the real thing.
  • Lasts up to 10-20 miles of travel on a single battery charge
  • Water resistant design is constructed to fend off dust and water
  • Easy to operate: lean forward and backward to achieve balance
  • Climb safely to angles of up to 30 degrees
  • Features a durable and fire retardant housing
  • The high-density lithium-ion 36V battery fully charges in less than two hours.
  • Maximum weight capacity of 120 kilograms
  • The high-quality motor generates 700 watts of power
  • Special mount for GoPRO camera attachment
  • Magnetic charging port - Energybus  or similar
  • CE, FCC, MSDS, RoHs, and UN38.3, UL2272, UL2271  Certifications (pending)

Specifications:

  • Brand Name: MojoWheels
  • Power:  700W (350W each motor)
  • Certification: CE, RoHs, UN38.3, UL 2272/2271 (pending)
  • Charging Time: 1-2 hours
  • Tire Size: 8 inch 
  • Color: White, Blue, Yellow, Red (tentative)
  • Battery: 36V 4.4-6.0ah Certified UL2271  (pending)
  • Max speed: 12 Miles/h
  • Range Per Charge: 10-20 miles 
  • Max load: 120kg
  • Charging Port, LED battery level, Power LED
  • USB charging port for phone/Ipad -  2A
  • Mount holes for GoPro Camera
  • Gross weight: 14 kg
  • Waterproofness: Level  IP54
  • Software APP via Bluetooth
  • speedometer, Odometer Current, Temperature
  • Mode: Beginner, intermediate, and Expert
  • OTA update
  • Includes 1-year manufacturer's warranty
Included in the box
  • 1 unit of 8 inches wheels sizes hoverboard.
  • 1 users' manual
  • 1x carry case
  • 1 unit of 42V 2A/4A  UL certified battery charger
  • 1 unit of warranty card with serial no.
  • Battery level at 80% charge





 



The Purpose

1.0 What is the purpose of this crowdfunding?
The power of crowdfunding  is pooling of scattered resources together and use it to develop a proven and high-tech product. We can make it safe with UL certification. You can make it fun.

  • 2. 0 Why should I participate in this exercise?
    • You will be part of the team to build something great. You will be constantly updated and immersed in the building process. You may even able to provide useful feedback and wish list. Best of all, at the end, you will get to enjoy the finishing product that we build together. Most of all, at a sensible price that we can all afford.

    3.0 Why you did not make a video?
    We are not inventing a new hoverboard but to enhance it. There are always thousand of it on youtube. The money can be better used in more productive manner.


    4.0 What is the risk that the campaign may end in failure?
    We believe it is extremely slim. As we have a wide experience in  assembling out of  Shenzhen.   We know the landscape in China supplies chain very well. We are not over reaching our goal. Nor trying to discover breakthrough technology.  Instead, we are trying to perfect a technology which is already increasingly mature and to make it even better and share it with you.
      1. 5.0 Why $250,000.00 or more? 
      2. We opt for fixed funding of USD$250,000.00 as the commercialization of the hoverboard will have fix cost. Without reaching the desired threshold, it might not be financially viable.  A lot of the components are customized to fit will have MOQ (Min order qty). E.g fabricating of mainboards, Casing, Wheels etc.  Certifications are also extremely expensive.  Else we may not be able to fulfill our perks that you have ordered.
      3. 6.0 Why sell at $449.00?
      4. Yes, you save up to 66%. The above price plus shipping. We believe it is very fair and one of  cheapest price UL certified board, in terms of quality and build.  You are the early investors should benefit on the risks taken.
      5. 7.0 What's next?
      6. We thank you for your support. After the success  of this campaign, we will increase the range of model to a 10 inches hoverboard. We like to design an electric unicycle (EUC) for the masses too. 

      8. The Hoverboard
      9. 8.0 What is the name and model of hoverboard?
      10. We call it Mojowheels. Phantom Xtreme, It is an 8-inch model.  The size is proven to be the most popular and flexible to handle road condition and nimbleness as compared with the 6.5-inch.
        11.  
    9.0 What cells do you use in the battery pack?
      1. We will be using  Samsung e.g INR 18650 or similar. E.g. LG, Panasonic, Sony. These cells use safer chemistry.  The pack is rated 36V 4.4-6.0ah, They are wired in 10 serial 2 parallel configurations. Thus 10P2S. It has a robust Battery Management System (BMS). The battery pack will be UL2271 certified to ensure safety.  Note: subject to change.
      2. 10.0 What are the features?
      3. It will have LED lights,  powerful  and higher torque motor. Battery and power indicators,  USB charging port, GoPro Mounting point,  Other safety considerations. E.g.  When the battery level is low, it will provide warning and stop gracefully. It is managed by APP. A  smoother ride too.
      4. 11.0 What are the functions of the APP

      5. The APP will be connected with the board via Bluetooth. It will display speed, odometer, trip meter, battery level, current, temperature etc. Users can also set the riding model to beginner, normal and advance. Balancing calibration.  We also hope to put in some error messages to help with diagnostic and repair.


    12.0 What is the production capacities?
    We have chosen Shenzhen, china to be the choice of manufacturer. There are virtually unlimited production capacities We use qualified contract manufacturers and the quantity can be scaled very quickly once the product becomes more mature and stable.  We hope to start with a 500 pcs per month and slowly scaling upward to 500 pieces a day.


    Thank your for your support.

    Note: Photo/Pictures are purely for illustration only. Please contact us if you feel any of the material in the article is inappropriate. We shall remove them promptly.  Thank you.

story:
Touch free bag is waste bag clean up after pets. The Touch Free Bag eliminates all the unpleasant parts of the clean-up process. There is no need to touch anything with hands, or gloves.

We already have the USA patent pending. And now we need your support to make our first production to life. Thank you so much.

HOW TO USE...



Simply place the bag over the waste and pull the drawstring. The inner chord will swiftly drag the waste inside the bag and done!


THAT IS WHY TOUCH FREE BAG...




Other scoopers require maintenance and cleaning afterwards, but not  TOUCH FREE BAG! Just one swoop and the pull of the string and everything is completely disposable. TOUCH FREE BAG takes the mess out of pet waste!


DESIGN...


Touch Free Bag has 2 different sizes: 

1) Small size: 130 - 30 - 60 mm

2) Large size: 130 - 65 - 130 mm





Shows the back of the Touch Free Bag when closed.

 Show the bottom of the Touch Free Bag when closed.

Shows a perspective view of the Touch Free Bag when closed.

Shows a perspective view of the Touch Free Bag when opened.




OUR TEAM...




Our team has been working on the touch free bag project for almost a year. Since the start we achieved the basic product, working forth on producing the mechanism of the bag. We are certain that further steps toward mass production will bring success as we are backed by manufacturers and distributors who will deliver quality product. Yet we know that in any business there are no concrete deadlines and obstacles may present at any step towards completion. But we will try to give it on time. Currently our only limitation lies in financial backing. Together with your help we can bring this product into reality.

TIMELINE...

story_txt:
Touch free bag is waste bag clean up after pets. The Touch Free Bag eliminates all the unpleasant parts of the clean-up process. There is no need to touch anything with hands, or gloves.We already have the USA patent pending. And now we need your support to make our first production to life. Thank you so much.HOW TO USE...Simply place the bag over the waste and pull the drawstring. The inner chord will swiftly drag the waste inside the bag and done!
THAT IS WHY TOUCH FREE BAG...






Other scoopers require maintenance and cleaning afterwards, but not  TOUCH FREE BAG! Just one swoop and the pull of the string and everything is completely disposable. TOUCH FREE BAG takes the mess out of pet waste!


DESIGN...


Touch Free Bag has 2 different sizes: 
1) Small size: 130 - 30 - 60 mm

2) Large size: 130 - 65 - 130 mm











Shows the back of the Touch Free Bag when closed.

 Show the bottom of the Touch Free Bag when closed.
Shows a perspective view of the Touch Free Bag when closed.
Shows a perspective view of the Touch Free Bag when opened.




OUR TEAM...







Our team has been working on the touch free bag project for almost a year. Since the start we achieved the basic product, working forth on producing the mechanism of the bag. We are certain that further steps toward mass production will bring success as we are backed by manufacturers and distributors who will deliver quality product. Yet we know that in any business there are no concrete deadlines and obstacles may present at any step towards completion. But we will try to give it on time. Currently our only limitation lies in financial backing. Together with your help we can bring this product into reality.


TIMELINE...







FOLLOW US...

INSTAGRAM

story:
Giving Back: Social Entrepreneurs Unite for a Better Way

A Group of Social Entrepreneurs see the flaws in Charity and Use Business as the Catalyst for Change

“Giving Back” is a social enterprise or a business with a social mission.  Our mission is to use business models, incorporated with charity practices, to help people through sustainable funding.

We are different from other charities because we are able to help people in long lasting ways.  Our model will never look for donors or survive month to month.  We want our business to thrive, which will flow over into charity, local and global causes and our employees.  This model is rare but we believe it is the key to change.  This will bring together organizations, businesses, VIPs and the charities that deeply need the support.

Many people who follow their passion in life cannot explain why or how they do it, but they find a way, no matter what. And this is how we feel about this campaign.  Our passion is helping others and giving back to those in need through innovative measures.

We want to find sustainable measures for helping people. Not just today but for a lifetime.



Who:

We are a group of young entrepreneurs, who need your help in order to make a change. We have been part of charities all of our lives but have seen how they were limited by the funds they had access to. Our passions are technology and business and we want the chance to use our knowledge to work on something big that benefits both the donors and people in need.

COMING SOON TO THE TEAM: YOU!

When:

We will begin our actions as soon as funding is completed and you will be able to track what happened with your donation that you invested in the future.

How:

We truly appreciate each and every donation, no matter what it may be. As a thank you we are offering various perks including:

·  Having your name featured on our website

·  Getting a personal thank you video from our team

·  Having your name listed as a team member

·  Exclusive updates on events and gatherings

·  Gear to support the cause

·  We can even make a public donation announcement at our next event

Why:

Nearly one sixth of charities admit they are facing a battle to survive because of a struggle to raise money and to cope with increasing pressure on their services.

They have also raised the alarm that the continuing squeeze on government spending threatens their financial viability.

The bleak picture emerges in research released today by the Charities Aid Foundation and the Association of Chief Executives of Voluntary Organizations.

They found that 15 per cent of charity chief executives say their organization is "struggling to survive", growing to 21 per cent among smaller charities with an income under £1 million.

How Can You Help?

For us the charities and cause come first. We want to help and support the charities and non-profit organization with their mission of helping people, feeding the homeless, battered women, illiterate children and many more initiatives. 

We believe in the power of generosity and change! 

Those two words are so important and they will be weaved into everything we do. Now more than ever we need everyone to get involved from VIPS to Celebrities, Businesses and individuals. 

We cannot raise the necessary funds without you. We need your support!

                      

“Giving Back” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest!

 If you love being proactive as much as we do then please take a moment to help us spread the word and get things started!


Other Ways to Help

We need your support to bring our vision to life!

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!

Volunteer

We will be looking for people to help get celebs to join but you can also volunteer at any event that compels you to fight for the cause and break barriers with the charities and causes we support. Please leave us your details and a statement on our email address.

Teach someone else about the cause and need for change

At its core, this campaign is about helping people. If you're in a position to teach someone else how to better view the issue at hand - do it! You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness.

Spread the word

You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this or by sharing our campaign on social media. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.


Thank You

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent many months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “Giving Back” family.

story:
Hi, my name is Shaneen Jones, aka Fugees. I am originally from the UK but I lived in Jamaica for a while, where I learned how to do nails. Being so passionate about nails I decided to get certified.

The vision I have for Fugees Nails & Hair Salon, is to be a place where: 

  • Trends can be made 
  • Which respects diversity and ideas

My success is depending on your support and my hard work.

What I Need & What You Get

I need your financial support and you will get perks and surprises in return.

For Fugees Nails & Hair Salon to become a reality I have some hurdles to get over such as start-up costs. The amount of funding I will need is as follows:

  • Property Purchase  £115,000 
  • Insurance (property, salon & staff) £3,500
  • Renovations (property) £50,000
  • Salon Fixtures  (display,furniture & equipment) £7,000
  • Licences/Permits £500
  • Utilities  £350
  • Office Supplies (till, business cards & stationary) £4,500
  • Pre-Opening Advertising & Marketing  (flyers & social media) £300
  • Products & Hair  £5,000
  • Professional Fees £10,000
  • If I don't reach my target amount I will still lease or mortgage the premises, and continue to launch Fugees Nails & Hair Salon with the amount that I receive.

 

The Impact

Fugees Nails & Hair Salon wants to set itself apart from other beauty salons that may just offer only one or two types of services. Having come from a salon where it was a one stop shop, I have an understanding of the value of having many services under one roof. It can be very frustrating for customers to be traveling to more than one salon for their nails and hair services. Especially if they have children.

My salon will be in Camberwell, South London. It will be children friendly, energetic, and a vibrant family atmosphere. One where client's can kick back and be transformed and beautified into the latest trends. Fugees Salon will be a place where mothers can still feel like they are up to date with the latest styles and products. Children between 6-16 can get their hair cornrowed, braided, relaxed, texterized or just a wash and style, ready for school. And men can get their hair cornrowed, locks maintained or a simple wash and blow dry.

In the salon I will be specializing in

  • Acrylic Extensions 
  • UV Gel Extensions 
  • Silk/Fiberglass Wrap
  • Sculpture Extensions 
  • Gel/Shellac polish 
  • Free-hand Design/Nail Art
  • Pedicures
  • Manicures 

Upon commencement of operations, I would like to sell a wide range of beauty products. I will be providing quality hair, nails and skincare products. I would also have other name brand products for sale to meet the customers needs, such as:

  • Hair 
  • Eyelashes
  • Makeup 

 

No one is an island, and no one stands alone

Together my dreams will be possible

Thank you, Thank you, Thank you

story:
EXCEPTIONAL SPIRITS

We are delighted to introduce a truly magnificent rare spirit--Blade and Bow 24 year Bourbon.

Blade and Bow 24-Year-Old contains bourbon distilled at The Stitzel-Weller Distillery before its shut down in 1992. This rare 24-Year-Old whiskey was barreled on Nov. 22, 1991 and is 93.4 proof.

This fine spirit begins with notes of well-aged cedar, campfire and soft leather. The finish includes sweet notes of vanilla bean, light caramel and raisin. 

“Stitzel-Weller is a Cathedral of Bourbon where some of the country’s most respected bourbons were distilled and aged. This lone barrel of Blade and Bow 24-Year-Old contained whiskey distilled by the many legends who have called Stitzel-Weller home. We think it’s a great opportunity to share a piece of bourbon history with our fans.”

All 750 ml. bottles, are artfully displayed in beautiful Blade and Bow bottles.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We’re seeking to purchase at Auction the only known bottles of Blade and Bow 24-Year-Old Burbon.
  • This exceptional lot of all 34, 750 ml bottles are the only known bottles of Blade and Bow 24-Year-Old Bourbon.
  • Each bottle is artfully displayed in beautiful Blade and Bow bottles.
  • This funding is to collectively participate in an Action--therefore, if sufficient funds are not raised or auctioning bidding is not successful your funds will be return--it’s simple--we win-you win!
  • You’ll receive a certificate for one bottle of Blade and Bow 24-Year-Old Bourbon--bottle number 12-34. Bottle  numbers are randomly assigned except for Bottles # 1 and 34. 
  • Your Safe--you’ll either receive your certificate or funding refund. 

The Impact

Blade and Bow has donated the complete lot to nonprofit Robin Hood, who has consigned the auction with Christie's Auctions. All proceeds received by Christie Auctions will benefit Robin Hood, New York’s largest poverty-fighting organization..

Risks & Challenges

Your funding is an All or Nothing project. if we do not successfully complete the Christie's Auction your funds will be returned,

We are a Registered Bidder with Christie’s Auctions and will assume ALL buyer premiums, fees, taxes and expenses. 

The Fine Print

Backers must be 21 year or older.

Certificate Perks will ship (insured) with Adult (21 or over) Signuture required.

And that's all there is to it.

 

 

 

Prospective backers are strongly advised to consider this offering before making a commitment to back this project. The campaigner cannot not offer any guarantee in relation to the nature of the property. The property is offered “as is.”

story:
Welcome to The Morning Muffin!!

My name is Yvette, I am the owner of The Morning Muffin and I'd like to be your Muffin Mam! I am so excited to announce this adventure in muffins & coffee! I am looking to put a "community morning spot" in Edgerton, Kansas. A place for folks near and around Edgerton to stop and enjoy a moment or conversation while visiting our community.

What We Need & What You Get

     What I'm looking for in this campaign is Edgerton's interest, support, and investment. I need to know Edgerton wants this as much as I do!!

  • I need basic start-up funds, while I will be making a financial investment myself, your support will make it evident to the bank that there is a definite interest here in Edgerton!!  Every contribution counts, whether it's $5 or $1,000 The Morning Muffin truly appreciates your support!! 
  • Your contribution will go towards the building(Rent & Utilities), equipment, tables & chairs, product, etc.

We have some great Perks for our backers!! This isn't just a donation, this is an investment! You will receive something in return for your contribution. If we don't reach our goal, still Edgerton will be that much closer to having a morning coffee stop. I am determined to invest into my community!!

The Impact

     So while a small coffee shop and simple bakery is my goal, I hope to make a huge impact on our community! "Simple drinks, simple treats, special moments"  that's our motto at The Morning Muffin. We need somewhere aside from social media to gather and exchange ideas, have conversations, meet up and enjoy time together. Investing in The Morning Muffin will bring positive change to Edgerton!

Risks & Challenges

     Anyone and everyone knows investing in a small town spot is a huge risk!

  • I'm not here to become a CEO or purchase a yacht.
  • I'm here to serve and better the future of our community. 
  •  The Morning Muffin will be me in the beginning. I will be baking, ordering, cleaning, opening & closing every day and I look forward to this challenge!

I'm actively working on my business plan, I have classes scheduled and paid for at JCCC next month(July). While I focus and work behind the scenes reaching the goal in the campaign is all you! I want to thank each and every one of you who's shown your interest and contributed to the journey!

Other Ways You Can Help

So maybe you're not able to contribute financially, that's ok!! There are other ways to help! Share this campaign page, make some noise and show your interest. When I get to the bank for approval it's going to look a lot better when I show up with your support!!

THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!!

story:
The Opportunity

The county of Loudoun in Virginia is one of the richest counties in the United States. With its growing population, the demand for event spaces that meets the needs of a diverse population is ever increasing.

Most event venues are community club houses which are available only residents of the community and are very restrictive with space and terms of use.

This project aims to fill the gap by providing the residents of Loudoun County and nearby cities a unique event space with a modern design and a rustic barn exterior and several acres of outdoor space. 

Project Overview

  • Renovate existing barn to create indoor space for events
  • Event facility for small and medium indoor gatherings (up to 120 attendees)
  • Outdoor events for larger gatherings
  • Over 22 acres of open space
  • Located in an area with high demand for similar gathering space
  • Nearly 5000 S Ft. of finished indoor space with two guest rooms and warming kitchen

Location

23536 Watson Road Leesburg Virginia

  • Easy access from Ashburn, Brambleton, Leesburg, South Riding and Aldie
  • 2.2 Miles from Aldie
  • 4 Miles from South Riding
  • 6.0 Miles from Brambleton
  • 7.5 Miles from Ashburn

Competitive Advantages

  • Easy access from Ashburn, Brambleton, Aldie, South Riding, Leesburg
  • Close to Route 50
  • Ideal location demographics with nearly 55.9 % earning a median income of higher than $150K
  • Conditioned space allows for all year round events
  • Nearly 5000 S Ft. of finished indoor space with two guest rooms and kitchen
  • Guest rooms can accommodate overnight guests as well
  • Separate bar area with outdoor seating on the deck and patio
  • Large outdoor space allows for several options for event planning

Events Hosted in 2017

  • Birthday Party – June. Number of attendees 50

  • Outdoor Event – October. Number of attendees 80

What we need

The estimated cost of renovations and extensions is $575,000. We have raised $200,000 with the help from close friends and personal savings. We need to raise $375,000 more to kick off this project. 

The barn will get a complete makeover with  5000 SFt of conditioned space, new roof, two guest rooms, warming kitchen and a tasting room. 

What you get

With its unique modern design with a rustic touch, we are confident that this space would be liked and loved my many who would visit.

We have several tiers of contribution levels. Kindly see the Perks section for details.

Easy access from Ashburn, Brambleton, Leesburg, South Riding and Aldie
2.2 Miles from Aldie
4 Miles from South Riding
6.0 Miles from Brambleton
7.5 Miles from Ashburn


Competitive Advantages

Easy access from Ashburn, Brambleton, Aldie, South Riding, Leesburg
Close to Route 50
Ideal location demographics with nearly 55.9 % earning a median income of higher than $150K
Conditioned space allows for all year round events
Nearly 5000 S Ft. of finished indoor space with two guest rooms and kitchen
Guest rooms can accommodate overnight guests as well
Separate bar area with outdoor seating on the deck and patio
Large outdoor space allows for several options for event planning

Events Hosted in 2017
Birthday Party – June. Number of attendees 50

Outdoor Event – October. Number of attendees 80

What we need
The estimated cost of renovations and extensions is $575,000. We have raised $200,000 with the help from close friends and personal savings. We need to raise $375,000 more to kick off this project. 
The barn will get a complete makeover with  5000 SFt of conditioned space, new roof, two guest rooms, warming kitchen and a tasting room. 
What you get
With its unique modern design with a rustic touch, we are confident that this space would be liked and loved my many who would visit.
We have several tiers of contribution levels. Kindly see the Perks section for details.

story:
The Why…


My name is Rolf Finkbeiner. I am a trained hotel specialist. I was born in Freiburg (Germany) and have had many stations in the world. With very few exceptions, I have remained true to gastronomy throughout my life.
From gourmet restaurants to discotheques, from bistro and caterer to lounge club in Ibiza. I have successfully managed many businesses over the last 35 years.

Now I am 69 and I can't imagine doing nothing from now on. For a long time I was looking for the right object and I found it with Hotel Nicklas.

Banks do not see me as a businessman in my old age, but only as an old person who is going to die soon. Financial help? Not a chance.
Therefore I am now asking the crowd community for help.
And I'm not just interested in getting money.

I want to create a hotel that leaves a green footprint that can still be seen by the next generation. New heating, new lighting. New gaskets. We have developed a cleaning and hygiene concept that reduces plastic and other packaging to a minimum. In our park area we will integrate bumblebee castles, insect hotels and hedgehog houses. A separate area will be established for dogs. Our guests have the possibility to easily cancel the room cleaning (daily). There will be many more measures of this kind.
But we also want to get involved socially. So for every soup we sell we will donate a soup to a charitable organization. We will offer free overnight accomodation to particularly engaged people as a „thank you“ for their work and dedication.

In short: We want to create a fair place.
A fair place for humans, animals and nature.

 

 

Warum und weshalb...


Mein Name ist Rolf Finkbeiner. Ich bin gelernter Hotelfachmann. Geboren bin ich in Freiburg und habe so manche Stationen in der Welt gehabt.

Bis auf ganz wenige Ausnahmen bin ich mein Leben lang der Gastronomie treu geblieben. Vom Feinschmecker-Restaurant über eine Diskothek, vom Bistro und Caterer bis zum Lounge-Club auf Ibiza habe ich die letzten 35 Jahre viele Geschäfte erfolgreich geführt.

Jetzt bin 69 und ich kann mir nicht vorstellen nichts mehr zu tun. Lange habe ich nach dem richtigen Objekt gesucht und es mit dem Hotel Nicklas auch gefunden.

Banken und Sparkassen sehen aber im Alter in mir keinen Geschäftsmann mehr, sondern lediglich einen Menschen, der bald stirbt. Finanzielle Hilfe? Keine Chance.
Daher bitte ich jetzt die Crowd-Community um Hilfe. Und dabei geht es mir nicht darum, einfach nur Geld zu bekommen.

Ich möchte ein Hotel schaffen, das einen grünen Fußabdruck hinterlässt, der sich auch bei der nächsten Generation sehen lassen kann. Neue Heizung, Neue Beleuchtung. Neue Dichtungen. Wir haben ein Reinigungs- und Hygienekonzept entwickelt, das Plastik und sonstige Verpackungen auf ein Minimum reduziert. In unserer Parkarea werden wir Hummelburgen, Insektenhotels und Igelhäuser einbinden. Für Hunde wird ein eigener Bereich etabliert. Dazu kommt unser "Gassi-Service" (Ausführ-Service). Unsere Gäste haben die Möglichkeit ganz einfach die Zimmerreinigung (täglich) abzubestellen. Und es wird noch viele weitere Maßnahmen geben.
Aber wir wollen uns auch sozial engagieren. So werden wir jeden Monat für jede verkaufte Suppe eine Suppe an die Tafel (oder vergleichbare Organisation) spenden. Wir wollen besonders engagierten Menschen kostenfreie Übernachtungen als ein Dankeschön für ihre Arbeit anbieten.

Kurz: Wir wollen einen fairen Ort kreieren.
Fair für Menschen. Fair für Tiere und die Natur.

 

El motivo


Me llamo Rolf Finkbeiner. Soy un profesional formado en hostelería. Nací en Friburgo y he pasado por muchos sitios en el mundo.

Con muy pocas excepciones, me he mantenido fiel a la gastronomía toda mi vida.

He dirigido con éxito muchos negocios en los últimos 35 años,

desde un restaurante gourmet y una discoteca, hasta un bistró, un servicio de catering y un club en Ibiza.

Ahora tengo 69 años y no puedo imaginarme no haciendo nada. Durante mucho tiempo he estado buscando el lugar correcto, y con el Hotel Nicklaslo he encontrado.

En mi vejez, los bancos y cajas de ahorros ya no me ven como un empresario, sino simplemente como una persona a la que le queda poco tiempo de vida. ¿Posibilidades de ayuda financiera? Ninguna.

Así que ahora pido ayuda a la comunidad. Y no se trata solo de conseguir dinero. Me gustaría crear un hotel que deje una huella verde que pueda ver la próxima generación. Calefacción nueva, iluminación nueva. Juntas nuevas. Hemos desarrollado un concepto de limpieza e higiene que reduce el plástico y otros envases al mínimo. En nuestra zona de parque incluiremos castillos de abejorros, hoteles de insectos y casas de erizos. Se establecerá una zona separada para perros. También estará nuestro «servicio Gassi» (servicio de ejecución). Nuestros huéspedes tendrán la posibilidad de cancelar fácilmente la limpieza de la habitación (diaria). Y habrá muchas más medidas.

Pero también nos queremos involucrar socialmente. Por cada sopa vendida, donaremos cada mes una sopa a una organización social. Y queremos ofrecer pernoctaciones gratuitas a las personas especialmente comprometidas como agradecimiento por su trabajo.

En resumen, queremos crear un lugar justo.
Justo para las personas. Justo para los animales y la naturaleza.
